[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D4094}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a b+hi d+harma ko Sha u pA yi ka nA ma TI ka/_bod skad du/_chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi 'grel bshad nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa
[\[1b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig nyon mongs nyon mongs ma yin pa/_/ma lus shes bya'i yul la sems rmongs shing /_/rgud pa thams cad kyi ni
[\[1b.3\]]gzhir gyur pa/_/shes rab 'od zer ring pos mthar mdzad cing /_/thugs rje'i thugs ldan chos ston phyag brkyang bas/_/'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba 'dren mdzad pa/_/de la dang po nyid du phyag 'tshal
[\[1b.4\]]lo/_/rang gzhan grub mtha' ma lus dag_/rnam bshad mkhas par rab grags pa/_/kun mkhyen ston pa'i slob dpon ni/_/shAkyas byin gus phyag byas nas/_/de yi zhabs kyi pad rdul la/_/gtugs
[\[1b.5\]]pas gsal ba'i blo ldan pa/_/dge slong zhi gnas lha yis ni/_/mdzod la mkho ba 'dir bsdu bya/_/gang zhig ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du byas nas smras pa'o zhes bya ba la/_/sangs
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rgyas kyi sgra ni bde bar gshegs pa nges tshig dang bcas pa la brjod de/_'di ltar/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
[\[2a.2\]]ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bram ze gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar 'gyur
[\[2a.3\]]ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau tam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa ci khyod kyi ming pha dang mas byas
[\[2a.4\]]sam/_nges tshig gang gis na sangs rgyas zhes brjod/_/de nas bram ze des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa las/_/ming mchog sangs rgyas zhes 'byung ba/_/pha dang ma yis byas sam
[\[2a.5\]]ci/_/nges tshig gang gis sangs rgyas brjod/_/bram ze la ni rjes brtse bas/_/de la ston pas lung bstan pa/_/bram ze ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi/_/mtshan nyid brjod pa rnyed pa ni/_/sangs rgyas 'du byed 'jig pa yi/_/chos can 'das pa'i
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]dus la gzigs/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs dus dang ni/_/de bzhin da ltar byung ba gzigs/_/mngon par shes bya mngon shes byed/_/de bzhin bsgom bya sgom byed dang /_/rab tu spang bya spong byed gzigs/_/des na bram ze sangs rgyas brjod/_/gang zhig cung zad shes bya ba/_/
[\[2b.2\]]thams cad nga yis rab tu mkhyen/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/des na bram ze sangs rgyas so/_/'du byed 'chi 'pho sdug bsngal ba/_/'ba' zhig bskal par bsam byas nas/_/dri ma rdul bral zug rngu med/_/byang chub 'di thob nga sangs rgyas/_/de nas
[\[2b.3\]]bram ze de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra yang chos kyi phung po las dang po sdud par byed pas nges tshig ji skad du/_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba dge ba'i chos rnams kyi skal ba dang ldan
[\[2b.4\]]pas sam/_dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i skal ba dang ldan pas sam/_dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims bsgoms pa/_sems bsgoms pa/_
[\[2b.5\]]shes rab bsgoms pas che ba'i bdag nyid dpag tu med cing tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang dang /_nus pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_mnga' dbang dang /_rab kyi stobs dang /_skal ba dang /_dbang
[\[2b.6\]]sgyur ba mnga' bas de la bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod do/_/yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags bcom pa dang /_zhe sdang bcom pa dang /_gti mug bcom pa dang /_'di'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos nyon mongs pa dang /_yang srid par nad dang bcas pa dang /_rnam
[\[2b.7\]]par smin pa sdug bsngal ba la 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba bcom pa ste/_ji skad du/_'dod chags bcom zhing zhe sdang bcom/_/gti mug bcom zhing nyon mongs spangs/_/'di yi sdig pa mi dge'i chos/_/bcom pas bcom ldan zhes brjod do/_/
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]zhes bshad pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/_yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshangs par spyod pa rab tu spyad nas/_sngon rang nyid kyis ma thos shing mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes pa'i chos rnams phyis byang chub chen po rjes su thob nas
[\[3a.2\]]mthong zhing chos mngon par shes te/_nyan thos rnams la chos rab tu 'byed pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu 'byed pa dang /_lhan cig chos dang lhan cig brtson pa sten par byed de/_ji skad du/_gang chos brtson pa bsten pa'i de bzhin gshegs/_/sems can kun la thogs
[\[3a.3\]]med rjes brtse ba/_/de 'dra lha dang mi yi ston pa ni/_/srid pa'i pha rol son la legs phyag 'tshal/_/zhes bshad do/_/de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/yang na nyan thos gus pa dang bcas pa'i tshig dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pa'i tshig brjod pas rjes su mthun cing rab tu
[\[3a.4\]]rigs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das zhes yang dag par brjod do/_/des na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/'di ltar de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das na len+d+ra'i a mra'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan
[\[3a.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
[\[3a.6\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag mngon par rab tu dang ste/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gzhan gang zhig bcom ldan 'das las mngon par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang ma byung /_'byung bar mi 'gyur/_da ltar yang med de/_'di lta ste/_
[\[3a.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'di ltar mngon par rab tu dang ste/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan gang zhig bcom ldan 'das las mngon par shes pa khyad par du 'phags
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa gang yang ma byung /_'byung bar mi 'gyur/_da ltar yang med [(]da[,]de[)]/_'di lta ste/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes rgya che ba dang /_drang srong gi ngag gi brjod pa mtha' gcig tu nges par 'dzin pa/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i
[\[3b.2\]]bu ci gang byung bar gyur pa 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'di lta bu byung /_'di lta bu'i
[\[3b.3\]]shes rab dang /_'di lta bu'i mngon par shes pa dang /_'di lta bu'i rnam par grol ba dang /_'di lta bu'i mang du gnas pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ngo zhes khyod kyis sems kyis dmigs shing rig gam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/
[\[3b.4\]]gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_'di lta bu'i chos/_'di lta bu'i shes rab/_'di lta bu'i mngon par shes pa/_'di
[\[3b.5\]]lta bu'i rnam par grol ba/_'di lta bu'i mang du gnas pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes rig gam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa
[\[3b.6\]]'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_'di lta bu'i shes rab/_'di lta bu'i mngon par shes pa/_'di lta bu'i rnam par grol ba/_'di lta bu'i mang du gnas pa dang ldan zhes bya bar yang rig gam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
[\[3b.7\]]pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyi rnam grangs mi shes na bsam pa cis/_ji ste btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag mngon par rab tu dang ste/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan gang zhig bcom ldan 'das las
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mngon par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa gang yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba da ltar med de/_'di lta ste/_rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya'o zhes ngag gis brjed pa drang srong gi ngag gis brjod pa rgya che ba mtha' gcig tu nges par 'dzin pa 'khor gyi nang du seng
[\[4a.2\]]ge'i sgra sgrogs/_btsun pa bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi thugs kyi rnam grangs ma 'tshal mod kyi/_'on kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'tshal te/_'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan pa
[\[4a.3\]]pa gang bla na med pa/_gong na med pa/_gya nom pa/_ches gya nom pa/_dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa dkar po dang nag po mi 'dra ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gsal bar mdzad de/_ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan pa bla na med pa/_gong
[\[4a.4\]]na med pa/_gya nom pa/_ches gya nom pa/_dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos dkar po dang nag po mi 'dra ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rgyas par gsal bar mdzad pa de lta de ltar bdag la chos gcig mngon par yongs su shes pa dang /_chos gcig spangs pa mngon par
[\[4a.5\]]shes pa dang /_chos gcig mngon sum du bya ba mngon par shes pa dang /_chos gcig bsgom pa mngon par shes pa dang /_chos rnams la rtogs pa nye bar 'gro ba dang /_ston pa la rab tu dang bar gyur cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu
[\[4a.6\]]ngo mtshar bar yang shes so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di lta bu'i dri ba 'byung ste/_'das pa'i dus na dge sbyong ngam bram ze dge sbyong gau ta ma las khyad par du 'phags pa byung ngam/_'di lta ste/_rdzogs par byang chub pa la'o zhes khyod la 'di ltar 'dri ba
[\[4a.7\]]de la ji ltar lan gdab par bya/_btsun pa bdag gi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te de ltar 'dri ba de la bdag gis med do zhes lan gdab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di skad du 'dri ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzhan dge sbyong ngam bram ze dge
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]sbyong gau ta ma las ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_'di lta ste/_rdzogs par byang chub pa la'o zhes 'di skad du 'dri na/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar lan 'debs/_btsun pa bdag gi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri na 'dri ba de la med do zhes lan
[\[4b.2\]]gdab par bgyi'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di skad du 'dri ste/_shA ri'i bu da ltar byung ba'i dus na dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan kha cig dge sbyong gau ta ma las khyad par du 'phags pa yod dam/_'di lta ste/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la'o zer na/_
[\[4b.3\]]de ltar 'dri ba de la shA ri'i bu ji ltar lan 'debs/_btsun pa bdag gi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri na 'dri ba de la med do zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs nas 'di ltar 'dri ste/_shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus na gzhan dge sbyong ngam
[\[4b.4\]]bram ze dge sbyong gau ta ma dang 'di lta ste/_mngon par byang chub pa la mnyam zhing mnyam pa yod dam zhes 'di ltar 'dri na/_shA ri'i bu ji ltar lan gdab/_btsun pa kha cig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs te 'dri na 'dri ba de la yod do zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/shA ri'i
[\[4b.5\]]bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri ste/_shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzhan dge sbyong ngam bram ze dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di lta ste/_mngon par byang chub pa la mnyam zhing mnyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes 'di ltar 'dri ba de la shA ri'i bu ji ltar lan gdab/_
[\[4b.6\]]btsun pa bdag gi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri na 'dri ba de la bdag gis yod do zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri ste/_shA ri'i bu da ltar byung ba'i dus na dge sbyong ngam bram ze dge sbyong gau ta ma dang
[\[4b.7\]]mngon par byang chub pa la mnyam zhing mnyam pa yod dam zhes 'di ltar 'dri na shA ri'i bu ji ltar lan gdab par bya/_btsun pa bdag gi drung du kha cig nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri na 'dri ba de la bdag gis med do zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyi drung du kha cig
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]nye bar 'ongs shing 'di skad du 'dri ste shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig rjes su yi rang la kha cig rjes su yi rang ba ma yin pa ci'i phyir zhes 'di ltar 'dri na/_shA ri'i bu ji skad du lan gdab par bya/_btsun
[\[5a.2\]]pa kha cig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs te 'di ltar 'dri na 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di ltar lan gdab par bya ste/_'das pa'i dus na dge sbyong ngam bram ze bcom ldan 'das dang mngon par byang chub pa la mnyam zhing mnyam par byung bar gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzhan dge sbyong
[\[5a.3\]]dang bram ze bcom ldan 'das dang mngon par byang chub pa la mnyam zhing mnyam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_de gang snga phyi med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing
[\[5a.4\]]go skabs med la/_gang gcig 'byung ba ni go skabs yod do zhes bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du 'byung ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa 'di lta ste mngon par byang chub pa'o/_/de bcom ldan 'das kyis ma lus pa mngon par shes shing
[\[5a.5\]]ma lus pa mngon par rab tu mkhyen nas/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze bcom ldan 'das las 'di lta ste/_mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa dus phyis mngon par shes par bya ba mngon par shes pa gzhan med do zhes mdo'i dum bu de lung ring po'i dang
[\[5a.6\]]po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa tha ma'i mdo las 'byung ngo /_/de nyid slob dpon sna tshogs blo gros kyi tshigs bcad bzhi brgya par 'god de/_nyan thos kun gyis rtogs gyur pa/_/khyod kyi chos kyi ded dpon po/_/bla na med pa rjes smra bas/_/khyod la dngos su nyer gnas te/_/
[\[5a.7\]]sangs rgyas chos zab bshad pa la/_/rjes su rigs par sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos shes pa de min zhes smras/_/zhes bshad do/_/yul dang dus shin tu bskal pa dang don rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bus skyes bu gzhan 'ga' zhig gi sngon dang phyis kyi
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]mtha' ma shes pas sa phyogs gcig na bcom ldan 'das dang shA ri'i bu bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na skyes bu gzhan zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di gong du skye ba ltos shig_/des bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa
[\[5b.2\]]pa'i lha'i mig mngon sum du byas te bltas pa na de tsam du bskal pa'i skye ba ji tsam pa yul du ma gyur to/_/ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal to zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis ji tsam du mthong ba de las
[\[5b.3\]]langs te/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhes bya bar bud med che ge mo zhes bya ba'i mngal du skyes so zhes bka' stsal to/_/yang bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na skyes bu gzhan zhig mngon du phyogs te 'ongs so/_/de
[\[5b.4\]]la bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la bos te/_shA ri'i bu skyes bu 'di khyod la yun ring por bsten pa la ltos/_des bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon du byas te bltas pa de srid du sngon yun ring du bsten pa ji tsam
[\[5b.5\]]pa yul du ma gyur to/_/de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'tshal to zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam khyod kyis mngon pa de las 'das te/_che ge mo zhes bya ba'i rigs dang che ge mo zhes bya ba'i gnyen 'dun du skyes so zhes
[\[5b.6\]]bka' stsal to/_/yang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos yun ring du bltas kyang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma mthong ba gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir 'ongs pa las bshad pa/_ngas ni 'di yis thar pa yi/_/sa bon shin tu phra ba dag_/'byung khung
[\[5b.7\]]rdo yi gseb na gser/_/bag la zha ba lta bur gzigs/_/bsam gtan shes rab bdag nyid dros/_/gnyis kyis thar pa thob nas ni/_/rang gi bya ba khyod kyis ni/_/mngon du de yis thob par 'gyur/_/spros pa thob kyang las 'di la/_/'bras bu rtsom pa med
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]par min/_/rdo yi nang du gnas pa'i gser/_/ma bzhus 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung nas nyin zhag de la dgra bcom pa thob ces rgyas par ji ltar btsun pa gzhon nu len gyis dpe'i phreng ba las drug pa dang bcu
[\[6a.2\]]pa'i drug pa las stag gi 'jigs pa'i dpe las bshad do/_/gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po yang ji ltar yi dwags lnga brgya'i don du gnyer ba bsgrubs nas ma gnas pa'i sa dris pa las de dag las kyi rlung gi shugs kyis 'phangs te 'bad pa chen pos gdungs kyang ma shes
[\[6a.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po'i rang gi shes pa sngon du btang nas lhar skyes shing gnas so zhes gtam rgyud brgya pa las lnga pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa las 'byung ngo /_/lam ma gtogs pa 'dus byas rnams/_/zag bcas zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni
[\[6a.4\]]mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad par bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_
[\[6a.5\]]gzugs gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba skye ba dang /_ji srid du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba skye ba 'di ni zag
[\[6a.6\]]pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzugs gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba dang /_ji srid du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la rjes su
[\[6a.7\]]chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba 'di ni zag pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag ngas zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa ji skad bshad pa 'dir rab tu bshad do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]'dir mdo las gzugs gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba mi skye ba zhes rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba rang gi ris tsam las dmigs pas rgyas pa skye ba bkag cing log par lta ba lam gyi bden pa la dmigs kyang de'i gnyen po
[\[6b.2\]]yin pas mi rgyas pas zag pa med pa zhes bshad par 'gyur ro/_/'o na gang 'gog pa ni 'dra ba ma yin no zhes gang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang /_chos sbyin gyi mdo las/_de la 'gog pa ni 'dra ba ma yin no zhes 'don pa don la khyad par med do/_/de ji ltar
[\[6b.3\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ma chos sbyin mnyan yod na rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang na gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dge slong ma
[\[6b.4\]]chos sbyin gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/_dge slong ma chos sbyin gyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge bsnyen sa gas dge slong ma chos sbyin la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'phags ma 'dri ba lung ston pa la skabs 'byed na phyogs
[\[6b.5\]]'ga' zhig yongs su 'dri'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sa ga nyon cig dang 'dri ba rig par bya'o/_/'phags ma 'jig tshogs zhes brjod pa dang /_'jig tshogs kun 'byung ba zhes brjod pa dang /_'jig tshogs 'gog pa zhes brjod pa/_'phags ma 'jig tshogs ni
[\[6b.6\]]gang /_'jig tshogs kun 'byung ba dang /_'jig tshogs 'gog pa ni gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi gsung rab las 'jig tshogs zhes bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du
[\[6b.7\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba kun 'byung ba ni yang srid par dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig pa'i srid pa ste/_de dang de la mngon par dga' ba'o/_/'jig tshogs 'gog pa ni yang srid par dga'
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig pa'i srid pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba ma lus pa spangs shing nges par 'byung ba zad pa 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa nye bar zhi ba grub pa'o/_/'phags ma ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_
[\[7a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sa ga byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa gzugs bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/gzugs bdag dang ldan/_bdag la gzugs yod/_gzugs la bdag gnas zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing /_de bzhin du tshor ba
[\[7a.3\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yin rnam par shes pa bdag dang ldan/_bdag la rnam par shes pa yod/_rnam par shes pa la bdag gnas zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[7a.4\]]'phags ma ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pas gzugs bdag yin/_gzugs bdag dang ldan/_bdag la gzugs yod/_gzugs la bdag gnas zhes yang dag par rjes
[\[7a.5\]]su mi mthong ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag yin/_rnam par shes pa bdag dang ldan/_bdag la rnam par shes pa yod/_rnam par shes pa la bdag gnas zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_des na 'jig
[\[7a.6\]]tshogs la lta ba kun 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags ma phung po dang nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes brjod pa/_'phags ma ci phung po gang yin pa de nyid nye bar len pa'i phung po yin nam/_'on te phung po gzhan nyid yin cing nye bar len pa'i phung po yang gzhan nyid
[\[7a.7\]]yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sa ga nye bar len pa'i phung po gang yin pa ni phung po yin no/_/phung po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po ma yin no/_/phung po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po yin pa ni gang /_phung po yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po ma yin pa ni gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sa
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]ga gzugs gang zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa 'di phung po yang yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po yang yin no/_/gzugs gang
[\[7b.2\]]zag pa med cing nye bar len pa med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zag pa med cing nye bar len pa med pa 'di ni phung po yin la nye bar len pa'i phung po ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma gang 'di phung po gsum po tshul khrims kyi phung
[\[7b.3\]]po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_gang yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes 'byung ba ci phung po gsum gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsdus sam/_'on te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis phung po gsum
[\[7b.4\]]bsdus/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga phung po gsum gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsdus kyi/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis ni phung po gsum bsdus pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar phung po gsum gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsdus shing
[\[7b.5\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis phung po gsum ma bsdus she na/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga de la yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims kyi phung por bshad do/_/gang yang yang
[\[7b.6\]]dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por bshad do/_/gang yang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi phung por bshad do/_/tshe
[\[7b.7\]]dang ldan pa sa ga des na phung po gsum gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsdus shing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis ni phung po gsum ma lus par rig par bya'o/_/'phags ma lam 'dus byas sam 'on te 'dus ma byas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]'dus byas so/_/'phags ma 'gog pa 'dra ba yin nam/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga 'dra ba ma yin no/_/'phags ma bsam gtan dang po yan lag du zhig dang ldan/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga yan lag lnga dang ldan te/_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_
[\[8a.2\]]dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/'phags ma ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pa zhes 'byung ba/_'phags ma ting nge 'dzin ni gang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[8a.3\]]gyi stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ni gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin no/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan no/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so/_/chos 'di rnams nyid la bsnyen par byed/_
[\[8a.4\]]nye bar bsnyen par byed/_gnas par byed/_bsgom zhing sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma 'du byed 'du byed ces 'byung ba/_'phags ma 'du byed rnams gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du
[\[8a.5\]]byed dang gsum mo/_/'phags ma lus kyi 'du byed gang /_ngag gi 'du byed gang /_yid kyi 'du byed gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa ni lus kyi 'du byed ces bya'o/_/rtog pa dang dpyod pa ni ngag gi 'du byed ces bya'o/_/'du shes dang sems
[\[8a.6\]]pa ni yid kyi 'du byed ces bya'o/_/'phags ma dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa ci'i phyir lus kyi 'du byed ces bya/_'phags ma rtog pa dang dpyod pa ci'i phyir ngag gi 'du byed ces bya/_'du shes dang sems pa ci'i phyir yid kyi 'du byed ces bya/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dbugs 'byung ba
[\[8a.7\]]dang rngub pa ni lus kyi chos te/_lus la brten pa lus dang 'brel pa lus la brten te rab tu 'jug pas de'i phyir dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa lus kyi 'du byed ces bya'o/_/rtog pa dang dpyod pas ni brtags shing dpyad nas smra ba de'i phyir rtog pa dang dpyod pa la ngag gi 'du byed ces
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]bya'o/_/'du shes dang sems pa ni sems las byung ba'i chos te/_sems kyi rjes su 'gro ba sems la brten pa sems dang 'brel pa sems la rab tu brten nas 'jug pas de'i phyir 'du shes dang sems pa la yid kyi 'du byed ces bya'o/_/'phags ma gang gi tshe chos
[\[8b.2\]]des lus bor nas sems med pa'i shing bzhin du gnas pa de'i tshe lus btang nas gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga tshe dang drod dang rnam par shes pa gsum gyis te/_tshe dang drod dang rnam shes kyis/_/gang tshe lus ni 'dor byed cing /_/bor
[\[8b.3\]]nas de tshe gnas pa ni/_/sems med ci ltar shing bzhin no/_/'phags ma shi zhing dus las 'das pa dang 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa bsam pa'am rgyu tha dad pa'am/_khyad par 'ga' zhig yod dam/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga shi zhing dus las 'das pa dang
[\[8b.4\]]'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa bsam pa'am rgyu tha dad pa'am/_khyad par rnam pa mang du yod de/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga shi zhing dus las 'das pa ni lus kyi 'du byed 'gags shing sems kyi 'du byed dang ngag gi 'du byed 'gags par 'gyur la/_tshe dang drod dang bral zhing dbang po
[\[8b.5\]]rnams gzhan du gyur cing rnam par shes pa lus las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni lus kyi 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur zhing ngag gi 'du byed dang sems kyi 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur yang tshe dang drod 'gag par mi 'gyur zhing dbang po gzhan du 'gyur ba
[\[8b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa lus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe dang ldan pa sa ga shi zhing dus las 'das pa dang 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di'i bsam pa dang rgyu dang khyad par yin no/_/'phags ma ji ltar 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur/_tshe dang
[\[8b.7\]]ldan pa sa ga dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na bdag 'di ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhugs par bya'o snyam du mi sems/_'di'i sems sngon de lta de ltar yongs su sbyangs [(]zhing [,]shing [)]yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ji lta ji ltar de dang de la nye bar gnas par
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'phags ma ji ltar 'gog pa las ldang bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dge slong 'gog pa la gnas pa ldang ba na 'di ltar bdag 'gog pa las langs shing ldang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems kyang 'di sems sngon nyid du de lta de ltar yongs su sbyangs
[\[9a.2\]]shing yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ji lta ji ltar de dang de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags ma dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed dam/_sems kyi 'du byed kyi chos du zhig dang po nyid du 'gag par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan
[\[9a.3\]]pa sa ga dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang po nyid du ngag gi 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ni lus dang yid kyi 'du byed do/_/'phags ma dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las langs pa na dang po nyid du lus kyi 'du byed dam/_ngag gi 'du byed
[\[9a.4\]]dang /_yid kyi 'du byed kyi chos du zhig skye bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa las langs pa na dang po nyid du yid kyi 'du byed skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ni lus dang ngag gi 'du byed do/_/'phags ma dge slong 'gog pa las
[\[9a.5\]]langs pa sems zhing la gzhol zhing zhing la 'bab pa dang gang la bab par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dge slong 'gog pa las langs pa'i sems dben pa la gzhol ba dang /_dben pa las 'bab pa dang /_dben pa la bab par 'gyur ro/_/thar pa la gzhol zhing thar
[\[9a.6\]]pa la 'bab pa dang thar pa la bab par 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro/_/'phags ma dge slong 'gog pa las langs pa reg pa gang la reg_/tshe dang ldan pa sa ga mi g.yo
[\[9a.7\]]ba dang /_cung zad med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa gsum la'o/_'phags ma dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa chos mang po du zhig byed par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga dri ba 'di ni thog ma nyid du dri bar bya ba dang da ltar byas kyang lung bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa chos gnyis kyis mang po byed par 'gyur te/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong ngo /_/'phags ma tshor ba gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga gsum ste/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[9b.2\]]'phags ma bde ba'i tshor ba ni gang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba ni gang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga bde ba'i tshor ba'i reg pa las skyes pa lus dang sems kyis bde ba dang dga' ba myong ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba
[\[9b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/gang sdug bsngal myong ba'i reg bya reg pa las skyes pa lus dang sems kyis sdug bsngal ba dang mi bde ba tshor zhing rig pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/gang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i reg bya reg pa las skyes pa lus dang sems
[\[9b.4\]]kyis sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa dang /_dga' ba yang ma yin pa dang mi dga' ba yang ma yin pa myong ba ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma bde ba'i tshor ba la gang zhig rgyas par 'gyur/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
[\[9b.5\]]la gang zhig rgyas par 'gyur/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gang zhig rgyas par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga bde ba'i tshor ba la 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la zhe sdang rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba yang ma
[\[9b.6\]]yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gti mug rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags ma bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad la 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur ram/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad la zhe sdang rgyas par 'gyur ram/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal
[\[9b.7\]]ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba thams cad la gti mug rgyas par 'gyur ram/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad la 'dod chags rgyas pa ma yin la/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad la zhe sdang rgyas pa ma yin zhing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]pa'i tshor ba thams cad la gti mug rgyas pa ma yin mod kyi/_bde ba'i tshor ba gang la 'dod chags rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba yod la/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang la zhe sdang rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba yod la/_
[\[10a.2\]]bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gti mug rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/'phags ma bde ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga 'di la 'phags pa nyan thos 'dod pa las
[\[10a.3\]]dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ba sems kyi rnam pa gcig tu
[\[10a.4\]]gyur nas rtog pa med pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral nas btang snyoms su gnas te dran pa dang shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis so sor myong
[\[10a.5\]]zhing gang 'phags pa rnams kyi btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dran pa dang /_bde bar gnas pa bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni bde ba'i tshor ba la 'dod chags rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma sdug
[\[10a.6\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba la zhe sdang rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga 'di la 'phags pa nyan thos thar pa bla ma la 'dod pa skyed de bdag nam de'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par 'gyur/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs
[\[10a.7\]]nas gnas zhes thar pa bla ma 'dod pa dang /_don du gnyer ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_yid mi bde ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba zhe sdang rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]la gti mug rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga 'di la 'phags pa nyan thos bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing snga ma bzhin du yid bde ba dang mi bde ba nub cing bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms
[\[10b.2\]]dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gti mug rgyas par mi 'gyur zhing spong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/'phags ma bde ba'i tshor ba cis bde ba yin/_cis
[\[10b.3\]]sdug bsngal ba yin/_cis nye bar 'tshe ba yin/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba cis bde ba yin/_cis sdug bsngal ba yin/_cis nye bar 'tsho ba yin/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba cis bde ba yin/_cis sdug bsngal ba yin/_cis nye
[\[10b.4\]]bar 'tshe ba yin/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga bde ba'i tshor ba skye ba na yang bde/_gnas pa na yang bde/_yongs su 'gyur ba na yang sdug bsngal te/_gang mi rtag pa des nye bar 'tshe ba yin no/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba skye ba na yang sdug bsngal/_gnas pa na yang sdug bsngal/_
[\[10b.5\]]yongs su 'gyur ba na bde ste/_gang gi tshe mi rtag pa de'i tshe nye bar 'tshe ba yin no/_/bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba mi shes pa sdug bsngal/_ye shes skyes na bde ba/_gang gi tshe mi rtag pa de nye bar 'tshe ba yin no/_/'phags ma bde ba'i
[\[10b.6\]]tshor ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_bde ba'i tshor ba'o/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor
[\[10b.7\]]ba'o/_/bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_ma rig pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_rig pa'o/_/rig pa'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/'phags ma
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i rab tu rnam par 'byed pa gang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ga ring ba bas kyang [(]shing [,]shin [)]tu ring bar 'di'i mtha' bsdu bar nus pa ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur
[\[11a.2\]]ba sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba yang dag pa'i tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/de nas dge bsnyen sa ga dge slong ma chos sbyin gyis bshad pa la dga' zhing yi rang nas/_dge slong ma chos sbyin gyi rkang pa la phyag byas nas langs te song ngo /_/dge bsnyen sa ga song nas ring
[\[11a.3\]]po ma lon par dge slong ma chos sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song te/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong ma chos sbyin gyis dge bsnyen sa ga dang lhan cig ji srid du
[\[11a.4\]]gtam brjod par gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma chos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chos sbyin legs so legs so/_/nga la yang dge bsnyen sa ga don 'di nyid dang /_tshig 'di nyid dang /_yi ge 'di nyid kyi dri ba
[\[11a.5\]]'dri na nga yang don 'di nyid dang tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du lung bstan par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong ma chos sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga'o/_/'dir sdom la/_'jig
[\[11a.6\]]tshogs lta bas dri bya gsum/_/lta ba gnyis kyi bya ba dang /_/phung po lnga gsum lam dang ni/_/'gog pa'i tshig ni bcu pa yin/_/ting 'dzin yan lag du yod dang /_/'du byed phung po du zhig dang /_/tshor bas dri ba drug dang ni/_/rab tu rnam dbye rnam pa drug_/de
[\[11a.7\]]dag nyid dus zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag dus ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'das pa'i dus dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus so zhes bka' stsal to/_/gtam gzhi dang zhes bya ba la/_gleng
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag gtam gyi gzhi ni gsum te/_bzhi pa med cing lnga pa med de/_ngas 'di lta bu mthong zhes mkhas pa rnams mthong ba'i don las brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba dang /_ngas 'di lta bu rnam par shes so zhes thos pa dang /_
[\[11b.2\]]bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i don las brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'das pa'i gtam gyi gzhi dang /_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i gtam gyi gzhi'o/_/'das pa'i gtam gyi gzhi gang zhe na/_'di la mkhas pa dag
[\[11b.3\]]'das pa'i dus na 'di lta bu byung ngo zhes 'das pa'i dus las brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba ni 'das pa'i dus kyi gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i gtam gyi gzhi gang zhe na/_'di la mkhas pa dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[11b.4\]]zhes ma 'ongs pa'i dus las brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i gtam gyi gzhi gang zhe na/_'di la mkhas pa dag da ltar byung ba'i dus na da ltar ni 'di lta bu'o zhes da ltar byung ba'i dus las
[\[11b.5\]]brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba 'di ni da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi gtam gyi gzhi zhes bya'o/_/gtam gyi gzhi ni rnam pa 'di gsum ste/_bzhi pa med cing lnga pa med de/_gang mkhas pa rnams 'di lta bu mthong zhes mthong ba'i don las brtsams te gtam brjod
[\[11b.6\]]cing smra ba dang /_'di lta bu shes so zhes thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i don las brtsams te gtam brjod cing smra ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar [(]gshes [,]gshegs [)]pas de skad gsungs te/_de nas ston pas
[\[11b.7\]]gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bshad bya'i 'du shes sems can ni/_/'chad par byed 'dir rab tu gnas/_/bshad bya yongs su ma shes na/_/rga dang 'chi ba'i spyod yul 'gyur/_/'chad byed yongs su shes pa yin/_/'chad pa po la mi nyan cing /_/de la
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pha rol smra ba med/_/de phyir rtag tu bsam gtan mnyam gzhag chags/_/gdung ba med cing skye rga'i mtha' mthong nas/_/bdud kyi sde kun bcom pa'i dge slong dag_/srid par skye dang 'chi ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/nges par
[\[12a.2\]]'byung bcas rnams zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/nges par 'byung ba ni gsum ste/_'dod pa las nges par 'byung ba dang /_gzugs las nges par 'byung ba dang /_gzugs med pa las nges par 'byung ba dang /_gang cung zad mngon par
[\[12a.3\]]'dus byas shing bsags pa 'gag pa ni nges par 'byung ba zhes bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i/_/phung po'ang de dag ces bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_
[\[12a.4\]]dge slong dag phung po dang nye bar len pa'i phung po dag bstan pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/phung po gang zhe na/_gzugs gang cung zad 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_nang gi dang /_phyi'i dang /_rags
[\[12a.5\]]pa dang /_phra ba dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_gang thag nye ba dang /_thag ring ba dang /_thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/tshor ba gang cung zad dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang cung
[\[12a.6\]]zad 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_nang gi dang phyi dang /_rags pa dang /_phra ba dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_thag nye ba dang ring ba dang /_thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro
[\[12a.7\]]ste/_'di ni phung po zhes bya'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba gang la 'dun pa'am/_chags pa'am/_zhen pa'am/_dga' ba'am/_chags zhen nam/_mngon par zhen pa dang /_tshor ba gang dang /_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'du shes gang dang /_'du byed gang dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba gang la 'dun pa'am/_chags pa'am/_zhen pa'am/_dga' ba'am/_chags zhen nam/_mngon par zhen pa 'di ni nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[12b.2\]]dge slong dag phung po dang nye bar len pa'i phung po ji skad bstan pa 'di rab tu bstan to zhes bka' stsal to/_/don 'di nyid dge slong ma chos sbyin gyi mdo las yi ge gzhan dang nges pa'i tshig gzhan gyis bshad de/_'phags ma phung po dang nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bshad
[\[12b.3\]]pa/_'phags ma phung po gang yin pa de nyid nye bar len pa'i phung po yin nam zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdus pa'o/_/'jig pas 'jig rten no zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dran pa bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song
[\[12b.4\]]ste nye bar 'ongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dran pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bshad pa ci'i phyir 'jig
[\[12b.5\]]rten zhes bgyi/_dran pa 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa ste/_/rab tu 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pas 'jig rten zhes bya'o/_/ci 'jig cing rab tu 'jig_/dran pa mig rab tu 'jig cing 'jig pa dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus
[\[12b.6\]]te reg pa dang /_gang gi tshe yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de'i tshe yang 'jig cing rab tu 'jig ste/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang lus dang /_yid
[\[12b.7\]]'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa dang /_gang gi tshe chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de'i tshe yang
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]'jig cing rab tu 'jig ste/_'jig cing rab tu 'jig pa de'i 'jig cing rab tu 'jig pas dran pa de'i phyir 'jig rten zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dran pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
[\[13a.2\]]pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du mig gi nang gi skye mched de zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
[\[13a.3\]]zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mig ni nang gi skye mched de zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan gyi rgyas par ni rnam par ma phye na/_btsun pa ji ltar mig nang gi
[\[13a.4\]]skye mched lags/_dge slong mig ni nang gi skye mched de/_'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba gzugs dang ba gzugs can bstan du med pa thogs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/mig ji lta ba de bzhin du/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang lus kyang brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[13a.5\]]btsun pa yid ni nang gi skye mched yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan gyi rgyas par ni rnam par ma phye na/_btsun pa ji ltar yid nang gi skye mched lags/_dge slong yid ni nang gi skye mched de/_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa
[\[13a.6\]]bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'o/_/btsun pa gzugs ni phyi'i skye mched de zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan gyi/_rgyas par ni rnam par ma phye na/_btsun pa ji ltar na gzugs phyi'i skye mched lags/_dge slong gzugs ni phyi'i skye mched de/_'byung ba chen po bzhi'i
[\[13a.7\]]rgyu las byung ba bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_btsun pa reg bya ni phyi'i skye mched yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan gyi/_rgyas par ni rnam par ma phye na/_btsun pa ji ltar na reg bya phyi'i skye mched lags/_dge
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]slong dag reg bya ni phyi'i skye mched de 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi rgyur byas pa gzugs can bstan du med cing thogs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/btsun pa chos ni phyi'i skye mched de zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan gyi/_rgyas par ni rnam par ma phye na/_
[\[13b.2\]]btsun pa ji ltar chos phyi'i skye mched lags/_dge slong chos ni phyi'i skye mched de/_skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa'i chos kyi skye mched de bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'o/_/de nas dge slong de stan las langs te song ngo /_/rab tu byed pa dang mdo sde
[\[13b.3\]]las zhes bya ba la/_lag pa brdabs pa'i dpe'i mdo las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin te/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gcig pu dben pa na ting nge 'dzin na gnas pa na bdag gi bdag gang yin/_cis bdag gi bdag yin/_ji ltar bdag gi
[\[13b.4\]]bdag yin/_gang la bdag gi bdag yin zhes 'di lta bu sems la dpyod pa skyes te/_de nas dge slong de ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo /_/nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
[\[13b.5\]]tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag 'di na gcig pu dben pa na ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa na bdag gi bdag gang yin/_cis gdag gi bdag yin/_ji ltar bdag gi bdag yin/_
[\[13b.6\]]gang la bdag gi bdag yin zhes 'di lta bu sems la rnam par dpyod pa skyes so/_/dge slong legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang gnyis shig bstan cing bshad par bya'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_mig dang gzugs dang /_rna ba dang sgra dang /_sna dang dri dang /_lce dang ro dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]lus dang reg bya dang /_yid dang /_chos te/_'di ni gnyis zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gang zhig dge sbyong gau ta mas gnyis bstan pa de bdag gis bsal te/_gzhan gnyis bstan par bya'o zhes pa ni tshig tsam du zad cing dri ba'i lan yongs su mi shes pa yin zhing slar la kun
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]tu rmongs pa skyes pa dang yang dag pa'i yul can ma yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ste/_dge slong de la gang nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid mig gi sha'i gong bu la sra ba dang mkhrang bar gyur pa zin
[\[14a.2\]]pa 'di ni mig gi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong de la gang nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid mig gi sha'i gong bu la chu dang chur gyur pa brlan pa dang mnyen pa dang mnyen par gyur pa dang zin pa 'di ni mig gi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi
[\[14a.3\]]chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid mig gi sha'i gong bu la me dang mer gyur pa dang /_dro ba dang dro bar gyur pa zin par gyur pa 'di ni mig gi sha'i gong bu nang gi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid kyi mig
[\[14a.4\]]gi sha'i gong bu la rlung dang rlung du gyur pa yang ba dang g.yo bar gyur pa zin pa 'di ni mig gi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams zhes bya ba'o/_/dge slong 'di lta ste/_lag pa gnyis sprad cing brdabs pa las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mig dang gzugs la
[\[14a.5\]]brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa zhes bya ba ste/_'di lta bu'i chos can gyi bdag nyid mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_g.yung drung ma yin pa/_yid brtan du med pa/_
[\[14a.6\]]yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dge slong skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang /_dge slong 'du byed sgyu ma lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can/_de tsam gyi dus can/_rkyen gzhan gyis gnas
[\[14a.7\]]pa/_ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas kyang 'jig pa ste/_dge slong de'i phyir 'du byed ni stong pa/_'du byed ni stong pa zhes sems kyis rnam par shes shing 'du shes nas yang dag par dga' ba skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed ni stong pa/_rtag pa dang brtan
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]pa dang g.yung drung ma yin pa/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gi bas stong pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_skyes bu mig dang ldan pa mar me thogs te khang pa stong pa'i nang du zhugs na der stong zhing stong par mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong 'du byed rnams stong ngo /_/
[\[14b.2\]]'du byed rnams stong ngo zhes sems kyis shes shing 'du shes pa na sems yang dag par dga' ba skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed rnams ni stong pa rtag pa dang brtan pa dang g.yung drung ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gis stong pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[14b.3\]]lce dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du ste/_dge slong de la gang nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid kyi lus sha'i gong bu la sra ba dang mkhrang bar gyur pa zin pa 'di ni lus kyi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/[(]dge
[\[14b.4\]]dge [,]dge [)]slong de la nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sha'i gong bu la chu dang chur gyur pa mnyen pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ba 'di dang zin par gyur pa 'di ni lus kyi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la gang nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid kyi
[\[14b.5\]]lus kyi sha'i gong bu la me dang mer gyur pa dro ba dang dro bar gyur pa zin pa 'di ni lus kyi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la gang nang gi rkyen gyi bdag nyid kyi lus sha'i gong bu la rlung dang rlung du gyur pa yang ba dang g.yo bar gyur pa zin pa
[\[14b.6\]]'di ni lus kyi sha'i gong bu la nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong 'di lta ste/_lag pa gnyis sprad cing brdabs pa las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus dang reg bya la brten nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang /_lhan
[\[14b.7\]]cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa zhes bya ba ste/_'di lta bu'i chos can gyi bdag nyid ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_g.yung drung ma yin pa/_yid brtan du med pa/_dge slong yongs su ma gyur pa'i chos can te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'di
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ltar skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu lta bu ste/_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can de tsam gyi dus can/_rkyen gzhan gyis gnas pa/_ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas kyang 'jig pa ste/_dge
[\[15a.2\]]slong de'i phyir 'du byed rnams ni stong pa 'du byed rnams ni stong pa zhes sems kyis rnam par shes shing 'du shes pa na sems dga' ba dang yang dag par rab tu dga' ba skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed rnams ni rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_g.yung drung ma yin pa yongs
[\[15a.3\]]su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gis stong pa'o/_/'di lta ste skyes bu mig dang ldan pa mar me thogs te khang pa stong pa'i nang du zhugs na der stong zhing stong par mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong 'du byed rnams stong ngo /_/'du byed rnams stong ngo zhes sems kyis
[\[15a.4\]]shes shing 'du shes pa ni sems dga' ba dang yang dag par dga' ba skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed rnams ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa g.yung drung ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gis stong pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_lag pa gnyis brdabs shing
[\[15a.5\]]phrad pa las sgrar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yid dang chos la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang /_gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa zhes bya ba ste/_dge slong 'di lta bu'i chos can gyi bdag ni mi rtag pa/_
[\[15a.6\]]mi brtan pa/_g.yung drung ma yin pa/_yid brtan du med pa'o/_/dge slong bdag ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_bdag dang bdag gi bas stong pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_'chi 'pho zhing skye ste/_dge slong 'du
[\[15a.7\]]byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_'jig pa'i chos can te/_de tsam gyi dus can/_rkyen gzhan gyis gnas pa/_ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas 'jig pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir dge slong 'du byed rnams stong pa 'du byed rnams stong pa zhes sems kyis shes shing 'du shes
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]pa na dga' ba dang yang dag par dga' ba skye ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed rnams ni stong pa/_rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_g.yung drung ma yin pa/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gis stong pa ste/_'di lta ste/_skyes bu mig dang ldan pa mar me thogs
[\[15b.2\]]te khang pa stong pa'i nang du zhugs nas des stong zhing stong par mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong 'du byed rnams stong zhing stong pa zhes sems kyis shes shing 'du shes na sems dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong 'du byed rnams ni mi rtag pa mi brtan
[\[15b.3\]]pa g.yung drung ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can bdag dang bdag gi bral ba'o/_/de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga' nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas
[\[15b.4\]]song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa brdabs pa'i dpe'i gdams ngag byin pa dang /_gcig tu dben pa tshad med pa gdung ba med pa spangs pa zhes bdag nyid lung ston cing gcig tu dben pa tshad med pa gdung ba med pa la bdag nyid gnas par bya ba'i phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te/_
[\[15b.5\]]'phags pa'i chos gos bgos te dad pas yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung [(]te[,]ste[)]/_bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas mthong ba'i chos nyid la bdag nyid mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas
[\[15b.6\]]so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes dgra bcom pa dang sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs su rung bas gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
[\[15b.7\]]gang zhe na/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang kha cig sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran zhing dran pa'am/_dran par gyur pa'am/_dran par 'gyur ba
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]'di thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di nyid la sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran zhing dran pa'am/_dran par gyur pa'am yang dag par dran par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze bdag 'das pa'i dus na gzugs dang ldan par gyur/_
[\[16a.2\]]'di lta bu'i gzugs dang ldan par gyur zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma yang dag par rjes su dran zhing yang dag par rjes su dran pa dang /_yang dag par rjes su dran par gyur pa dang /_yang dag par rjes su dran par 'gyur ba dang /_dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'das pa'i dus na rnam
[\[16a.3\]]par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_'di lta bu'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan par gyur zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma yang dag par rjes su dran zhing yang dag par rjes su dran pa dang /_yang dag par rjes su dran par gyur pa dang /_yang dag par rjes su dran par 'gyur te/_dge slong
[\[16a.4\]]dag gzugs ni gzugs su rung bas gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/cis gzugs su rung zhe na/_lag pa'i reg pas reg par bya bas gzugs su rung ba dang /_bong ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_dbyug pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_mtshon gyi 'dus te reg pa
[\[16a.5\]]dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi 'dus te reg pas reg na/_reg tu yod cing gzugs su rung bas gzugs te/_de'i phyir gzugs su rung bas gzugs nye bar len pa'i
[\[16a.6\]]phung po zhes bya'o/_/gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dge slong tshor zhing myong bas na tshor ba zhes bya ste/_de'i phyir tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/ci tshor zhe na/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[16a.7\]]ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bas dge slong dag de'i phyir tshor zhing myong bas tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dge slong dag
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]'dus te shes pas 'du shes te de'i phyir 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/ci 'dus te shes she na/_chung ngu 'dus te shes pa dang /_rgya chen po dang tshad med pa dang /_cung zad med do zhes cung zad med pa yang rab tu shes te/_dge slong dag 'dus te shes pas de'i
[\[16b.2\]]phyir 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dge slong dag 'du byed mngon par 'dus byas shing 'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa de'i phyir 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung
[\[16b.3\]]po zhes bya'o/_/cis 'du byed mngon par 'du byed ce na/_gzugs 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed de/_dge slong dag 'dus byas mngon par 'du byed cing 'dus byas mngon
[\[16b.4\]]par 'du byed pa de'i phyir 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dge slong dag rnam par shes shing rab tu shes pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes
[\[16b.5\]]bya'o/_/ci zhig rnam par shes she na/_gzugs rnam par shes pa dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnam par shes te/_dge slong dag rnam par shes shing rab tu shes pa de'i phyir rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag rnam par
[\[16b.6\]]shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dge slong dag de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ltar yang dag par rab tu slob par byed de/_bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom ste 'di lta ste
[\[16b.7\]]bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom pa de bzhin du 'das pa'i dus kyi gzugs kyis bdag bcom mo/_/bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom pa na yang 'das pa'i gzugs la mngon par dga' ste/_de'i tshe yang de dang 'dra ba nyid du shes par
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]byas nas 'das pa'i gzugs la ltos par mi 'gyur/_ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur/_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs la skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa nyan thos thos
[\[17a.2\]]pa dang ldan pa 'di ltar yang dag par rjes su slob par byed de/_bdag da ltar da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa bcom ste/_'di lta ste/_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis bcom pa de bzhin du bdag
[\[17a.3\]]'das pa'i dus kyi rnam par shes pas bcom mo/_/bdag da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas bcom pa na yang ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga' ste/_de'i tshe yang de dang 'dra ba nyid du shes par byas nas 'das pa'i dus kyi rnam par shes pa la ltos
[\[17a.4\]]par mi 'gyur/_ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa la mngon par dga' bar mi 'gyur/_da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la skyo ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa thob par 'gyur te/_de nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed/_'grib par byed cing
[\[17a.5\]]'phel bar mi byed/_mi gsal bar byed cing gsal bar mi byed/_spong bar byed cing len par mi byed do/_/ci zhig nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed ce na/_gzugs nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[17a.6\]]rnam par shes pa nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed do/_/ci zhig 'grib par byed cing 'phel bar mi byed ce na/_gzugs 'grib par byed cing 'phel bar mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'grib par byed cing 'phel bar
[\[17a.7\]]mi byed do/_/ci zhig mi gsal bar byed cing gsal bar mi byed ce na/_gzugs mi gsal bar byed cing gsal bar mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi gsal bar byed cing gsal bar mi byed do/_/ci zhig spong bar byed cing len
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]par mi byed ce na/_gzugs spong bar byed cing len par mi byed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa spong bar byed cing len par mi byed do/_/nyams par byed cing mthu skyed par mi byed par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'grib par byed cing 'phel bar mi byed par
[\[17b.2\]]gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gsal bar byed cing gsal bar mi byed par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/spong bar byed cing len par mi byed pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa ma yin pa so so rang gis rig cing shes nas/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod
[\[17b.3\]]pa bsten no/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/'di ltar don gyi sde tshan las zhes bya ba la/_phran tshegs kyi don gyi sde tshan gyi mdo las/_bse ru lta bu'i tshigs bcad kyi de ma thag tu bshad pa lta bu ste/_de la dang
[\[17b.4\]]por mnyan yod na bram ze gzhan zhig gi 'bras kyi zhing brlag pa dang /_chung ma shi ba'i sngon gyi skye ba'i gtam rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i sde la tshigs su bcad pa'i don las brtsams te bshad pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gleng gzhi 'di dang /_rgyu 'di dang don 'di lta bu byung bar
[\[17b.5\]]gyur te/_don shes pa'i nga'i dge slong 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mdo'i tshig dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_nga'i tshangs par spyod pa dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_skye bo gzhan mang po la yang dar ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la yang yang dag par gsal bar 'gyur
[\[17b.6\]]zhes dgongs nas de'i tshe don gyi sde'i mdo 'di bshad do/_/gal te 'dod pa 'dod byed na/_/de yi yid la 'dod 'phel te/_/yid du 'ong ba thob pa'i mi/_/shin tu dga' ba 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gal te 'dod pa tshol byed cing /_/'dun pa skyes pa'i lus can te/_/'dod
[\[17b.7\]]pa de dag ma 'byor na/_/zug rngus zug bzhin gnod par 'gyur/_/gang zhig sbrul mgo'i rkang pa ltar/_/'dod pa thams cad rang spangs na/_/de ni 'jig rten srid can la/_/dran pas shin tu yang dag 'da'/_/zhing dngos nor bu ba lang dang /_/rta dang 'bangs dang bud med
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]dang /_/gnyen dang so so'i 'dod pa la/_/skyes bu gang zhig 'dod byed pa/_/stobs ldan nye bar 'tshe ba yis/_/stobs che de dag bcom par 'gyur/_/gru zhig pa la chu bzhin no/_/de nas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/_/de phyir skye bo dran ldan pas/_/
[\[18a.2\]]rtag tu 'dod pa yongs spangs shing /_/de spangs chu bo brgal ba'i gru/_/thob nas srid pa'i pha rol 'gro/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/mdo las ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems pa'i tshogs drug go zhes bshad do zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong
[\[18a.3\]]dag nye bar len pa'i phung po ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po'o/_/gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de
[\[18a.4\]]thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa ste/_'di ni gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_gang gzugs nye
[\[18a.5\]]bar len pa'i phung po ma lus par spangs shing nges par 'byung ba/_bcom pa/_zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa/_nye bar zhi ba/_nus pa/_gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams mi sbyor ba/_nye bar len pa med pa/_mi 'byung ba 'di
[\[18a.6\]]nyid mchog yin te/_'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba/_srid pa zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_tshor ba'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi 'dus
[\[18a.7\]]te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste/_'di ni tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po de yang snga ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o/_/
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]'du [(]shas [,]shes [)]nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_'du shes kyi tshogs drug ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang /_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes te/_'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[18b.2\]]de yang snga ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o/_/'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_sems pa'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i 'du shes dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i
[\[18b.3\]]'du shes te/_'di ni 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/de yang snga ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o/_/rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_
[\[18b.4\]]sna dang /_lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/_'di ni rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/de yang snga ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag gang chos 'di rnams shes rab chung ngus 'byed cing bzod la/_
[\[18b.5\]]so so'i skye bo'i sa las yang dag par 'das te yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sa non cing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob la/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob par bar skabs su dus byed par mi rigs pa 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag
[\[18b.6\]]gang chos 'di rnams la shes rab chen pos 'byed cing bzod la/_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sa non cing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag gang chos rnams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis lta bar gyur cing 'di ni kun tu
[\[18b.7\]]sbyor ba gsum spangs shing yongs su shes par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_the tshom mo/_/'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa byang chub pa'i mthar mi ltung ba nyid du nges pa'i chos can mchog tu thogs na
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]srid pa bdun du mi dang lha'i nang du nying mtshams sbyar nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog tu thogs na srid pa bdun zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis chos 'di rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta bar 'gyur zhing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
[\[19a.2\]]gti mug srab mor gyur cing 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis chos 'di rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis lta bar 'gyur zhing tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i
[\[19a.3\]]kun sbyor lnga spangs shing yongs su shes par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_the tshom mo/_'di ni skyes nas der mya ngan las 'das te/_
[\[19a.4\]]'jig rten 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis chos 'di rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis shin tu mthong bar gyur pa ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa dag las sems rnam par bral zhing grol bar gyur pa/_bya ba
[\[19a.5\]]byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis sems rnam par grol bar gyur to zhes bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag chos gcig mngon par shes shing yongs su ma shes na zhes bya ba la/_
[\[19a.6\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par bya yis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_bshad par bya'o/_/thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su
[\[19a.7\]]shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_dge slong dag mig mngon par shes shing yongs su shes te/_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de dag kyang mngon par shes shing yongs su shes so/_/dge slong dag_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par
[\[19b.2\]]shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de dag kyang mngon par shes shing yongs su shes te/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[19b.3\]]lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal
[\[19b.4\]]ba yang ma yin pa de yang mngon par shes shing yongs su shes te/_dge slong dag chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes na sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par nga mi smra'o/_/'di ni thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/_dge slong
[\[19b.5\]]dag thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa ji skad du bshad pa 'di ngas rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i
[\[19b.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs ngas bstan par bya yis/_legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/thams cad mngon par shes shing spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_dge slong dag mig mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar
[\[19b.7\]]bya ba dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du mngon par shes shing yongs su
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang yid mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang gi rkyen bdag
[\[20a.2\]]nyid kyi rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma spangs na sdug
[\[20a.3\]]bsngal gyi mthar byed par nga mi smra'o/_/'di ni thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/dge slong dag thams cad mngon par shes shing yongs su spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di/_/ngas
[\[20a.4\]]rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/dper na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis 'khor rnams sdud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das dgon pa'i gnas kyi bsti gnas na bzhugs te/_de nas dgon pa pa lag pa can zhes bya ba 'khor lnga brgya
[\[20a.5\]]dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang dgon pa pa lag pa can la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge bsnyen lag pa can 'khor
[\[20a.6\]]mang po dang 'dug cing nye bar gnas pa ji ltar gang gis bsdu bar bya snyam du sems/_btsun pa gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don mthun pa dang /_don spyod pa'o/_/de rnams las gang yang rung
[\[20a.7\]]zhing gang yang rung ba zhig gis bsdu bar bya snyam du sems te/_kha cig la ni sbyin pa/_kha cig la ni snyan par smra ba/_kha cig la ni don mthun pa/_kha cig la ni don spyod pas so/_/lag pa can legs so legs so/_/chos 'di dag gis 'khor sdud pa ste/_'di lta ste bsdu
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don mthun pa dang /_don spyod pa'o/_/gang kha cig chos dang mthun par 'khor sdud pa de thams cad ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'dis te/_kha cig la ni sbyin pa/_kha cig la ni snyan par smra ba/_kha cig la ni don mthun pa/_
[\[20b.2\]]kha cig la ni don spyod pas so/_/'das pa'i dus na yang gang kha cig chos dang mthun par 'khor sdud pa de thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'dis te kha cig la ni sbyin pa/_kha cig la ni snyan par smra ba/_kha cig la ni don mthun pa/_kha cig la ni don spyod pas so/_/
[\[20b.3\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gang kha cig chos dang mthun par 'khor sdud pa de thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'dis te/_kha cig la ni sbyin pa/_kha cig la ni snyan par smra ba/_kha cig la ni don spyod pa/_kha cig la ni don mthun pas so/_/sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog
[\[20b.4\]]ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/snyan pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu chos don du gnyer zhing nyan pa la dus dus su rtag tu snyan par smra bar byed pa'o/_/don spyod pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te 'di lta ste ma dad pa
[\[20b.5\]]dag dad pa phun sum tshogs par byed cing sgrub par byed/_'dul bar byed/_'god par byed/_rab tu gnas par byed/_tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par byed/_ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs par byed/_shes rab 'chal pa
[\[20b.6\]]shes rab phun sum tshogs par byed pa nas rab tu gnas par byed pa'i bar du'o/_/don mthun pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa la rgyun du zhugs pas lhan cig don mthun par byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba la lan cig phyir 'ong bas/_
[\[20b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba la phyir ma 'ong bas/_dgra bcom pa la dgra bcom pas lhan cig don mthun par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs te/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sbyin dang
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]snyan par smra ba dang /_/'di la don ni spyod pa dang /_/don mthun pa yis sems can rnams/_/ji ltar rig par de dang der/_/gal te 'di yis mi sdud na/_/ma la bu yi rgyu yis ni/_/mchod pa thob par mi 'gyur zhing /_/pha dang bu yi rgyu yis so/_/gang phyir
[\[21a.2\]]bsdu ba 'di yis ni/_/rjes su 'jug byed chos ldan pa/_/che ba'i bdag nyid thob nas ni/_/de phyir 'jig rten lta bar 'gyur/_/de nas dgon pa pa lag pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
[\[21a.3\]]phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/gzugs gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am zhes bya ba la/_dge slong dag phung po dang nye bar len pa'i phung po bstan par bya'o zhes sngar bshad pa'i mdo bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/'dod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste zhes
[\[21a.4\]]bya ba la/_mdor bsdus pa 'dod pa'i dpe ni gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te
[\[21a.5\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la legs par mdor bsdus pa de bzhin du chos bshad du gsol/_ji ltar bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mdor bsdus pa'i
[\[21a.6\]]chos thos nas gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid la gnas par bya'o/_/gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid la gnas te/_gang gi don du rigs kyi bu skra dang
[\[21a.7\]]kha spu bregs te lus la chos gos bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa mngon sum du bya ste/_rig pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das bdag la bshad du gsol zhes dge slong des de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong legs so legs so/_/dge slong 'di skad du smra ba
[\[21b.2\]]legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la legs par mdor bsdus pa de bzhin du chos bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i
[\[21b.3\]]bdag nyid la gnas par bya'o/_/gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid la gnas te gang gi don du rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te lus la chos gos bgos shing dad pas yang dag pa kho nar khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
[\[21b.4\]]byung nas bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas te/_rig pa phun sum tshogs pa bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes dge slong
[\[21b.5\]]de bzhin du smra'am/_btsun pa de bzhin no/_/dge slong de bas na legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong gang khyod ma yin pa'i chos de khyod kyis spang bar bya'o/_/don te khyod kyis spangs nas yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar
[\[21b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal lo/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ji ltar khyod kyis ngas mdor bsdus te rnam par ma phye bar bshad pa ji ltar shes/_gsol pa btsun pa gzugs bdag ma lags te/_chos de
[\[21b.7\]]spangs nas yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ma lags te/_chos de spangs na yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]gis mdor bsdus shing rnam par ma phye bar bshad pa'i don rgyas par 'tshal lo/_/dge slong legs legs so/_/dge slong ngas mdor bsdus te rnam par ma phye bar bshad pa'i don shes pa legs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong gzugs bdag ma yin te
[\[22a.2\]]chos de khyod kyis spang bar bya'o/_/chos de khyod kyis spangs na yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin te/_chos de khyod kyis spang bar bya'o/_/chos de khyod kyis spangs na yun ring po'i don dang phan
[\[22a.3\]]pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas dge slong de la bcom ldan 'das kyis mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag
[\[22a.4\]]'dis gdams pas gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid lung ston par byed do/_gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid la gnas te/_gang gi don du rigs kyi bu skra
[\[22a.5\]]dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/_bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas te/_rig pa phun sum tshogs pa
[\[22a.6\]]bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba'i shes pa dang ldan zhing tshe dang ldan pa sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/don 'di nyid phung po'i tshogs kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa
