[\[22a.7\]]gsum pa las mdo gzhan dang gzhan bdun 'di ltar 'byung ste/_rjes su mthun dang grangs dang ni/_/rgyun du sbyor dang rga ba dang /_/yongs sbyor rtog dang dro ba dang /_/sems ni rnam par grol ba dang /_/mdo sde gnyis po dag las kyang /_/rgyal ba nyid las skyes pa
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]yi/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/'dir mdor bsdus par 'dod pa'i dpe gzhan yang /_bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba 'phel ba gang bsnyen bkur ba tshe dang ldan pa grong gi bdag po rgyal ba'i bu dang lhan cig bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu bcom ldan
[\[22b.2\]]'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bslab pa'i
[\[22b.3\]]tshig brgya phyed lhag dang bcas pa ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las 'byung ste/_rigs kyi bu bdag legs su 'dod par bslab pa la shin tu bslab par bya'o/_/de la bdag bslab pa 'di la slob par mi spro'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu khyod
[\[22b.4\]]kyis dus dang dus su bslab pa gsum la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag spro'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa spro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu 'di ltar khyod kyis dus dang dus su lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la bslab par bya'o/_/lhag pa'i
[\[22b.5\]]sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la bslab par bya'o/_/rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis dus dang dus su lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la bslab cing /_lhag pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la slob par byed na yun ring po mi thogs par zag pa
[\[22b.6\]]zad cing zag pa med pa dang /_sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /_mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas shing rig pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/byed pa
[\[22b.7\]]byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu la bcom ldan 'das kyis gdams ngag 'dis gdams pa dang /_gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba med pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid lung ston par byed de/_gcig tu dben pa/_tshad med pa/_gdung ba
[\[23a.2\]]med pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid nas/_snga ma bzhin du shes pa dang ldan pa'i bar du tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba'i bu sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni gnyis te zhes bya ba la/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po chu bo sgrib pa can gyi 'dam pa can
[\[23a.3\]]gyi chu ngogs na bzhugs te/_de nas bram ze lag na dbyug pa can tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[23a.4\]]gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze dbyug pa can gyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kA t+yA ya na rgyu gang dang /_rkyen gang gis rgyal po la rgyal pos lhan cig rtsod par gyur/_zhing
[\[23a.5\]]pa la zhing pas/_bram ze la bram zes/_khyim bdag la khyim bdag gis lhan cig rtsod par gyur/_bram ze 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyus rgyal po la rgyal pos lhan cig rtsod par gyur cing
[\[23a.6\]]zhing pa la zhing pas/_bram ze la bram zes/_khyim bdag la khyim bdag gis lhan cig rtsod par gyur to/_/kA t+yA ya na 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyus rgyal po la rgyal pos
[\[23a.7\]]lhan cig rtsod cing /_zhing pa la zhing pas/_bram ze la bram zes/_khyim bdag la khyim bdag gis lhan cig rtsod par gyur na/_kA t+yA ya na rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba lhan cig rtsod par gyur/_bram ze lta ba la chags pa dang /_zhen pa
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba rnams lhan cig rtsod par gyur to/_/kA t+yA ya na lta ba la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag
[\[23b.2\]]par chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams rtsod par gyur na/_kA t+yA ya na da ltar kha cig 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyu 'di dag las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_lta ba la chags pa dang /_
[\[23b.3\]]zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyu 'di dag las 'das pa yod dam/_bram ze yod de/_'di lta ste/_bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
[\[23b.4\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/_/de 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_
[\[23b.5\]]yang dag par chags pa'i rgyu 'di dag las yang dag par 'das so/_/lta ba la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyu 'di dag las yang dag par 'das so/_/kA t+yA ya na bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma da
[\[23b.6\]]ltar gang na bzhugs/_bram ze shar phyogs kyi yul na mnyan yod ces bya ba'i ko sa la'i grong khyer na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze lag na dbyug pa can stan las langs te bla gos
[\[23b.7\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_sa'i dkyil 'khor gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs der thal mo sbyar te phyag byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di skad ched du brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa'i rgyu 'di dag las
[\[24a.2\]]yang dag par 'das shing lta ba la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'brel pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa dang /_yang dag par chags pa 'di rnams las yang dag par 'das pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod do/_/de nas bram ze dbyug pa can
[\[24a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bshad pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga' nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nyid mdo la brten te slob dpon sna tshogs blo gros [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]tshigs su bcad pa bzhi brgya pa las bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_'dod pa mi snang
[\[24a.4\]]'brel med cing /_/lta ba'i dra ba bcom gyur pa/_/de nas rtsod rtsa mi 'byung ste/_/rtsa ba med par gang las 'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/pho dang mo dag phan tshun gzugs la mngon par dga'o zhes bya ba la re rer bsdus pa las bsdus pa'i sdom gnyis pa'i mtha'i
[\[24a.5\]]mdo las 'byung ste/_de las 'di skad du 'don te/_dge slong dag ji ltar skyes bu bud med la chags pa las 'di ltar dga' ba skye ba/_'di ltar rgyags pa dang /_sred pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_chags pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_'ching ba dang /_don du gnyer ba
[\[24a.6\]]dang /_kun tu sbyor ba'i chos gcig kyang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_skyes bu bud med kyi gzugs la chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_chags zhen dang /_brgyal ba dang /_zhen pa thob pa ni skyon mi mthong zhing nges par 'byung ba mi tshol bas skyes bu bud med kyi dbang
[\[24a.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu bud med kyi gzugs la ji lta ba de bzhin du bud med skyes pa'i gzugs la yang de bzhin no/_/'dres pa zhes bya ba'i gsum pa las kyang skyes bu bud med kyi gzugs la bud med kyang skyes bu'i gzugs la ste/_gzugs ji lta ba de bzhin du
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]dri dang ro dang reg bya gsum la yang mdo rnam pa gsum mo/_/zhing dang sa bon gyi go rims lta bur bstan pa'i don du zhes bya ba la/_sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga ste zhes mdo las 'byung ste/_bde ba la phung po zhes bya ba las ngas chos gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma
[\[24b.2\]]mthong zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa las dang /_mdzod kyi gnas drug par kun 'byung gi bden pa dpyad pa las ji skad du sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas so zhes rang gi ngo bos bsdus
[\[24b.3\]]nas der 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ji skad du bshad ce na/_ji ltar ched du brjod pa bsdus pa las dang po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i mdo las 'byung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag
[\[24b.4\]]bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri lhag cig bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du thos shing bzung la/_gnyis ni dge slong dag las so/_/bdag gi tshig dum bur bzung ba ni yang dag par rjes su mi dran te/_gzhan du na dus gcig tu thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das la
[\[24b.5\]]yongs su dris te bzung ba ni bdag gis mngon par mi shes te/_gzhan du na lan cig thos pas so/_/de'i tshe yang 'di lta bu ste/_'di ltar sems kyi chos yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/kha cig chos kyi rjes su bzung zhing rtogs pa thob pa dang /_gzhan
[\[24b.6\]]yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhes mngon par mi shes te/_gzhan du na bdag nyid gdul ba'i don dang /_zhi ba'i don dang /_bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du'o/_/sems khengs pa dang zhum pa'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi shes so/_/tshangs par
[\[24b.7\]]spyod pa gzhan las lhag pa'i rgyu'i sems mngon par mi shes shing ma skyes so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di ltar bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo chos la ngo mtshar bar gyur to/_/de la re zhig lnga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_tshul khrims la sogs
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]pa'i phung po de dang de las 'don pa bzhin te/_ji ltar re zhig drug pa'i mdo'i gsum tshan gyi dang po las ji skad bshad pa lta bu ste/_chos lnga mngon sum du bya ba ni mi slob pa'i phung po lnga ste/_mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting
[\[25a.2\]]nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o/_/zad par gyi skye mched bcu po rnams ni zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu
[\[25a.3\]]po 'di rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_la la zad par sa'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes su byed cing la la zad par chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
[\[25a.4\]]dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes su byed do zhes bka' stsal to/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag
[\[25a.5\]]brgyad po 'di dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po'am ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/_gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas
[\[25a.6\]]mthong ste/_de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po kha dog bzang po dang ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/_zil gyis mnan nas
[\[25a.7\]]mthong ste/_de lta bu'i 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/_zil gyis
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]mnan nas mthong ste/_de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po kha dog bzang po dang /_ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes/_
[\[25b.2\]]zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/_de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_zar ma'i me
[\[25b.3\]]tog gam/_yul wA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis
[\[25b.4\]]gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_dong ka'i me tog gam/_yul wA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od
[\[25b.5\]]ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po
[\[25b.6\]]kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na/_ban du dzi ba ka'i me tog gam/_yul wA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol
[\[25b.7\]]gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od [(]dkor [,]dkar [)]po 'byung
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ba 'di lta ste dper na skar ma pa ba sangs lta bu'am/_yul wA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog
[\[26a.2\]]dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o zhes bka' stsal to/_nam mkha' mtha' yas la sogs pa skye mched gzhan bzhi po rnams ni zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/
[\[26a.3\]]dge slong dag skye mched ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do zhes bka' stsal to/_/skye mched 'di dag ni gnyis pa'i
[\[26a.4\]]de ma thag mdo'i dum bu rnam par dbye ba las blta bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga po zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag rnam par grol ba'i skye mched ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la ston pa'am tshangs
[\[26a.5\]]par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par byed de/_/ji lta ji ltar ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar chos rnams don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so
[\[26a.6\]]yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro/_/don so so yang dag par rig pa de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba de la rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yid dga' na lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/_/lus shin tu sbyangs na bde ba
[\[26a.7\]]myong bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba myong na ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/mnyam par gzhag pa na ji lta ba bzhin shes pa dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong na skyo
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/skyo na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang bral na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched dang po'o/_/gang las dge slong ngam dge slong ma de'i dran pa nye bar mi gnas pa dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[26b.2\]]sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/_zag pa yongs su ma zad pa yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_rjes su ma thob pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur te/_gzhan yang dge slong ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa
[\[26b.3\]]bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par mi byed mod kyi/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar mthong ba dang thob pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton byed de/_ji lta ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar mthong ba dang /_rtogs pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du byed pa de lta
[\[26b.4\]]de ltar chos rnams la don so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur ro/_/chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_don so so yang dag par rig pa de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa'i dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba de la rab tu dga'
[\[26b.5\]]ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas 'dod chags dang bral ba dang grol ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/gang la dge slong ngam dge slong ma de'i dran pa nye bar ma gnas pa dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'gyur/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa
[\[26b.6\]]mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/_zag pa yongs su ma zad pa yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_rjes su ma thob pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas
[\[26b.7\]]lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston pa yang mi byed la/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_khong du chud pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du yang mi byed mod kyi/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rnams la rgyas par yang dag par gsal bar byed de/_ji lta ji ltar thos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgyas par rab tu gsal bar byed pa de lta de ltar de dag la chos rnams la don so sor rig pa dang /_chos so sor rig par
[\[27a.2\]]'gyur te/_don so sor rig pa dang /_chos so sor yang dag par rig pa de la rab tu dga' ba skye ba nas 'dod chags dang bral ba dang grol ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/gang la dge slong ngam dge slong ma gnas pa de'i dran pa nye bar mi
[\[27a.3\]]gnas pa dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/_zag pa yongs su ma zad pa yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_rjes su ma thob pa mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang dben pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan
[\[27a.4\]]yang dge slong ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par yang mi byed/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa rgyas par kha ton du yang mi byed/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du
[\[27a.5\]]chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rab tu gsal bar yang mi byed mod kyi/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gcig tu dben par song ste/_don sems shing 'jal ba dang /_nye bar dpyod par byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar
[\[27a.6\]]thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gcig tu dben par song ste/_don sems shing 'jal ba dang nye bar dpyod par byed pa de lta de ltar chos rnams so sor rig pa dang /_don so sor rig par 'gyur te/_chos so sor rig pa
[\[27a.7\]]dang /_don so sor rig pa de la rab tu dga' ba skye ba na 'dod chags dang bral ba dang grol ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/gang las dge slong ngam dge slong ma gnas pa de'i dran pa nye bar mi gnas pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]nas rjes su ma thob pa mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang /_bde ba bla na med pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong ston pa'am tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa bla ma'i gnas lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba chos ston par yang mi byed la/_ji ltar thos pa
[\[27b.2\]]dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams rgyas par kha ton du yang mi byed la/_ji ltar thos pa dang /_ji ltar rtogs pa dang /_ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gcig tu dben par song ste/_don sems shing 'jal ba dang nye bar dpyod
[\[27b.3\]]par yang mi byed mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan bzang po gzhan dang gzhan legs par rab tu 'dzin par gyur cing shin tu yid la byed shin tu sten par byed/_shin tu rab tu 'byed par byed de/_ji lta ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan bzang po gzhan dang gzhan legs par
[\[27b.4\]]rab tu 'dzin cing shin tu yid la byed/_shin tu sten par byed/_shin tu rab tu 'byed par byed pa de lta de ltar chos rnams la don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur te/_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_don
[\[27b.5\]]so so yang dag par rig pa de la rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba nas grol ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga pa ste/_gang las dge slong ngam dge slong ma de'i dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba nas/_mya ngan las
[\[27b.6\]]'das pa grub pa dang /_bde ba bla na med pa thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/skye mched gnyis po dag ni zhes bya ba la/_rnam grangs bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i dang po'i mdo las gsungs te tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo rnam par shes pa'i gnas
[\[27b.7\]]dang /_skye mched rnam pa gnyis so/_/rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun gang zhe na/_sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_mi rnams dang lha kha cig go/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa dang po'o/_/sems
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_tshangs ris kyi lha gang dag dang por byung ba de dag go/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gnyis pa'o/_/sems can gzugs can lus gcig cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag
[\[28a.2\]]kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_'od gsal gyi lha rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa gsum pa'o/_/sems can gzugs can lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dag kyang yod de/_'di lta ste/_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa
[\[28a.3\]]bzhi pa'o/_/sems can gzugs can ma yin pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thob pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha'
[\[28a.4\]]mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa yod de/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa lnga pa'o/_/sems can gzugs can ma yin pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
[\[28a.5\]]mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa yod de/_'di lta ste/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas
[\[28a.6\]]pa drug pa'o/_/sems can gzugs can ma yin pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa yod de/_/'di lta ste/_ci yang med
[\[28a.7\]]pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba'i lha rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun pa'o/_/skye mched gnyis gang zhe na/_sems can gzugs can gang dag 'du shes med cing 'du shes med pa yod de/_'di lta ste/_'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams te/_'di ni
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]skye mched dang po'o/_/sems can gzugs can ma yin pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa yod de/_'di lta ste/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
[\[28b.2\]]du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams so/_/'di ni skye mched gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du khams mang po pa'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gcig tu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog las
[\[28b.3\]]gnas pa na 'di lta bu'i sems la sems kyi dpyod pa yongs su skyes te/_gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye zhing skye ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba skye ba 'di thams
[\[28b.4\]]cad ni byis pa rnams la skye bar 'gyur gyi/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
[\[28b.5\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gcig pu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog las mchis pa na 'di lta bu'i sems la sems kyi yongs su dpyod pa 'di lta bu
[\[28b.6\]]skyes te/_gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye zhing skye ba thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba skye zhing skye ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_/mkhas pa rnams la
[\[28b.7\]]ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba skye zhing skye ba de thams
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_'dam bu skam po 'am/_rtswa'i khyim mang po la mes bsregs pa na mthong bar mes bsregs pa de bzhin du gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye zhing skye ba de
[\[29a.2\]]thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/'das pa'i dus na gang cung zad 'jigs pa
[\[29a.3\]]skye ba de thams cad kyang byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus
[\[29a.4\]]na gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de thams cad kyang byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/gang cung zad nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba de thams cad ni byis pa rnams la skye'i/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin
[\[29a.5\]]no/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams su byis pa 'jigs pa dang bcas kyi/_mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/byis pa rnams nye bar 'tshe ba dang bcas kyi/_mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/byis pa rnams rab tu
[\[29a.6\]]'tshe ba dang bcas kyi/_mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/byis pa rnams rab tu nye bar 'tshe ba dang bcas kyi/_mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo byis pa rnams 'di lta bu'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang /_rab tu 'tshe ba dang /_nye bar rab tu 'tshe ba dang bcas par
[\[29a.7\]]'dod kyi mkhas pa rnams ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir byis pa'i chos rnams dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams rig par bya zhing byis pa dang mkhas pa'i chos rnams rig nas byis pa'i chos spang bar bya zhing mkhas pa'i chos rnams la 'jug par bya/_bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]btsun pa ji ltar na byis pa byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/_kun dga' bo phung po la mi mkhas pa dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mi mkhas pa 'di tsam gyis byis pa byis pa zhes bya ba'i
[\[29b.2\]]grangs su 'gro'o/_/btsun pa 'di tsam gyis byis pa byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis mkhas pa mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/_/kun dga' bo phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams dang skye mched la mkhas dang /_rten
[\[29b.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na khams la mkhas par 'gyur zhe na/_kun dga' bo khams bco brgyad la mkhas shing shes
[\[29b.4\]]pa dang mthong ba ste/_ji ltar gnas pa'i mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams
[\[29b.5\]]dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi
[\[29b.6\]]khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te/_khams bco brgyad po 'di rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba dang /_yang khams drug yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams
[\[29b.7\]]dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba dang /_gzhan yang khams drug yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gnod sems kyi khams dang /
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i khams dang /_gnod sems kyi khams dang /_gnod sems med pa'i khams so/_/drug po 'di dag ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams drug yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
[\[30a.2\]]shes shing mthong ste bde ba'i khams dang /_sdug bsngal gyi khams dang /_yid bde ba'i khams dang /_yid mi bde ba'i khams dang /_btang snyoms kyi khams dang /_ma rig pa'i khams te/_drug po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/yang
[\[30a.3\]]khams bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_tshor ba'i khams dang /_'du shes kyi khams dang /_'du byed kyi khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_bzhi po 'di dag ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/yang khams gsum yang dag
[\[30a.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_
[\[30a.5\]]gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_'gog pa'i khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes rab kyis shes shing mthong ngo /_/yang khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_'das pa'i
[\[30a.6\]]khams dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i khams dang /_da ltar byung ba'i khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_ngan pa'i khams dang /_bar ma'i
[\[30a.7\]]khams dang /_gya nom pa'i khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_dge ba'i khams dang /_mi dge ba'i khams dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_slob pa'i khams dang /_mi slob pa'i khams dang /_slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i
[\[30b.2\]]khams te/_gsum po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/yang khams gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams dang /_zag pa med pa'i khams te/_gnyis po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba
[\[30b.3\]]bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang khams gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ste/_'dus byas kyi khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams te/_gnyis po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ngo /_/'di tsam gyis na
[\[30b.4\]]khams la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'di tsam gyis khams la mkhas par 'gyur na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur/_kun dga' bo skye mched bcu gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa ste/_
[\[30b.5\]]mig gi skye mched dang /_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye
[\[30b.6\]]mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched dang /_skye mched bcu gnyis po 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba ste/_'di tsam gyis na skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'di tsam gyis skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur na/_btsun pa ji tsam
[\[30b.7\]]gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur/_kun dga' bo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag go rims dang go rims las bzlog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba ste/_'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
[\[31a.2\]]reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug
[\[31a.3\]]bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung zhing sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med pas 'di mi 'byung /_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/
[\[31a.4\]]'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/
[\[31a.5\]]tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga ba dang /_na ba dang 'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[31a.6\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di tsam gyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/[(]bcun [,]btsun [)]pa 'di tsam
[\[31a.7\]]gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur na btsun pa ji tsam gyis gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par 'gyur/_kun dga' bo gnas ma yin pa la gnas ma yin pa dang /_gnas la gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ste/_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]kun dga' bo gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid dang ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba 'grub par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing
[\[31b.2\]]go skabs med do/_/gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid dang ngag gis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba 'grub pa 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/
[\[31b.3\]]gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba 'grub par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go
[\[31b.4\]]skabs med de gang lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /_ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de
[\[31b.5\]]gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas
[\[31b.6\]]ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa spyod pa de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye ba 'di ni gnas ma
[\[31b.7\]]yin zhing go skabs med do/_/gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa spyod pa de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ba
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_snga phyi med par 'jig rten gcig tu 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gcig 'byung ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/
[\[32a.2\]]gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang snga phyi med par 'jig rten gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis 'byung ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing gcig 'byung ba ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs
[\[32a.3\]]med de/_bud med 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gang skyes pas byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_bud med rgyal po chen po bzhi nyid dang /_brgya byin nyid dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]tshangs pa nyid byed par 'gyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skyes pas byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma
[\[32a.5\]]yin zhing go skabs med de gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa bsams bzhin du ma gsod par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med cing so so'i skye bo ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa bsams bzhin du pha gsod
[\[32a.6\]]pa dang /_dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /_dge 'dun mthun pa 'byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/so so'i skye bo ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin
[\[32a.7\]]zhing go skabs med de/_gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa bsams bzhin du dud 'gro'i 'gro ba bsad par 'gyur ba dang /_bsams bzhin du bslab pa las 'da' ba dang /_bslab pa nyams par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_'di las phyi rol
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]pa'i yon gnas kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'di las phyi rol pa'i ston pa la dad pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag shes par bya ba shes so/_/mthong bar bya ba mthong ngo zhes gzhan dge sbyong dang bram ze la mngon du phyogs shing lta ba dang /_mngon du phyogs shing rtog
[\[32b.2\]]pa dang /_bkra shis dang dge mtshan dag la dad pa 'dzin pa dang /_srid pa brgyad pa 'grub par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing so so'i skye bo ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang sgrib pa rnam pa lnga po sems nye ba'i nyon mongs par byed
[\[32b.3\]]pa shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma spangs bar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams la sems legs par gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no/_/gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/_
[\[32b.4\]]shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i gegs su gyur pa spangs na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams la sems legs par gnas shing gnas pa 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang sgrib pa lnga po sems
[\[32b.5\]]nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/_shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i gegs kyi phyogs su gyur pa ma spangs par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams la sems legs par gnas shing gnas pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
[\[32b.6\]]bsgom pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/gnas yod de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i gegs kyi phyogs su gyur pa de spangs na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams la sems legs par
[\[32b.7\]]gnas shing gnas pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/_shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par mi 'jug
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]par byed pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems mi gnas shing mi spyod pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma bsgoms par sdug bsngal yang dag par mthar byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gnas yod de/_
[\[33a.2\]]gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa/_shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems gnas shing spyod la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms nas sdug bsngal
[\[33a.3\]]gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
[\[33a.4\]]bzhi la sems mi gnas shing mi spyod la/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma bsgoms par rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/gnas yod de/_gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung
[\[33a.5\]]bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems gnas shing spyod la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms te rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/gnas
[\[33a.6\]]ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems legs par mi gnas shing mi spyod
[\[33a.7\]]la/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ma bsgoms par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing byang chub pa 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/gnas yod de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chung bar
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems gnas shing spyod pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa 'di ni gnas yod do/_/kun dga' bo 'di
[\[33b.2\]]tsam gyis na gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'di tsam gyis gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par 'gyur na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
[\[33b.3\]]'di'i ming le'u bzhi pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos kyi me long zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/khams mang po pa'i mdo zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de'i phyir khams mang po pa'i mdo las 'di skad ces gsungs
[\[33b.4\]]so/_/bar sdom la/_khams ni bco brgyad bzhi dag dang /_/sa dang 'dod pa tshor bde dang /_/'dod pa gzugs dang 'das pa dang /_/dman dang dge ba'i khams nyid dang /_/slob pa dang ni mi slob pa/_/zag bcas zag pa med pa dang /_/'dus byas
[\[33b.5\]]'dus ma byas dag tu/_/byas nas tshoms su yang dag bstan/_/bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu/_/thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu/_/zhes bya ba la skye mched so sor bstan pa'i mdo sngar bshad pa gzhan du blta bar bya'o/_/dbang po
[\[33b.6\]]rnams ma tshang ba med cing zhan pa ma yin zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar re zhig lung ring po'i mdo las dang po yongs su nyams par brjod pa de dang de las 'don pa lta bu ste/_de las 'di ltar 'byung ste/_gal te thams cad du gzugs med pa'i khams yod na/_
[\[33b.7\]]'di ltar bdag lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur la/_gal te rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i khams med na/_'di ltar gzugs kyi khams kyi lha yid las byung ba'i gzugs can dbang po rnams ma
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]tshang ba med cing zhan pa ma yin pa/_yan lag nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog bzang po dang ldan pa/_rang gi 'od can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa/_tshe ring zhing dus yun ring du
[\[34a.2\]]gnas pa dag yongs su nyams pa na de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /_/de gsum zag bcas zag med ces bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong
[\[34a.3\]]dag zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya ste/_de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_dge slong dag mig dang gzugs dang de bzhin du mig gi rnam
[\[34a.4\]]par shes pa nas/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa nas/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_'jig
[\[34a.5\]]rten pa'i yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i bar 'di ni zag pa dang
[\[34a.6\]]bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa nas/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma
[\[34a.7\]]yin pa'i bar 'di ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag ngas khyed la zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bstan pa 'di rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nyid kyi phyir rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pa'i sa na zhes bya ba gang nas 'byung zhe na/_bye brag tu bshad pa las so/_/rtog pa med par brjod par bya/_/zhes bya ba gang nas 'byung zhe na/_chos mngon pa las so/_/mdo las 'byung ba rnams ni gzhi nyid dang /_sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du gzung
[\[34b.2\]]ba'i phyir la zhes bya ba la/_lung bar ma'i 'dun pa'i mjug thogs su glang po che'i rjes lta bu'i mdo de dang der ji ltar re zhig gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na/_gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po
[\[34b.3\]]bzhi rgyur byas pa'o/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi gang zhe na/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams so/_/sa'i khams gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sa'i khams ni gnyis te/_nang gi bdag nyid dang /_phyi rol
[\[34b.4\]]gyi ste/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams dang phyi rol gyi'o/_/nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang lus 'di la nang gi bdag nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas phyi'i bar du ste/_rlung dang rlung du gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni phyi'i
[\[34b.5\]]rlung gi khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar khams drug rnam par dbye ba'i mdo'i rjes thogs kho nar blta bar bya'o/_/mdo las ji skad du zhes bya ba la/_skye mched so sor bstan par sngar bris pa bzhin blta bar bya'o/_/'o na gang mig gi sha'i gong bu
[\[34b.6\]]la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar lag pa brdabs pa'i dpe'i mdor bstan pa bzhin no/_/dge slong dag skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing rim gyis rgyal ba'i gan du gshegs so/_/de nas
[\[34b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rdza mkhan b+harga gang na ba der nye bar gshegs te/_nye bar gshegs nas rdza mkhan b+harga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/b+harga gal te nga khyod la mi gnod na khyod kyi nang khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu nyin zhag gcig gnas so/_/lha nyid nga la mi gnod
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]mod kyi/_'di na dge sbyong zhig sngar 'ongs nas nyin zhag gcig gnas so/_/gal te tshe dang ldan pa la mi gnod na lha ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin dga' zhing bde bar bzhugs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdza mkhan b+harga'i khyim du
[\[35a.2\]]gshegs so/_/de'i tshe rdza mkhan b+harga'i khyim na tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri sngar 'ongs te nyin zhag gcig gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong gal te nga khyod la mi gnod na rdza mkhan
[\[35a.3\]]b+harga'i khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu nyin zhag gcig gnas so/_/rdza mkhan b+harga la yang lta'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa bdag la mi gnod de 'di ltar rdza mkhan b+harga'i khang pa rgya che zhing ngas rtswa'i stan bkod nas yod pas der gzhan du na ji ltar bde bar bzhugs shig_/de nas
[\[35a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das khang pa'i phyi rol tu zhabs bkrus te khang par gshegs nas rang nyid rtswa'i stan bkod pa'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas lus bsrang ste dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri yang khang pa'i phyi rol tu rkang pa bkrus
[\[35a.5\]]nas khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas rtswa'i stan bkod pa'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'jug go/_/nyin zhag de la bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri gang phal cher 'phags pa rnams kyis mi smra ba nyid
[\[35a.6\]]la gnas te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la 'di lta bur dgongs te/_rab tu byung ba 'di 'di ltar zhi bar gnas pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar ro/_/gang 'di skad bdag gis rab tu byung ba 'di la khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/_gang las rab
[\[35a.7\]]tu byung /_gang gi chos la dga' zhes dri bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong khyod kyi ston pa gang /_gang la brten te rab tu byung /_gang gi chos la dga'/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di na
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma zhes bya ba shAkya'i sras po shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs shing ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi ston
[\[35b.2\]]pa yin no/_/bdag de las rab tu byung zhing de'i chos la dga'o/_/dge slong khyod kyis ston pa mthong zhing ngo shes sam/_tshe dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/gzhan du na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
[\[35b.3\]]pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_
[\[35b.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'di bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu byung bas bdag gis 'di la chos bshad par bya'o snyam du dgongs te/_tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang
[\[35b.5\]]po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_tshangs par spyod pa/_gsal bar byed pa/_'di lta ste khams drug rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par bya'i/_de legs par rab tu nyon la
[\[35b.6\]]yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/khams drug rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_dge slong skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa yin te/_gang las yid zag pa med pa nye bar mi 'jug pa reg pa'i skye mched drug pa dang /_yid kyi nye bar
[\[35b.7\]]rgyu ba bco brgyad pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs bzhi pa yin no/_/zag pa med par 'jug na yid nye bar zhi bas rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes brjod do/_/de la 'di ni gdams pa ste/_shes rab bag med pa las bsrung ba dang /_stong pa rab tu spel ba dang /_lam bsgom
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pa pa sten pa ste/_'di ni khams drug rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mdor bstan pa'o/_/dge slong skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa cung zad brjod par bya ste/_khams drug gang zhe na/_
[\[36a.2\]]sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba ste/_dge slong skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa yin no zhes bstan pa de ngas rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/skyes bu 'di ni
[\[36a.3\]]reg pa'i skye mched drug pa yin no zhes bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa cung zad cig brjod par bya ste/_reg pa'i skye mched drug gang zhe na gzugs mthong ba'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas/_rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_
[\[36a.4\]]reg bya ste/_chos shes pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du ste/_dge slong skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug yin no zhes bstan pa de ngas rgyas par bshad do/_/dge slong skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad pa yin no zhes bstan pa de'i rgyas par
[\[36a.5\]]bshad pa cung zad cig brjod par bya ste/_yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad gang zhe na/_yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang /_yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang /_btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug go/_/yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug gang zhe na/_dge slong 'di
[\[36a.6\]]la mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas kyi gzugs rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes nas yid bde ba'i gnas kyi
[\[36a.7\]]chos rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug gang zhe na/_dge slong 'di la mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid mi bde ba'i gnas kyi gzugs rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes nas yid mi bde ba'i gnas kyi chos rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug gang zhe na/_dge slong 'di la mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas btang snyoms kyi gnas kyi
[\[36b.2\]]gzugs rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes nas btang snyoms kyi gnas kyi chos rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed do/_/dge slong de la yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu
[\[36b.3\]]ba drug dang /_yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang /_btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug po 'di dag gcig tu bsdus na yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad du 'gyur te/_dge slong skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad yin no zhes bstan pa de ngas rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/
[\[36b.4\]]dge slong skyes bu 'di ni byin gyi rlabs bzhi pa yin no zhes bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa cung zad brjod par bya ste/_byin gyi rlabs bzhi gang zhe na/_shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi
[\[36b.5\]]rlabs so/_/dge slong skyes bu 'di ni byin gyi rlabs bzhi pa yin no zhes bstan pa de ngas rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/de la 'di ni gdams pa yin te/_shes rab bag med par mi bya ba dang /_bden pa rjes su bsrung bar bya ba dang /_gtong ba rab tu spel bar bya ba dang /_
[\[36b.6\]]thar pa'i lam bsten par bya'o zhes bstan pa de'i rgyas par bshad pa cung zad cig brjod par bya ste/_dge slong ji ltar na shes rab bag med par mi bya zhe na/_dge slong 'di la lus 'di nyid kyi khams la so sor rtog ste/_lus 'di la sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[36b.7\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams yod de zhes so sor rtog go/_/sa'i khams gang zhe na/_dge slong sa'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi dang /_phyi'i ste/_nang gi sa'i khams kyang yod/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]phyi'i sa'i khams kyang yod do/_/nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_nang gi bdag nyid sra ba dang /_mkhrang bar gyur pa drung du gyur pa zin pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_rdul dang /_dri ma dang /_sha dang /_
[\[37a.2\]]rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rtsa dang /_snying dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_pho ba dang /_long ka dang /_lto ba dang /_lgang ba zhes bya ste/_gang yang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid sra ba dang /_mkhrang bar gyur pa/_drung du gyur pa zin pa 'di ni nang gi bdag
[\[37a.3\]]nyid kyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang phyi rol gyi sra ba dang /_mkhrang bar gyur pa drung du ma gyur pa ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams dang /_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
[\[37a.4\]]de dag gcig tu mdor bsdus pa 'di la khams/_khams tsam/_khams kyi rab tu dbye ba nyid du rig nas/_de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_bdag ma yin/_bdag 'di dag ma yin zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mthong nas sa'i khams la 'dod chags dang
[\[37a.5\]]bral ba 'di ni dge slong shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/chu'i khams gang zhe na/_dge slong chu'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi bdag nyid dang /_phyi rol gyi'o/_/nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams kyang yod/_phyi'i chu'i khams kyang yod do/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams gang
[\[37a.6\]]zhe na/_gang yang lus 'di la nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams mnyen pa dang /_mnyen par gyur pa drung du gyur pa zin pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mchi ma dang /_rdul dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_tshil dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad
[\[37a.7\]]kan dang /_rnag dang /_khu ba dang /_glad pa dang /_glad rgyas dang /_gci ba zhes bya ba ste gang yang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid mnyen pa dang mnyen par gyur pa drung du gyur pa zin pa 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]phyi rol gyi chu mnyen pa dang /_mnyen par gyur pa/_drung ma yin pa ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la nang gi bdag nyid kyi chu'i khams dang /_phyi rol gyi chu'i khams de dag gcig tu mdor bsdus pa 'di dag la khams/_khams tsam/_khams kyi
[\[37b.2\]]rab tu dbye ba nyid du rig na pa de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_bdag ma yin/_bdag 'di dag ma yin zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mthong nas chu'i khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral ba 'di ni dge slong shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/me'i khams
[\[37b.3\]]gang zhe na/_dge slong me'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi dang phyi rol gyi ste/_nang gi me'i khams kyang yod/_phyi rol gyi me'i khams kyang yod do/_/nang gi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang lus 'di la nang gi bdag nyid kyi me dang mer gyur pa dang /_
[\[37b.4\]]dro ba dang /_dro bar gyur pa dang /_drung du gyur pa zin pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus 'di la gdung bar byed pa dang /_yongs su gdung bar byed pa dang /_zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_bca' ba dang /_myangs pa yang dag par smin par 'gyur zhing 'ju bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba
[\[37b.5\]]dang /_gang yang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid kyi me dang mer gyur pa zin pa 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang phyi rol gyi me dang mer gyur pa/_dro ba dang dro bar gyur pa/_drung du ma gyur pa/_
[\[37b.6\]]ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de la dge slong nang gi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams dang phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi me'i khams de dag gcig tu mdor bsdus pa 'di la khams/_khams tsam/_khams kyi rab tu dbye ba nyid du rig nas de thams
[\[37b.7\]]cad bdag gi ma yin/_bdag ma yin/_bdag de dag ma yin zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mthong na sa me'i khams las [(]sams [,]sems [)]'dod chags dang bral ba 'di ni dge slong shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_dge slong
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rlung gi khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi dang phyi rol gyi ste/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams kyang yod do/_/phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams kyang yod do/_/nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_dge slong gang yang lus 'di la
[\[38a.2\]]nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung dang rlung du gyur pa zin pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams dang /_thur du 'gro ba'i rlung rnams dang /_zur la gnas pa'i rlung rnams dang /_sgal bu la gnas pa'i rlung rnams dang /_lto ba la gnas pa'i rlung rnams dang /_
[\[38a.3\]]gcod par byed pa'i rlung rnams dang /_spu gri lta bu'i rlung rnams dang /_gong bur gnas pa'i rlung rnams dang /_'dral bar byed pa'i rlung rnams dang /_sdud pa'i rlung rnams dang /_'joms par byed pa'i rlung rnams dang /_rlung 'jug par byed pa'i rlung rnams dang /_'tshem par
[\[38a.4\]]byed pa'i rlung rnams dang /_'byung ba dang rngub pa'i rlung rnams dang /_yan lag gi rjes su 'gro ba'i rlung rnams zhes bya ba ste/_gang yang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung dang rlung du gyur pa yang zhing g.yo ba drung du gyur pa zin pa 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi
[\[38a.5\]]khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/_gang yang phyi rol gyi rlung dang rlung du bgrangs pa dang /_yang zhing g.yo ba drung ma yin pa ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la gang nang gi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams dang /_
[\[38a.6\]]phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi rlung gi khams de dag gcig tu bsdus te 'di dag ni khams/_khams tsam/_khams kyi rab tu dbye ba yin zhes rig nas de thams cad bdag gi ma yin bdag ma yin/_bdag de dag ma yin zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes rab kyis mthong
[\[38a.7\]]nas rlung gi khams la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba 'di ni [(]dog [,]dge [)]slong shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/_dge slong nam mkha'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi bdag nyid dang /_phyi rol gyi ste/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]nam mkha'i khams kyang yod/_phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi nam mkha'i khams kyang yod do/_/nang gi bdag nyid kyi nam mkha'i gang zhe na/_gang yang lus 'di la nang gi bdag nyid nam mkha' dang nam mkhar bgrang ba pags pa dang sha dang /_khrag gis ma khebs shing
[\[38b.2\]]ma khyab pa ste de yang gang zhe na/_mig gi sbubs dang /_rna ba'i sbubs dang /_sna'i sbubs dang /_kha'i bu ga dang /_kha'i sgo dang /_mgrin pa dang /_mgrin pa'i rtsa zhes bya ba'am/_gang gis na zos pa de gang la gnas par byed pa/_gang gis zos pa dang /_'thungs
[\[38b.3\]]pa dang /_myangs pa dag 'og tu ltung bar byed pa dang /_gang yang lus 'di la gzhan yang nang gi bdag nyid nam mkhar bgrang ba sha dang pags pa dang khrag gis ma khebs shing ma khyab pa ste 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_phyi rol gyi bdag nyid kyi nam
[\[38b.4\]]mkha'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i dang nam mkhar gyur pa/_gzugs kyis ma khebs shing ma khyab pa ste/_'di ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong de la gang nang gi bdag nyid kyi nam mkha'i khams dang /_phyi rol gyi
[\[38b.5\]]bdag nyid kyi nam mkha'i khams de dag gcig tu bsdus te 'di dag ni khams/_khams tsam/_khams kyi rab tu dbye ba yin no zhes rig nas de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/_bdag ma yin/_bdag de dag ma yin zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab kyis
[\[38b.6\]]mthong nas nam mkha'i khams las sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa 'di ni dge slong shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gang dag khams lnga po 'di dag las 'dod chags dang bral zhing grol bar gyur la/_rnam par shes pa khyad par can dag cing nges pa rnam par
[\[38b.7\]]shes shing yongs su shes so/_/ci zhig rnam par shes she na/_bde ba rab tu shes so/_/sdug bsngal rab tu shes so/_/yid bde ba rab tu shes so/_/yid mi bde ba rab tu shes so/_/btang snyoms rab tu shes so/_/ci ltar bde ba'i tshor ba rab tu shes she na/_bde
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa las brten te 'byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba myong ba ste/_bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba na bde ba'i tshor ba myong ngo zhes ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de nas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa de nyid 'gags te/_bde ba myong bar 'gyur
[\[39a.2\]]ba'i reg pa la brten te 'byung ba'i bde ba'i tshor ba yang 'gags la nye bar zhi ba dang /_bsil bar gyur pa dang nub par gyur pa'o/_/bde ba'i tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /_yid bde ba'i tshor ba dang /_yid mi ba'i tshor ba dang /_btang snyoms
[\[39a.3\]]myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa la brten te byung ba'i btang snyoms te/_btang snyoms myong ba na btang snyoms myong ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de nas btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa de nyid 'gags te btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg
[\[39a.4\]]pa la brten te byung ba'i btang snyoms kyang 'gags la/_nye bar zhi ba dang /_bsil bar gyur pa dang /_nub par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_bde ba'i tshor ba 'di ni rgyu gang las byung /_kun 'byung gang /_skye ba gang /_gang las rab tu byung /_
[\[39a.5\]]de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bde ba'i tshor ba 'di'i rgyu ni reg pa'o/_/kun 'byung ni reg pa/_skye ba ni reg pa/_reg pa las rab tu byung ba ste/_reg pa kun 'byung bas de dang de'i tshor ba de dang de kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/reg pa 'gags pas de dang de'i tshor ba
[\[39a.6\]]de dang de 'gag par 'gyur/_nye bar zhi ba dang /_bsil bar 'gyur ba dang /_nub par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_shing gnyis 'dus shing phrad la tshogs pa las dro ba dang me 'byung bar 'gyur la/_ci ste shing gnyis ma 'dus pa'am/_gnyis po med na mi 'byung zhing /_
[\[39a.7\]]mi snang la bsil bar gyur cing /_shing ji lta ba de bzhin du reg pa kun 'byung bas de dang de'i tshor ba de dang de kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/reg pa 'gags pas de dang de'i tshor ba de dang de 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/nye bar zhi ba dang /_bsil bar 'gyur ba dang /_nub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dge slong gang gi phyir tshor ba bzhi po 'di dag las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing grol na/_de nas btang snyoms yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba khyad par can du 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_bdag gi tshor ba btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag
[\[39b.2\]]cing byang bas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/_sems de dang 'dra bar bsgoms pa dang /_de la brten te btang snyoms nye bar gnas pa dang /_de dang 'brel pa dang /_der zhen pa dang /_de'i rgyu can nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[39b.3\]]de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_sems de dang 'dra
[\[39b.4\]]bar bsgoms pa dang /_de la brtan te btang snyoms nye bar gnas pa dang /_de dang 'brel pa dang /_der zhen pa dang /_de'i rgyu can gyi yod min med min gyi skye mched la nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_gser mgar ram gser mgar gyi slob ma mkhas pa legs
[\[39b.5\]]par yongs su sbyangs pa sa le sbram shes par byas nas rgyan gang la gang byed par 'dod pa de byed de/_de gal te rna rgyan nam/_gal te mgo'i rgyan nam/_de dag gal te ska rags sam/_de gal te mgul rgyan nam/_de gal te sor mo'i rgyan nam/_gser
[\[39b.6\]]ram dngul gyi phreng ba byed na/_de de dang de la dal bus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi tshor ba btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas te/_sems de dang 'dra bar bsgoms pa dang /_de
[\[39b.7\]]la brten te btang snyoms nye bar gnas pa dang /_de dang 'brel pa dang /_der zhen pa dang /_de'i rgyu can nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi tshor ba btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar gnas te/_sems de dang 'dra bar bsgoms pa dang /_de la brten te btang snyoms nye bar gnas pa dang /_de dang 'brel pa
[\[40a.2\]]dang /_der zhen pa dang /_de'i rgyu can gyi yod min med min skye mched la nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_gang tshor ba btang snyoms nam mkha' yas skye mched la brten te gnas pa de yang 'dus byas/_'dus byas gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga'
[\[40a.3\]]bar bya ba 'am/_mngon par brjod pa 'am/_zhen pa dang /_rab tu zhen cing gnas par bya ba ma yin no zhes rab tu rig nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_gang tshor ba btang snyoms rnam
[\[40a.4\]]shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la brten te gnas pa de yang 'dus byas te/_'dus byas gang yin pa de ni mngon par dga' bar bya ba'am/_mngon par brjod pa'am/_zhen pa'am/_rab tu
[\[40a.5\]]zhen cing gnas par bya ba ma yin no zhes rab tu rig nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la sems 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'di ni shes rab bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gang gi phyir skye mched bzhi po 'di dag las sems 'dod
[\[40a.6\]]chags dang bral zhing grol bar gyur na/_de sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa dngos po 'am dngos po med par mi phyed de/_lus kyi mthar rig cing tshor ba na/_lus kyi mthar rig cing tshor ba'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/'tsho ba'i mthar rig cing tshor ba na 'tsho
[\[40a.7\]]ba'i mthar rig cing tshor ba'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/lus zhig ste shi ba'i mthar 'di thams cad rig ste/_thams cad ma lus par 'gags pa thams cad ma lus par nub pa/_yongs su zad cing byang bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na til mar dang
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]sdong bu las sgron ma 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de la kha cig gis dus dus su til mar gyis ma gsos shing sdong bu la nye bar ma bsdus na sgron ma'i nye bar len pa 'gags pas myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de lus kyi mthar rig cing tshor ba na/_lus kyi mthar
[\[40b.2\]]rig cing tshor ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la/_'chi ba'i mthar rig cing tshor ba na 'tsho ba'i mthar rig cing tshor ba'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/_lus zhig ste shi ba'i mthar 'di thams cad rig ste/_thams cad ma lus par 'gags pa ma lus
[\[40b.3\]]par nub pa/_yongs su zad cing yongs su byang bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mthong zhing de ltar shes na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur la/_srid pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
[\[40b.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong shes rab rnams kyi nang nas mchog ni zag pa zad pa'o/_/de'i phyir de dang ldan pa'i dge slong shes rab kyi
[\[40b.5\]]byin gyi rlabs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rnam par grol ba bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong brdzun pa'i mchog ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos so/_/dge slong bden pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_ji lta ba nyid do/_/de'i
[\[40b.6\]]phyir de dang ldan pa'i dge slong bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'di nye bar len pa ni sngon gyi mi mkhas shing mi shes pa las nye bar len par 'gyur te/_de med na de'i dus na mi sdug pa dang yid du mi 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong stong
[\[40b.7\]]pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog ni 'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba/_srid pa zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_de'i phyir de dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs mchog dang ldan par
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'dod chags nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las sems rnam par ma grol ba/_zhe sdang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_gti mug nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las sems rnam par ma grol ba 'di dag dge slong 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ma
[\[41a.2\]]lus par spangs nas nges par 'byung ba bral ba zad pa 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa rab tu zhi ba nub pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong mchog tu nye bar zhi ba ni 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ma lus par spangs pa/_nges par 'byung ba/_bral
[\[41a.3\]]ba zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa rab tu zhi ba nub pa ste/_de'i phyir de dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni nye bar zhi ba mchog gi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bdag ces bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_nga'i bdag ces bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_
[\[41a.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_gzugs med par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba
[\[41a.5\]]'di ni mi brtan pa/_'du shes 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_'du shes med 'du shes med min 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mi brtan pa/_dge slong mi brtan pa ni nad/_mi brtan pa ni 'bras/_mi brtan pa ni zug rngu/_mi brtan pa ni sdug bsngal
[\[41a.6\]]gyi rtsa ba yin no zhes rnam par shes nas dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas brtan pa'i sems kyis phal cher gnas par bya'o/_/ji ltar mi brtan pa de bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_spros pa dang /_'dus byas yin no/_/dge slong bdag ces bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur
[\[41a.7\]]pa/_nga'i bdag ces bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_bdag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_bdag 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_gzugs med par 'byung bar
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_'du shes 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa/_'du shes med 'du shes med min 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni sred par gyur pa ste/_dge
[\[41b.2\]]slong sred pa ni nad/_sred pa ni 'bras/_sred pa ni [(]zung [,]zug [)]rngu/_sred pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba yin no zhes rnam par shes nas dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas sred pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis phal cher gnas par bya'o/_/dge slong mi brtan pa dang /_rab
[\[41b.3\]]tu shes pa dang /_spros pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_sred par gyur pa 'di dag ma lus par spangs na nges par 'byung ba dang bral ba dang /_zad pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nub pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[41b.4\]]dge slong thub pa zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang /_rga ba med pa dang /_'chi ba med pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di nyid rgyu dang /_rkyen med pas skye ba med pa'o/_/ma skyes pa
[\[41b.5\]]na gang las rga bar 'gyur zhing /_ma rgas na gang las 'chi bar 'gyur la/_'chi ba med na gang las zhe sdang bar 'gyur zhing /_zhe sdang med na gang las chags par 'gyur la/_rgas pa med na gang las yongs su gdung bar 'gyur zhes bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs
[\[41b.6\]]par spyod pa bstan to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes de nyid so sor rang gi rig pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu shes so/_/dge slong khams drug rab tu rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang
[\[41b.7\]]po tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa gsal bar byed pa'i chos bshad par bya'o zhes khams rab tu dbye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/chos kyi rnam
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]grangs 'di bstan pa na tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa skyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa phur skar sa ri chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos khong du chud nas the tshom
[\[42a.2\]]las brgal zhing /_som nyi las rgal te/_gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom
[\[42a.3\]]ldan 'das ji ltar byis pa dang /_ji ltar rmongs pa dang /_ji ltar mi gsal ba dang /_ji ltar mi mkhas pa bdag gis ston pa la tshe dang ldan pa zhes yang dag par brjod pa ni sdig pa bgyis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa sdig pa bgyis so/_/btsun pa de la sdig par
[\[42a.4\]]'tshal zhing /_sdig par khums la sdig pa la sdig par 'dzin pas thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_dge slong khyod bden te/_ji ltar byis pa dang /_ji ltar rmongs pa dang /_ji ltar mi gsal ba dang /_ji ltar mi mkhas pas ston pa la tshe dang ldan pa zhes brjod pa
[\[42a.5\]]ni sdig par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gang gi phyir sdig par shes shing sdig par mthong ba dang /_sdig pa bshags shing phyis mi byed pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'dod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong gang 'ga' zhig sdig
[\[42a.6\]]par shes shing sdig par mthong la sdig pa bshags shing phyis mi byed pa'i sdom pa 'dzin na dge ba'i chos rnams mi nyams shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par brjod cing /_
[\[42a.7\]]yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]kyi zhabs drung nas log ste/_ring po ma lon par ba be'u gzhon nu ma yod pa zhig gis 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur to/_/de 'chi ba'i dus na dbang po rnams rab tu gsal bar gyur/_bzhin yongs su dag par gyur/_pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to/_/de nas
[\[42b.2\]]nyin zhag de nyid kyi snga dro dge slong rab tu mang po chos gos bgos khar gsil thogs te rgyal po'i khabs tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i dge slong mang po de dag gis 'di skad du thos te/_bcom ldan 'das rdza mkhan b+harga'i
[\[42b.3\]]khang pa na tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri khams drug rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis btul cing bkod la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung nas log ste ring po ma lon par ba be'u gzhon nu 'brangs pa zhig gis 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur te/_de 'chi ba'i dus na dbang po
[\[42b.4\]]rnams yongs su gsal bar 'gyur/_bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag par 'gyur/_pags pa yongs su dkar bar gyur zhes rgyal po'i khabs kyi bsod snyoms pa rnams kyis thos te/_zas kyi bya ba byas nas/_de 'og tu lhung bzed gyu ste/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos
[\[42b.5\]]rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas rkang pa bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di
[\[42b.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag snga dro chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis 'di skad thos te/_tshe dang ldan pa phu
[\[42b.7\]]skar sa ri bcom ldan 'das rdza mkhan b+harga'i khang pa na tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri khams drug rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis brtul cing bkod pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung nas log ste/_ring po ma lon par ba be'u gzhon nu 'brangs pa zhig gis 'tsho ba dang
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]phral bar gyur te/_de 'chi ba'i dus na dbang po rnams yongs su gsal bar gyur/_bzhin yongs su dag par gyur/_pags pa'i mdog yongs su dkar bar gyur/_ces thos so/_/btsun pa de'i 'gro ba ni ci zhig yin/_'jig rten pha
[\[43a.2\]]rol ni ci zhig yin/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de'i skye ba ni 'gag pa ste/_chos rnams la chos rnams rjes su rab tu shes te/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbang du byas nas nga la gnod par 'gyur ba ma byas te/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
[\[43a.3\]]pa'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa phu skar sa ri lung bstan nas dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dga' zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo /_/'du shes dang
[\[43a.4\]]sems pa'i chos de dag ni sems las byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma chos sbyin gyi mdo sngar bris pa bzhin blta bar bya'o/_/yang nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gsum pa'i mdo las tshe dang ldan pa bde byed kyis ji skad bstan
[\[43a.5\]]pa bzhin te/_gzhan yang mdo de dang de las 'don pa lta bu'o/_/sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mdo sde mang po las 'byung ste/_ci lta re zhig rnam grangs rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
[\[43a.6\]]pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'i mdo las/_ji ltar na dge slong sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas she na/_dge slong 'di la sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sems 'dod chags dang bcas so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[43a.7\]]sems 'dod chags dang bral ba la sems 'dod chags dang bral lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang rnam par
[\[43b\]]
