[\[83a.3\]]skabs gzhan thob kyang rjes su gnang ba ma thob nas rim gyis srung ma rnams snyom las byed par gyur pa'i tshe gnyen dang khyim spangs te/_gang dang gang na bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa/_gzhan gang yang rung ba dge slong dag bzhugs pa'i
[\[83a.4\]]sa de dang der song ngo /_/de dang der bdag nyid kyi dgos pa smras pa dang /_pha dang mas ma gnang bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug cing yon tan gyi tshogs su gyur pa'i rab tu byung ba ma rnyed par sems la bsams te/_skye ba 'di la bdag gi dka' bla yis rab tu byung
[\[83a.5\]]ba ma thob kyis skye ba gzhan du yang 'di dag nga'i bar chad du ma gyur cig ces gang shi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i rgyus smon lam sngon du btang ste bdag nyid gtang bar bya'o zhes de dug zos kyang ma shi'o/_/mtshon gyis gtubs kyang ma chod cing /_g.yang du
[\[83a.6\]]mchongs pa dang /_ri dang glang po smyon pa dang /_gang 'brog dgon par lcug mas bdag nyid bcings pa dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa srog gi bar chad du ma las 'das te gshin rje'i mche ba'i bar du zhugs par ma gyur nas dbugs dron mo ring po 'byin zhing 'dug go/_/yang
[\[83a.7\]]smras pa/_gang las lha dang lha min mi yi 'jig rten sdug bsngal thob/_/'jig rten gsum kun ring na gnas kyang drung du drangs te 'joms/_/de ni bdag gis mdza' grogs bzhin du btsal kyang ma rnyed pa/_/'chi la 'chi ba gzhan zhig yod dam cis na mi mngon 'gyur/_/yang
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]'di snyam du rnam pa thams cad du 'chi ba'i thabs khyad par can gzhan zhig yod kyis da ni de brtsam par bya ste/_rgyal po'i khab tu song la gzhan gyi rdzas ma byin par blangs na de'i 'bras bu gnas par 'gyur te/_ma ga d+ha de na rgyal po ma skyes dgra chad pa drag po byed pa yod de/_des thos nas
[\[83b.2\]]rkun ma zhes mthar byed cing gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes de rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas skye bo mang pos mthong ba nyid du rku bar brtsams pa dang /_rkun ma rkun ma zhes srung ma rnams kyis bdag len bzung ste/_lha 'di ni rjes su mi mthun zhing grong khyer gyi rkun ma ste/_rgyal
[\[83b.3\]]po'i khab kyi phyug po rnams ltogs par byed pa/_yid ches pa rnams yid mi ches par skyed par byed pa yin no zhes rgyal po la phul lo/_/de yang rgyal pos khyod rkun ma yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_des yin no zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rgyal po'i khab kyi chad pa drag cing
[\[83b.4\]]che ba ma thos sam/_zhes smras pa/_ma thos pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang /_mi rigs pa la chags pa dang /_/de la 'jigs par mi gzung bas/_/des na bdag gi 'jigs med par/_/rkun ma bya bar brtsams pa yin/_/zhes pa dang /_lha 'on kyang /_gang la gang zhig mngon
[\[83b.5\]]'dod pa'i/_/dngos po de la de sbyar bya/_/nyid ni srung bar 'dod pa ste/_/bdag ni rku bar 'dod pa yin/_/de nas rgyal pos spos kyi glang po che smyos pa'i rdul gyi dri bsnam zhing yang dag par tshor ba shin tu khro bzhin du khro ba'i snyigs mas bzhin bsgyur te/_gang gA len pa
[\[83b.6\]]khang pa der sdigs mdzub gtad de smin ma khro gnyer bskyed de/_gshed ma la tshig 'di skad du sdig pa byed pa 'di nyes par spyod pa 'di myur du rgyal po'i khab pa thams cad kyis thos par gsal shing la bskyon cig ces bka' stsal to/_/gshed ma'i skyes bu de dag gis ka ra bI
[\[83b.7\]]ra'i me tog mgul bar btags te/_gsal shing bstan pa dang /_rgya che zhing mtho ba phrag pa la bkal te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dus dang /_'dun sa dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_ra ba tha dad pa du ma rnams su thos par/_kye mi dag 'di ni rkun ma ste me tog
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]nang gi sbrul nag po ltar phyug po thams cad dbul por byed pa rgyal po'i chos lugs las 'das te rgyal po'i bka' lung gis sdig pa byed pa 'di gsal shing la bskyon pa khyod cag ltos shig ces smras so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin bzangs dag myur
[\[84a.2\]]bar gsal shing gi rtse mo la rgyal po'i bka' lung sgrubs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_rim pa 'di lta bus bya ba brtson pa ma yin nam/_des yang smras pa/_'chi ba'i gegs su mi 'gyur bar myur du gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod gson po'i don du rkun ma
[\[84a.3\]]byed pa ma yin nam ji ltar na 'tsho ba yongs su btang bar lan mang du sems sam/_des smras pa/_'gro ba 'di las gzhan med do/_/yang smras pa/_bud med byis pa gzhon nu rgan pa lang tshor babs mdun du/_/rkun ma nyid du rig par byas shing dpung pa rab tu bcings
[\[84a.4\]]nas su/_/rgyal pos gsad par bka' lung stsal ba khyod kyi lag gnas pa/_/'chi bdag yul las 'gro ba gzhan med 'di ni nges pa yin/_/phan tshun du smras pa/_'di ni ma ga d+ha'i yul pa thams cad kyi rdzas 'phrog par nus so/_/ci ste zhe na/_'tsho ba la yang ltos med
[\[84a.5\]]par/_/gzu lums su ni 'jug pa'i mi/_/'di la bsod nams yang na ni/_/rtogs par bya ba cung zad med/_/kwa'e sdig pa spyod pa bdag cag gis gsad par bya ba ni mang du mthong ste/_kha cig myos 'gyur 'dod cing gzhan dag zas la gzhan ni chu/_/gzhan ni gnyen 'dun
[\[84a.6\]]mthong ba'i bde ba 'dod cing gzhan ni tshang /_/gsad bya'i skye bo phal cher gzhan ni skad cig gson ngas tshol/_/khyod ni srog nyams 'dod pa 'di ci rnam pa 'di gang las/_/des smras pa/_gang gi gang la yang dpal du rtogs pa des de don du gnyer bar byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten
[\[84a.7\]]gyi lugs yin la/_bdag kyang 'chi ba la dpal du rtogs nas don du gnyer ba yin gyis/_myur du bdag gi yid la re zhing don du gnyer ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig_/gzhan du na bdag rkun ma zhes bstan pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/yang smras pa/_gsal shing la
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]bskyon skra grol lus las khrag 'dzag cing /_mig gi 'bras bu bya rog gis bton 'og tu 'dzag pa dang /_spyang ki kang ka stag gis sha dang khrag dag yongs su bgrod gyur nas/_/srog gi sbyin pa btang ste dur khrod gnas su bdag srog dor ba ltos/_/de dag phan tshun du brtags
[\[84b.2\]]te smras pa/_rnam pa du ma'i brjod pa 'di ni ngo mtshar te/_slar rgyal pos ma thos kyi bar du bdag cag gis de gsal shing la bskyon par mi nus so/_/de nas gshed ma'i skyes bu zhig log ste rgyal po la zhus so/_/rgyal pos bkug nas dris pa/_khyod kyis 'di skad du brjod pa
[\[84b.3\]]bden nam/_des lha mad lags so zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shi ste don ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gson bzhin ston pa ma thob na/_/shi nas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/_/gang
[\[84b.4\]]las nges pa 'di skyes pa/_/ci yi don du bden par smros/_/des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gal te bdag smra na rab tu byung ba'i phyir bdag shi bar 'dod do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis go rims bzhin du ma bstan gyis/_de ji ltar go rims bzhin du rgyas par smros
[\[84b.5\]]shig_/des ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du rang gi gtam rgyas par smras nas gsol pa/_lha gzigs mdzod cig_/gang las srog 'byin la sogs thub pa sdug bsngal myong gyur pa/_/de yi thams cad gzhan don bcas shing rang min gzhan don 'jug_/de ltar rig kyang
[\[84b.6\]]gang zhig bka' la gnas par mi byed pa/_/'du shes med cing rtswa phung dang 'dra sa yi khur bur zad/_/ston pa zhir gshegs de'i tshogs ri mo 'drar thar gyur pa'i lam/_/de yi go 'phang sems rmongs 'phel bas gtums shing sgrib pa na/_/phan pa ji ltar bya bar nus zhes de
[\[84b.7\]]ltar nges pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa ji srid lta ba'i sgra 'di stobs med bya/_/gang zhig ngan 'gro sna tshogs bdag nyid gang du bkod pa dang /_/gnas gtsang spangs pa'i bde 'gror yun ring ma skyes gang zhig yod/_/rnam mang gnas su byung bar ma gyur sems can gang zhig yod/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]blo ldan rang gzhan de ltar mthong ba 'gro ba'i phra rgyas 'grol/_/rgyal pos de'i tshig thos nas pad+ma'i sbubs ltar ngo mtshar ba'i spyan gyis smras pa/_kye bdag gi gzu lums su dpyad pa sngon du ma btang bar gshed ma las bka' lung stsal to/_/phyir rgol
[\[85a.2\]]smra bar gyur pa sna tshogs kyi/_/las dang 'bras bu lkog gyur ma mthong ngam/_/khyod kyis bden pa mthong bar gyur tam ci/_/thub ces the tshom bsams pa 'di cis 'phangs/_/sems la sangs rgyas rjes su dran bcas khyod bsad cing /_/'jig rten gnod bcas bdag gi
[\[85a.3\]]'gro ba gang zhig 'gyur/_/bu gcig dga' bar mdzod cig sems dang bka' yis gnod bsal te/_/rim gyis lung bstan rab byung dngos po thob la shes par 'gyur/_/gsad bya gsad bya ma yin gnod dang zhi 'bras bka' lung can/_/'di la pha dang ma bzhin rgyal 'bangs
[\[85a.4\]]kun la mnga' bdag ste/_/khyod ni nga yi srog sbyin pa yi bu yi mchog yin te/_/rjes su gnang nas rab byung zhi thob the tshom ma byed cig_/bu mthong ngam/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje mchog gi spyod pa sna tshogs mnga' ba/_/bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[85a.5\]]khams dang /_rang bzhin dang /_dbang po yongs su smin pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_dus dang dus ma yin pa'i gnas skabs la ltos nas gdul bya la 'jug ste/_nga 'di snyam du khyod la rnam par smin pa nges pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa yod pas thugs rjes btang snyoms su mdzad do/_/
[\[85a.6\]]zhes dgongs so/_/drang srong chen po gang la dus min dang /_/snod min mi 'bab btang snyoms mi mdzad pa/_/de'i phyir rnam pa 'dis ni btang snyoms mdzad/_/dus dang snod dang phan par gzigs nas gsung /_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bos te smras pa/_rgyal po'i khab
[\[85a.7\]]pa rnams la 'di rgyal po'i bu yin no zhes thos par gyis shig_/de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i bu la 'os pa'i gos dang /_rgyan dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_bran la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rgyal po la 'os pa'i
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]glang po che la bskyon nas grong khyer du bos pa/_ya mtshan can dang /_thos pa dang bcas pa khyed rnams nyon cig_/'di ni yul bA rA Na sI'i phyug po'i bu gang gA len zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar 'dod pa na pha dang ma las gnang ba ma thob nas
[\[85b.2\]]bdag ci nas 'jig rten pha rol du thob par 'gyur zhes de 'chi ba'i thabs gzhan rtog nas rkun mar bstan te bsad par bka' lung stsal pa 'di ltar rigs gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa'i rtog mthu'i che ba'i bdag nyid sa chen po'i thig le gcig pa rgyal bar bya ba las rnam par
[\[85b.3\]]rgyal ba'i lha ma skyes dgra'i sras su skyes so zhes thos par byas te/_dga' ba dang skyo ba yang dag par skyes pa mang po phyi nas 'brang zhing mdun du byas te/_rgyal pos gnang nas smyug ma'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ngo /_/de der sngon gyi dus su byas pa'i rgyus bar chad thams cad
[\[85b.4\]]zad cing nye bar grol te/_thob par rigs pa rab tu byung ba phun sum tshogs pa thob bo/_/de rab tu byung ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas yid la byed pa phung po dang khams rab tu rnam par dbye ba rtog pa'i rim gyis kun tu sbyor ba dang /_'ching ba dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs
[\[85b.5\]]pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa thams cad kyi lcags sgrog gi 'ching ba shes rab kyi ral gris yang dag par bcad nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi che ba'i che bar mchod par bya ba 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/'dir mdor bsdus te brjod kyi/_rgyas
[\[85b.6\]]par ni rtogs pa brjod pa brgya'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'i brgyad pa las blta bar bya'o/_/tshang dpon gyi bu grags pa gzhon nu zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na grags pa mchog gi rigs
[\[85b.7\]]kyi bu zhig yod de/_nyin par bud med kyi rol mos rtse zhing dga' la yongs su spyod pa lus chad cing lus ngal te lus lci bar gyur pas gnyid log par gyur to/_/bud med de dag kyang lus chad cing lus ngal te lus lci bar gyur pas gnyid log par gyur to/_/grags pa mchog gi
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]rigs kyi bus bud med de dag sgren mor kha chu 'dzag pa skra grol ba lag pa dag g.yengs pa gzhan dang gzhan gyi brdol smras byed pa dag mthong nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor de dag la dur khrod kyi 'du shes byung bar gyur te/_de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon
[\[86a.2\]]nu mal stan chen po las babs te/_brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis gon nas btsun mo'i grong gi sgo khang gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas/_kye grogs po dag bdag ni rab tu gtses so/_/bdag ni nye bar gtses so zhes 'o dod bos pas mi ma
[\[86a.3\]]yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye nas sgra mi thos par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu tshong dus kyi sgo gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas kye grogs po dag bdag ni rab tu gtses so bdag ni nye bar gtses so zhes 'o dod bos pas de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis sgo
[\[86a.4\]]phye ste sgra mi grags par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu grong khyer gyi sgo gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas/_kye grogs po dag bdag ni rab tu gtses so/_/bdag ni nye bar gtses so zhes 'o dod bos pa de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye ste sgra mi
[\[86a.5\]]thos par byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram gang na ba der nye bar song ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram/_phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing 'chag nas bzhugs pas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu rgyang ring po nas
[\[86a.6\]]'ong ba gzigs shing rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nus kyang bcom ldan 'das chu bo sgrib med kyi phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing 'chag par mthong nas dge sbyong bdag ni gtses so/_/kye dge sbyong bdag ni rab tu gtses so zhes 'o dod bos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[86a.7\]]rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye gzhon nu tshur shog_/'di na nye bar 'tshe ba med pa dang nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas yod do/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nus brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham zung dag chu bo sgrib med kyi ngos su bor nas
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]chu bo rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu dang gtsug lag khang gang na ba der nye bar gshegs te/_nye bar
[\[86b.2\]]gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang
[\[86b.3\]]ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi dus kyi rgyu chos kyi gtam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul
[\[86b.4\]]khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams ro chung zhing nyes dmigs mang ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_thar pa dang /_dben pa dang /_bsngags pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs rgyas par yang dag par gsal
[\[86b.5\]]bar mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos bstan pa shes par nus shing rig pa
[\[86b.6\]]de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'khor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang lam ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rgyas par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do/_/'di lta ste/_gos dri
[\[86b.7\]]ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa gtso blag mkhan gyi lag tu gtad na yang dag par tshon 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu stan la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs te/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]'gog pa dang /_lam mo/_de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos rtogs pa dang /_chos la the tshom dang yid gnyis dang bral ba/_gzhan gyi rkyen gyis bkri bar bya ba ma yin pa/_ston pa
[\[87a.2\]]gzhan gyis bstan pa'i dring mi 'jog pa/_chos la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so/_/rab tu 'phags so/_/
[\[87a.3\]]des na bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng nas gzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su 'gro zhing mngon par dang ngo /_/de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas gzhan zhig
[\[87a.4\]]gnyid sad de bltas pa na grags pa gzhon nu rang gi mal stan chen po la mi snang ba mthong nas khyim bdag rigs mchog gi khang pa gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas khyim bdag rigs mchog la 'di skad ces kye jo bo grags pa gzhon nu rang gi mal stan chen po la mi snang ba
[\[87a.5\]]mkhyen par mdzod cig_/ces smras so/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'di snyam du ci grags pa gzhon nu rkun ma'am g.yon can gyis nor gyi phyir phyi rol du khyer bar ma gyur ram snyam du rig par byas nas/_pho nya rta pa bzhi brdzangs so/_/rang nyid lag na mar me thogs pa'i
[\[87a.6\]]skyes bu dang lhan cig chu bo sgrib med gang na ba der nye bar song nas/_khyim bdag rigs mchog gi chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham zung cig bzhag pa mthong nas de yang 'di snyam du ci gzhon nu 'di rkun ma'am g.yon can gyis nor gyi phyir phyi rol du khyer bar ma
[\[87a.7\]]gyur te/_'di lta ste chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis po bzhag pas so/_/gzhon nu 'jug ngogs 'di nyid nas chu bo sgrib med brgal bar gyur te/_'di lta ste chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis po 'di bzhag par byas
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]so zhes rig par byas nas 'jug ngogs de nyid nas chu bo sgrib med brgal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'ong ba gzigs nas 'di snyam du gzhon nu 'di stan 'di la 'dug bzhin du
[\[87b.2\]]mi mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grags pa gzhon nu stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du khyim bdag rigs mchog gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
[\[87b.3\]]'du mdzad do/_/de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das grags pa gzhon nu gang du song ba gzigs lags sam/_khyim bdag 'dug cig dang stan
[\[87b.4\]]'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod de/_de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'di snyam du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur ram snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag des na gang gi
[\[87b.5\]]tshe stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/_/de de ltar rig nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[87b.6\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs mchog chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam
[\[87b.7\]]par dag pa skyes so/_/grags pa gzhon nu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de slar brtul te/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]brgyan par byas kyang chos spyod cing /_/dul bsdams tshangs par spyod gyur cing /_/sems can kun la dbyug pa spangs/_/bram ze dge sbyong dge slong de/_/de'i tshe na dgra bcom pa drug yod la bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das yin no/_/khyim bdag rigs
[\[88a.2\]]mchog gis grags pa gzhon nu stan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ste/_grags pa gzhon nu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu ma lus ngal ba dang /_lus chad pa dang /_smre sngags 'don par 'gyur gyis khyim du 'dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs
[\[88a.3\]]mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang gis mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po mngon par rtogs kyang khyim gyi gnas su 'dug cing yongs su bsags pa'i 'dod pa la longs spyod
[\[88a.4\]]dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/ji ltar khyim bdag khyod slob pa'i ye shes dang /_slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs
[\[88a.5\]]so/_/btsun pa grags pa gzhon nus thob pa legs par thob ste/_mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das grags pa gzhon nu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong dang rigs mchog gi khyim gang
[\[88a.6\]]na ba der gshegs pa thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag rigs mchog la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
[\[88a.7\]]phyag byas te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag de nyid kyi snga dro chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong grags pa gzhon nu dang khyim bdag rigs mchog gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/_/de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dang gnyis pa mdun na gnas ma zhes bya ba lam gyi bar na bcom ldan 'das nam gshegs zhes sems shing 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang /_mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ste/_mthong nas
[\[88b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs sam/_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
[\[88b.3\]]grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo gnyis po chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
[\[88b.4\]]zhes bya ba nas/_rgyas par ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs te/_snga ma bzhin du skyabs su song zhing sems mngon par btang ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la
[\[88b.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/de nas btsun pa 'dir zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo gnyis po chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo
[\[88b.6\]]gnyis po chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa grags pa gnyis bde bar zhugs par rig nas/_gtsang zhing gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas [(]'drim [,]'brim [)]zhing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das gtsang zhing gya nom
[\[88b.7\]]pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas tshim par brims par rig cing /_lhung bzed gyu ba dang /_stan dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo gnyis po chen
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]mo dang /_mdun gnas ma gnyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/_yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/mi ma
[\[89a.2\]]yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye zhing sgra mi thos par byas te/_'di 'ga' zhig gis kyang bsad par ma nus te/_skye ba tha ma pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'tsho byed kyang mas sgrom bur bcug ste rgyal po'i sgor skyur ba las bden pa mthong bar rig pas ma shi zhes gtam rgyud rgyas
[\[89a.3\]]par 'dul ba las gos kyi gzhir blta bar bya'o/_/sogs pa'i sgras b+ha ba lo ba da ka la sogs pa srid pa tha ma pa bden pa mthong bar rigs pa dag las g.yang sar skyur yang ma shi bar dper byas pa ste/_de nyid kyi phyir ji skad bshad pa thams cad bsdu ba'i
[\[89a.4\]]don du srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang zhes smos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yum de'i lhums na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang lha'i mthus rmad du byung ba'i sems can ma'i mngal du zhugs pa la ji skad du/_ma ni bde
[\[89a.5\]]zhing sems la sdig bral dang /_/skyes pa gzhan la 'dod pa med par 'gyur/_/khyim gyi phyogs bzhir lag na mtshon thogs pa'i/_/lha rnams bsrung ba'i don du khyab cing gnas/_/zhes bya'o/_/yang ci'i phyir mdo las btsun pa zhes bya ba ni lus thob pa
[\[89a.6\]]ni rnam pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar gyi skabs su bris zin to/_/bde ba skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/[ (]gling [,]gleng [)]gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/bde ba skye ba ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'di dag gis lus dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
[\[89a.7\]]bde bas mngon par tshim zhing yongs su dga' bas yongs su khyab ste gnas so/_/de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad du mi gsal ba dang ma khyab pa cung zad kyang med de/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshe ring zhing
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams te/_'di ni bde ba skye ba dang po yin no/_/'di dag ni lus ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba mngon par tshim zhing yongs su tshim la yongs su dga' bas
[\[89b.2\]]yongs su khyab ste gnas so/_/de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad du mi gsal ba dang ma khyab pa cung zad kyang med de/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshe ring zhing dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag yod de/_
[\[89b.3\]]'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams te/_'di ni bde ba skye ba gnyis pa yin no/_/'di dag ni lus dga' ba med pa'i bde bas mngon par tshim zhing yongs su tshim la/_yongs su dga' bas yongs su khyab ste gnas so/_/de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad du
[\[89b.4\]]mi gsal ba dang ma khyab pa cung zad kyang med de/_dga' ba med pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing tshe ring zhing dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag yod de/_'di lta ste dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/_'di ni bde ba skye ba gsum pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/sems
[\[89b.5\]]can lus tha dad pa dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun du blta bar bya zhing /_bcu las 'phros pa las 'don pa lta bu dang /_'di nyid du mdzod kyi gnas dang por/_de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par/_/zhes bya bar skye mched
[\[89b.6\]]gnyis po zhes bya ba'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no/_/mdo las gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas 'dus byas su mtshon
[\[89b.7\]]par byed pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no/_/'jig pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur bar yang mngon no/_/'dus ma byas ni skye bar mi mngon zhing 'jig pa dang gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur bar mi mngon no zhes bka' stsal to/_/dper na
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]skye ba'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig pa zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la/_ji skad du/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste/_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur bas na/_/de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/_/zhes
[\[90a.2\]]'byung ngo /_/de lta yin pas rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i tshor ba ni rig bzhin du zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag stobs dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/_rigs kyi bu dga' bo la yang dag par smra bas smra'i/_dge slong dag mdzes pa dang 'dod
[\[90a.3\]]chags shas che ba zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la yang dag par smra bas smra'i/_gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo dbang po'i sgo yongs su bsdams shing gnas pa dang /_zas kyi tshod shes pa dang /_nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi
[\[90a.4\]]nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa spyad par nus so/_/dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dbang po rnams kyis yongs su
[\[90a.5\]]sgo bsdams pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/_mngon rtags su mi 'dzin cing mig gi dbang po lhag par sdom pas bsdams shing gnas te/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba
[\[90a.6\]]sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems zag pa dang bral zhing de dag la 'bad pa dang /_sdom zhing srung ste/_mig gi dbang po la mig gi dbang po bsdams te gnas so/_/rna bas sgra dang /_snas dri dang /_lces ro dang /_lus kyis reg bya dang /_yid kyis chos
[\[90a.7\]]rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin la zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sdom zhing srung ste/_yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po bsdams te gnas pa'i bar du ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i zas kyi tshod shes pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo shes bzhin du zas za ste/_rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/_rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_'tshag gi phyir ma yin/_rnam par brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_ji
[\[90b.2\]]ltar srid du lus gnas shing rten pa dang /_bkres pa bzlog pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba snga ma bzlog cing tshor ba gsar pa skyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_gang la stobs dang bde ba la reg pas gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/_'di lta ste/_shing
[\[90b.3\]]rta mkhan gyi skyes bu shing rta'i mig tu mar ram til mar skud par byed pa na rtse ba'i don du ma yin/_rgyags pa'i don du ma yin/_'tshag gi don du ma yin/_rnam par brgyan pa'i don du ma yin gyi/_ji srid du khur theg par bya ba'i don du'o/_/skyes bu sman can rma la mar
[\[90b.4\]]ram til mar skud par byed pa na/_rtse ba'i don du ma yin/_'tshag gi don du ma yin/_rnam par brgyan pa'i don du ma yin gyi/_ji srid du rma las thar par bya ba'i don du'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dga' bo shes bzhin du zas za bar byed ces bya ba nas
[\[90b.5\]]snga ma bzhin du bde ba la reg par gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i zas kyi tshod shes pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa gang
[\[90b.6\]]zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo nyin mo rgyu ba dang gnas pa dag la chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag go/_/de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la rgyu ba dang gnas pa dag las chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag nas mtshan
[\[90b.7\]]mo'i thun par pa la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/_rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing nyal bar byed do/_/de mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la myur ba
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]myur bar langs nas rgyu ba gnas pa dag la chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag go/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag de la rigs kyi
[\[91a.2\]]bu dga' bo'i dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog gang zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo shar phyogs su blta ba na sems thams cad dang ldan pas lta bar byed do/_/de gal te lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su lta ba na yang sems thams cad dang ldan pas lta bar byed
[\[91a.3\]]do/_/de ltar lta ba na 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba sdig pa mi dge ba dag las sems zag pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i tshor ba ni rig bzhin du skye'o/_/rig bzhin du gnas so/_/rig bzhin du
[\[91a.4\]]nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ba de yang dran bzhin du yin gyi ma dran par ni ma yin no/_/'du shes dang spyod pa rig bzhin du skye ba dang /_rig bzhin du gnas pa dang /_rig bzhin du nub pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su
[\[91a.5\]]gtugs par 'gyur gyi/_de yang dran bzhin du yin gyi/_ma dran par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog ces bya'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dga' bo ltar dbang
[\[91a.6\]]po'i sgo rnams yongs su bsdams te gnas pa dang /_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu dga' bo bzhin du zas kyi tshod shes pa dang /_'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dga' bo bzhin du nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pas gnas pa dang /_rigs kyi bu dga'
[\[91a.7\]]bo bzhin du dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan par dge slong dag dga' bo la gdams pa'i gdams ngag 'dis dga' bo bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbang po bsdams shing so sor
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]dran ldan dang /_/de bzhin zas tshod mnyam por rig pa dang /_/sems kyi rgyu mtshan de 'drar rig pa dag_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bor bcom ldan gsung /_/zhes smras so/_/tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de
[\[91b.2\]]nas lha gzhan zhig kha dog mngon par 'phags shing rab tu 'phags pa dang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/_nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/da dung yang lha'i kha dog gis
[\[91b.3\]]dze ti'i tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe lha des tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshigs bcad rgyu ni ci zhig yin/_/de yi dgod pa gang zhig yin/_/tshigs su bcad pa gang la brten/_/tshigs bcad
[\[91b.4\]]bzhi ni ci zhig yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/tshigs bcad rgyu ni 'dod pa ste/_/de yi dgod pa yi ge yin/_/tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste/_/tshigs bcad bzhi ni snyan ngag mkhan/_/de nas lha de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
[\[91b.5\]]par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/zag pa gang dag gi skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das ko tu ba na ko tu ba'i kal ma shad dam mya na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[91b.6\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag shes pa dang mthong bas zag pa zad par nga smra'i/_mi shes pa dang ma mthong bas ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar ci zhig shes pa dang mthong bas zag pa zad par nga smra'i/_mi shes pa dang mi mthong bas ni ma yin zhe na/_'di lta
[\[91b.7\]]ste tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/_/dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi byed na 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur la/_srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyed pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing
[\[92a.2\]]skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa skyes bu dam pa ma mthong zhing 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas shing 'phags pa'i chos kyis ma dul te 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes te/_bdag gi chos so zhes tshul bzhin
[\[92a.3\]]ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang bdag gis chos la tshul
[\[92a.4\]]bzhin yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes pas chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i
[\[92a.5\]]chos de dag yid la byed cing /_chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la mi byed de/_de chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i chos de dag yid la byed cing /_chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la mi byed pas 'di ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa
[\[92a.6\]]skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang bdag gis chos la yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi
[\[92a.7\]]skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes de 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pas chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i chos de dag yid la mi byed cing /_chos
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la byed do/_/de chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i chos de dag yid la mi byed cing /_chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la byed pas 'di ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[92b.2\]]srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag zag pa dang bcas pa gegs su gyur pa yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa de ni rnam pa bdun te/_bdun gang zhe na/_zag pa dang bcas pa mthong bas spang bar
[\[92b.3\]]bya ba yang yod/_zag pa dang bcas pa bsdams pas spong bar bya ba yang yod/_zag pa dang bcas pa spongs pas spang bar bya ba yang yod/_zag pa dang bcas pa bsten pas spang bar bya ba yang yod/_zag pa dang bcas pa dul bas spang bar bya ba yod/_zag pa
[\[92b.4\]]dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba yang yod/_zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yang yod do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag skyes bu dam pa ma mthong zhing
[\[92b.5\]]'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa 'phags pa'i chos kyis mi dul ba de 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed de/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam/_'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar ma gyur/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na ci 'dra
[\[92b.6\]]bar byung /_bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar byung bar gyur zhes bya ba dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_
[\[92b.7\]]ma 'ongs pa sdom pas bsdams pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa spangs pas spong bar bya ba gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la glang po che smyon pa thag ring du yongs su spang bar bya zhing /_khyi smyon pa dang /_brdung ba dang /_rta rgod dang /_gnas mi shes pa dang /_ngam grog
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]dang /_mtsho dang /_g.yang sa dang /_shing rta dang /_ljan ljin dang /_sdig pa can dang /_tha chad dang /_sdig pa can gyi grogs po dang /_sdig pa can gyi mal cha dang /_stan dang /_mal cha dang stan 'di lta bu la yongs su zhen pa mkhas pa tshangs par spyod pas mi srid pa
[\[93a.2\]]srid par 'gyur ba dang /_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa rtog par byed pa de lta bu'i mal cha dang stan ring du yongs su spang bar bya ste/_spangs na zag pa dang /_gegs dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_'khrug pa skye bar yongs su spang bar bye ste/_'di ltar zag pa dang /_gegs dang /_yongs
[\[93a.3\]]su gdung ba dang /_'khrug pa mi skye ba 'di ni spangs pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa bsten pas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di la dge slong so sor brtags nas chos gos gyon par byed kyi rtse ba'i phyir ma yin rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_'tshag gi phyir ma
[\[93a.4\]]yin/_brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_ji srid du sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa gzhom par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ngo tsha ba dang gsang ba'i gnas dgab par bya ba'i phyir gon par byed do/_/so sor brtags nas bsod snyoms
[\[93a.5\]]bsten par byed kyi rtsed mo'i phyir ma yin/_rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_'tshag gi phyir ma yin/_brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi ji srid du lus 'di gnas pa dang mi bsgom pa dang /_bkres pa bsal ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la rjes su bzung ba dang /_tshor ba rnying pa
[\[93a.6\]]rnams bsal zhing tshor ba gsar pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang /_'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /_stobs dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i don du'o/_/so sor brtags te mal cha dang stan la nyal bar byed de/_rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/_rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/_
[\[93a.7\]]'tshag gi phyir ma yin/_brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_ji srid du tha mal pa'i yongs su 'jig pa rnams gzhom pa dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro/_/de so sor brtags te na ba'i gsos sman sten par byed de/_rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gyi/_ji srid du lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa rtsub pa gnad gcod pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa bsal zhing dga' ba dang ldan par bya ba'i don du'o/_/gang zhig so sor ma bsten na zag pa dang bcas pa gegs yongs su gdung ba dang nye bar 'khrug pa mi skye
[\[93b.2\]]ba 'di ni so sor bsten pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dul bas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di la dge slong 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa mi bzod cing spong zhing bsring la thag ring du byed pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_
[\[93b.3\]]rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa mi bzod cing spong la bsring ba dang thag ring du byed cing 'dul ba/_zag pa dang /_gegs dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_nye bar 'khrug pa skyes pa 'dul bar byed cing 'di ltar mi skye bar byed pa/_zag pa dang /_gegs
[\[93b.4\]]dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_nye bar 'khrug pa 'dul bar byed pas sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di la dge slong dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams zhing gnas te/_stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[93b.5\]]spro ba dang /_brtan pa dang pha rol gnon pa khur mi 'dor ba gang gis pags pa dang /_rtsa rgyus dang /_rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang /_khrag skams kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang dang /_stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang /_spro ba dang /_brtan
[\[93b.6\]]pa dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang /_khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te/_de 'di snyam du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas nas lus ngal ba skyes sam/_sems ngal lam/_lus dang sems la rims nad byung ngam
[\[93b.7\]]lus dang sems yongs su gdung ba'am/_lus dang sems yongs su 'khrug pa skyes kyang tshe dang ldan pa de de'i rgyus brtson pa yongs su mi 'dor ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa de bkres pa dang skom pa dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_rlung dang /_tsha ba dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa dang /_gzhan gyis shes par smras pa dang /_nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams bzod cing /_lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa rtsub pa gnad gcod pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa skyes shing skyes pa bzod par 'gyur zhing bzod pa bskyed do/_/
[\[94a.2\]]gang zhig mi bzod na zag pa dang bcas pa gegs yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa skye bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar bzod na zag pa dang bcas pa gegs yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/zag
[\[94a.3\]]pa dang bcas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di la dge slong nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga rnams la skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can du rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_'di lta ste/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni gzugs kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni
[\[94a.4\]]gzugs 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o zhes de nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga po 'di nyid la skye ba dang
[\[94a.5\]]'jig pa'i chos can du rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur bar sgom par byed do/_/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed
[\[94a.6\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong ba yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed de/_gang
[\[94a.7\]]zhig ma bsgoms na skye bar 'gyur ba'i zag pa dang /_gegs dang yongs su gdung ba dang nye bar 'khrug pa de dag 'di ltar bsgoms pas zag pa dang gegs dang yongs su gdung ba dang 'khrug pa skye bar mi 'gyur te/_'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]de ltar na dge slong zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag mthong bas spang bar bya ba de dag mthong bas spong bar 'gyur ro/_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag bsdams pas spang bar bya ba de dag bsdams pas yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag yongs su spangs pas spang bar bya
[\[94b.2\]]ba de dag yongs su spangs pas spang ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag so sor bsten pas spang bar bya ba de dag so sor bsten pas spong ngo /_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag dul bas spang bar bya ba de dag dul bas spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag bzod pas
[\[94b.3\]]spang bar bya ba de dag bzod pas spang bar byed do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba de dag bsgom pas yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni dge slong zag pa thams cad las sems rab tu bsdams pa zhes brjod de/_sred pa chad pa dang kun du sbyor ba
[\[94b.4\]]spangs pa/_yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de ltar na rab tu byed pa'i gzhung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_rab tu byed pa las dri ba stong 'byung ba las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dbye ba'i mdo'i
[\[94b.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dri ba dang lan las ji skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa ni du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can ma yin pa ni du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin
[\[94b.6\]]la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin pa ni du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pa ni du zhe na zhes dri ba bkod nas lan btab pa/_gnyis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
[\[94b.7\]]rgyu yang ma yin no/_/gnyis la ni bye brag yod de sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang kun 'byung ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin te/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin pa dang /
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'gog pa dang lam gyi bden pa ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pas so/_/de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal mthong bas
[\[95a.2\]]spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas rnams dang /_de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtogs pa dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_mi rtag pa ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa
[\[95a.3\]]sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin pa ni gang dag ma gtogs pa rnams so/_/'jig
[\[95a.4\]]tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/_'di ltar sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa'o/_/gzugs bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang zhes bya ba la/_
[\[95a.5\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag gzugs bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /_rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na/_rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa la brten nas byung ba'i gzugs la rtag par ga la 'gyur/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bskyed
[\[95a.6\]]pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang /_rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa la brten te skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa lta rtag par ga la 'gyur/_dge slong dag gzugs mi rtag pa tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/_gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal
[\[95a.7\]]ba/_gang sdug bsngal ba de bdag med pa/_gang bdag med pa de thams cad nga'i med pa/_nga yir bya ba med pa/_bdag gi bdag tu bya ba med pa/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gzugs la yid 'byung zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yid 'byung ba de 'dod chags dang bral lo/_/'dod chags dang bral na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/grol na rnam par grol ba'i ye shes dang mthong bas
[\[95b.2\]]bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ji ltar drang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni
[\[95b.3\]]mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dbang po lnga po 'di dag kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur zhing mi 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dag dad pa'i dbang po kun du bstan goms
[\[95b.4\]]par byas lan mang du byas na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing mi 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas
[\[95b.5\]]na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gzugs la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag gzugs la 'dun pa dang
[\[95b.6\]]'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs shig_/'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs na khyod kyis gzugs de lta bu yang spangs pa dang /_yongs su shes par yang 'gyur te shing ta la rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du mi snang ba dang phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_
[\[95b.7\]]'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs shig_/'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs na khyod kyis 'dun pa dang 'dod chags yongs shes pa dang yongs su spangs par 'gyur te/_shing ta la rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du mi snang
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]ba dang phyis yongs su mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/dper na sred pa rnam par dpyad pa dag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag dra ba dang 'khri shing dang /_mtsho dang /_rab tu 'bags pa
[\[96a.2\]]dang gang dang gang gis skye dgu la sgrib pa/_rab tu sgrib pa/_khyab par byed pa/_rab tu khyab par byed pa/_bkab pa dang /_g.yogs pa dang /_rab tu 'gebs pa dang /_dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang /_rtswa mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bu dang /_'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur cing 'jig rten 'di
[\[96a.3\]]nas 'jig rten pha rol du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa/_'khor bar 'khor zhing 'jug par byed pa bsten par bya ste/_dge slong dag srid pa'i dra ba dang /_'khri shing dang /_mtsho dang /_rab tu 'bab pa dang gang dang gang dag gis skye dgu la sgrib par byed pa nas nying mtshams
[\[96a.4\]]sbyor bar byed pa 'khor bar 'khor zhing 'jug par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de gang zhe na/_dge slong dag de'o zhes bya ba byung bar gyur cing /_nga 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba byung bar gyur cing /_nga 'di 'dra'o snyam du byung bar gyur cing /_nga de lta ma yin no snyam du byung bar gyur cing /_
[\[96a.5\]]nga bzang ngo snyam du byung bar gyur cing /_nga ngan no snyam du byung bar gyur cing /_'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya'o/_/'di 'dra bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de lta ma yin par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur
[\[96a.6\]]gyur cig snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang /_gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung
[\[96a.7\]]zhes dge slong dag nang gi bdag nyid la brten te/_sred pa spyod pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de la bdag go snyam pa byung bar gyur cing /_bdag 'di lta bu'o snyam pa byung zhing /_bdag 'di 'dra'o snyam pa byung zhing /_bdag bzang ngo snyam pa byung bar gyur
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]cing /_bdag ngan no snyam pa byung bar gyur la/_'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa byung zhing /_'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar 'gyur bar bya snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_gyur cig snyam pa dang /_
[\[96b.2\]]'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang /_gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci
[\[96b.3\]]ma rung snyam pa zhes dge slong dag phyi'i bdag nyid la brten nas sred pa spyod pa bco brgyad po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gcig tu bsdus na sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'das pa'i dus la brten nas sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug byung
[\[96b.4\]]la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten nas sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug 'byung zhing /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la brten nas sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug byung ste/_gcig tu bsdus na/_sred pa spyod pa brgya rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni sred pa'i dra ba dang /_'khri
[\[96b.5\]]shing dang /_mtsho dang /_rab tu 'bags pa dang /_gang dang gang gis skye dgu 'di la sgrib pa dang rab tu sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/_'khor bar 'khor ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag sred pa'i dra ba dang /_'khri shing dang /_mtsho dang /_rab tu 'bags pa gang
[\[96b.6\]]dang gang gis skye dgu 'di la sgrib pa dang rab tu sgrib pa/_khyab par byed pa/_rab tu khyab par byed pa/_bkab pa dang /_g.yogs pa dang /_rab tu 'gebs pa dang /_dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu/_rtswa mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bu dang /_'gro ba dang 'ongs par gyur pa 'jig rten
[\[96b.7\]]'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed cing 'khor bar 'khor bar byed pa bsten par bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang dag 'dus byas kyang rung 'dus ma byas kyang rung ba de
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]dag gi mchog ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par bshad do zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag btags pa'i mchog ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_btags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas dang /_btags pa'i
[\[97a.2\]]mchog chos dang dge 'dun no/_/btags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas gang zhe na/_sems can gang rkang pa med pa dang /_rkang gnyis pa 'am/_rkang mangs sam/_gzugs can nam/_gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/_'du shes can nam 'du shes med pa 'am/_'du shes
[\[97a.3\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog ces brjod do zhes bya'o/_/gang cung zad sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pas lha'i nang na lhar gyur pa mi'i
[\[97a.4\]]nang na mir gyur pa de dag ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa'i mchog la re bar bya'o/_/'di ni btags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/btags pa'i mchog chos gang zhe na/_'dus byas kyang rung 'dus ma byas kyang rung chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na mchog ni 'dod
[\[97a.5\]]chags dang bral ba yin par bshad de/_gang cung zad chos la mngon par dad pas mngon par dad pa/_lha'i nang na lhar gyur pa/_mi'i nang na mir gyur pa de dag ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa'i mchog la re bar bya ste/_'di ni btags pa'i mchog chos zhes bya'o/_/btags
[\[97a.6\]]pa'i mchog dge 'dun gang zhe na/_'dus pa'am tshogs pa'am ma tshogs pa'am 'khor gang ci yang rung ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yin par bshad de/_gang cung zad chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pas mngon par
[\[97a.7\]]dad pa/_lha'i nang na lhar gyur pa/_mi'i nang na mir gyur pa de dag ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa'i mchog la re bar bya ste/_'di ni btags pa'i mchog dge 'dun zhes bya'o zhes gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/chos mchog rnam
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]par shes nas ni/_/yon gnas bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas mchog la rab dang ba/_/'jig rten mchog la rab tu dang /_/nyer zhi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i/_/chos mchog la ni rab dad dang /_/bsod nams zhing mchog bla med pa'i/_/dge 'dun mchog
[\[97b.2\]]la rab dad cing /_/mchog gi sbyin pa rab byed pa/_/bsod nams mchog ni rab tu 'dzin/_/tshe dang kha dog mchog dang ni/_/grags dang stobs dang bde ba dang /_/mal stan mchog dag thob gyur cing /_/longs spyod spyod pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gnas mchog la ni gnas
[\[97b.3\]]pa dang /_/mdzes pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/sbyin pa mchog la sbyin pa dang /_/chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang /_/shes rab phun sum tshogs byas nas/_/mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/mdo las mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las
[\[97b.4\]]'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te
[\[97b.5\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dge slong mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa zhes bya ba la/_btsun pa ji tsam
[\[97b.6\]]gyis na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong du 'gyur/_ji tsam gyis na bde bar gshegs pas mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes tha snyad gdags pas btags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[97b.7\]]dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong legs so legs so/_/dge slong khyod 'di lta bu'i dri ba 'dri ba mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du tha snyad btags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong khyod 'di lta bu 'dri 'am/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]btsun pa de bzhin no/_/de'i phyir dge slong legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong gzugs la skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa dag las sems rnam par grol zhing gnas na
[\[98a.2\]]mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes brjod par nus so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_nye bar len pa dag las sems rnam par grol zhing
[\[98a.3\]]gnas na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes brjod par nus to/_/dge slong 'di tsam gyis na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'di tsam gyis na bde bar gshegs pas mthong ba'i chos la mya
[\[98a.4\]]ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes tha snyad btags so/_/de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung nas song ngo /_/'di
[\[98a.5\]]skad du sdug bsngal 'di ni ma lus par spangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gcig pu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa/_ji ltar shes shing ji ltar mthong na chos mthong
[\[98a.6\]]bar 'gyur zhes 'di lta bu skyes so/_/de nas dge slong de nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/_nye bar song nas zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bdag
[\[98a.7\]]'di na gcig pu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa/_ji ltar shes shing ji ltar mthong na chos mthong bar 'gyur zhes 'di lta bu skyes so/_/dge slong de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang gnyis shig bshad par bya'o/_/gnyis
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gang zhe na/_mig dang /_gzugs dang /_rna ba dang /_sgra nas/_yid dang chos kyi bar du ste/_'di ni gnyis zhes bya'o/_/dge slong gang kha cig 'di skad du/_dge sbyong gau ta ma btags pa 'di ni gnyis ma yin gyis/_bdag gi 'di ltar gnyis po de las bzlog pa gzhan gnyis gdags
[\[98b.2\]]par bya'o zhes smra ba 'di ni tshig tsam dang /_dris pa'i lan yang dag par mi shes shing mgo rmongs par byed pa ste/_'di ltar de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong mig dang gzugs la brten nas skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_gsum
[\[98b.3\]]'dus pa'i reg pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang sems pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi dang /_gzugs can mig gi dbang po ste/_'di tsam la mi zhes bya'o/_/de la sems can dang mi dang shed las skyes
[\[98b.4\]]dang shed bu dang gang zag dang srog dang gso ba zhes 'dogs so/_/dge slong de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/_yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar 'dogs so/_/de la 'di dag kyang tha snyad de tshe dang ldan pa'i ming ni
[\[98b.5\]]'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di lta bu/_rigs ni 'di lta bu/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /_tshe ring zhing yun ring po 'di tsam zhig tu gnas/_tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong gang 'du shes tsam 'di ni dam bcas pa tsam mo/_/ji ltar
[\[98b.6\]]'di thams cad tha snyad tsam yin zhe na/_dge slong chos 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa dang mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_sems las byung ba dang /_brten te skyes pa'o/_/gang mi rtag pa/_mngon par 'dus byas pa sems las byung ba brten te skyes pa de dag ni sdug
[\[98b.7\]]bsngal ba/_de ni sdug bsngal skye ba/_sdug bsngal gnas pa dang /_mngon par 'phel ba dang /_gang sdug bsngal yang dang yang du rab tu 'byung ba'o/_/gang sdug bsngal 'di ma lus par spangs pa/_byang bar gyur pa/_zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]rnam par zhi ba/_nub pa/_sdug bsngal gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa/_len pa med pa 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_phung po thams cad nges par spangs pa/_srid pa zad pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'gog pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa
[\[99a.2\]]ste/_dge slong gang 'ga' zhig chos 'di rnams la sems shing 'jal ba dang gnas pa 'di ni phyis yid la yongs su gdung ba mi 'jug cing len pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong ci ste gang bdag gis bdag 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar mthong ba de chos mngon par 'gyur ro/_/rna ba dang /_
[\[99a.3\]]sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang reg bya la brten nas skyes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi dang /_gzugs can lus kyi dbang
[\[99a.4\]]po ste 'di tsam la mi zhes bya'o/_/de la sems can dang mi dang shed las skyes pa dang shed bu dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang srog dang gso ba zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/_/dge slong de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/_yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes so
[\[99a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i bar du tha snyad 'dogs te/_/de la 'di dag kyang tha snyad de tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar mthong ba de chos mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong yid dang chos la brten nas skyes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[99a.6\]]gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yin la/_'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus te 'di tsam la mi zhes bya'o/_/de la sems can dang mi dang shed
[\[99a.7\]]las skyes pa dang shed bu dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang srog dang gso ba zhes 'dogs so/_/dge slong de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/_yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar 'dogs so/_/de la 'di dag kyang tha
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]snyad de/_tshe dang ldan pa ming ni 'di zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar mthong ba des chos mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas
[\[99b.2\]]ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ming dang gzugs dag gnyis la brten nas ni/_/skyes par gyur pa sems las byung ba'i chos/_/rnam shes reg dang lhan cig tshor ba dang /_/'du shes sems pa dang ni rgyu dang bcas/_/gang zag shed las skyes dang
[\[99b.3\]]shed bu dang /_/'di na bdag gam bdag gi bya ba med/_/phung po sdug bsngal yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos/_/skye ba'i chos can 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/sems can ming dang shed skyes shed bu ste/_/'di dag yod ces 'dir ni btags pa yin/_/phung po rgyu mtshan rgyu
[\[99b.4\]]las de dag las/_/gzhan yang rnam mang 'du shes skye bar 'gyur/_/ci ste dge sbyong bram ze gzhan gang dag_/bdag cag gnyis las gzhan gnyis 'chad smras pa/_/tshig gis mngon par brjod pa'i skal ba can/_/'dri ba'i lan dag rab tu mi shes yin/_/las dang sred pa
[\[99b.5\]]dang ni ma rig pa/_/phyi ma'i tshe la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu/_/phung po dag las phung po yang gzhan du/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba gang zag ces smra'o/_/srid pa ma lus nye bar zhi ba dang /_/ma rig nub cing rab tu 'gags pa na/_/sred pa zad pas sdug bsngal rab zad par/_/'di ltar
[\[99b.6\]]spyan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gsung /_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo dang /_dbyangs kyi tshogs kyi mdo las tshangs pa'i sgo'i mdor 'don pa lta bu ste/_sangs rgyas bcom
[\[99b.7\]]ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa nyid du tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad pa smas pa/_dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung dang /_sems brtan par ni skyob pa gnas/_/mi g.yo zhi ba rtogs nas ni/_spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/gang
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]tshe rnam kun stobs lnga pa/_/ston pa dus mdzad gyur pa na/_/de tshe 'jigs pa'i sgra byung zhing /_/ba spu ldang ba byung bar gyur/_/zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis na/_/tshor ba yongs su bzod mdzad cing /_/mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/_/de yi sems ni rnam par
[\[100a.2\]]thar/_/lam gyi tshogs las kyang bslab pa'i sgo'i mdo 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'don te/_de dag srog dang bral gyur cing /_/rnam par sred zad rnam par grol/_/mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/_/de yi sems ni rnam par thar/_/zhes mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa tshul
[\[100a.3\]]khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin zhes mdo 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/mdo las rkyen nyid ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bzhi las 'phros pa'i mdo las/_rab tu rig dang rkyen dang ni/_/zhes bya bar gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o zhes 'don pa
[\[100a.4\]]lta bu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/bzhi po 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas te/_bsam par byed na smyo bar 'gyur zhing
[\[100a.5\]]mgo rmongs pa dang sems g.yengs pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag bsam pa dang /_'jig rten bsam pa dang /_sems can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul lo zhes bka' stsal to/_/mi sdug pa dang
[\[100a.6\]]lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag mi sdug pa sgom par byed cing kun du bsten cing lan mang du byas na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur zhing bsngags pa che bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'bras bu che ba dang
[\[100a.7\]]bsngags pa che ba'i mi sdug pa bsgom par 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong 'di la mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su sgyur ba sgom par byed
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]de/_dge slong 'di la mi sdug pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog
[\[100b.2\]]pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su sgyur ba sgom par byed de/_dge slong 'di lta bu 'bras bu che ba dang bsngags pa che ba'i mi sdug pa sgom par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/chos mngon pa mdzod kyi mdo dang sbyar ba'i TI ka nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las gnas gnyis pa
[\[100b.3\]]phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba'o//_//'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod pa min/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar
[\[100b.4\]]du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta ste/_'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/_bka' stsal ba 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dod pa'i
[\[100b.5\]]yon tan lnga'i tshig bla dwags ma yin gyi/_'on kyang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags 'di la 'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod pa min/_/skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/_/'jig rten dag na sna tshogs de bzhin gnas/_/'on kyang brtan rnams
[\[100b.6\]]'di la 'dun pa 'dul/_/btsun pa 'on kyang lam rtogs shing bstan pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_lan mang du byas na 'dun pa dang 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/_'dod pa can yod de/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag pa'i lta
[\[100b.7\]]ba nas/_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o/_/btsun pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsgoms pa dang /_lan mang du byas na 'dod pa spong ba'i lam 'di ni bzang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te zhabs drung nas song ngo /_/'dod pa ni 'dod chags zhes rtogs par nus kyang chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos de dang de las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir kun du rgyu 'tsho byed la
[\[101a.2\]]'phags pa shA ri'i bus ji skad du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis 'thad pa dang bcas pa bkod pa slob dpon gyis bris pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/mdo las dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi
[\[101a.3\]]gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_/dge slong dag sems can ma rig pas bsgribs shing sred pas kun du sbyor zhing sred pas gtums shing yun ring por 'khor bar mtshams sbyor zhing sdug bsngal gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi
[\[101a.4\]]shes pa rnams kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med de/_dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na bar snang la chu'i rgyun 'bab pa rnams kyi bar mtshams med de/_de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_gzhan zhig nas
[\[101a.5\]]'dug pa dang /_gzhan chags pa dang /_gzhan chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med de/_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang chags pa dang /_gzhan 'jig pa dang /_gzhan zhig nas 'dug pa dang /_gzhan
[\[101a.6\]]chags pa dang /_gzhan chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med do/_/dge slong dag sems can ma rig pas bsgribs shing sred pas kun du sbyor zhing sred pas gtums te/_yun ring por 'khor bar mtshams sbyor ba ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' mi shes pa rnams
[\[101a.7\]]kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med do/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang las sred pa chad pa dang gang rtogs pas sred pa mngon par mi grub pa de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/_/'o na tshe dang ldan pa chos de dag las ma gtogs pa'i
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]dmyal ba ma dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_'di skad du kha che ba mdo 'don gyi/_nyi 'og pa rnams ni ma yin pas 'di ni ma rnyed do/_/yang snyigs ma rnam pa lnga mdo de dang de las 'don pa lta bu ste/_re zhig ji ltar yang dag par ldan pa'i las de'i mdo las
[\[101b.2\]]btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ni bslab pa'i gzhi ches nyung ngu dag bcas kyang dge slong rab tu mang po dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing gnas la bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar ni bslab pa'i gzhi ches mang po bcas kyang dge slong ches nyung ngu dag dgra
[\[101b.3\]]bcom pa thob cing gnas par gyur/_dga' byed de bzhin no/_/ji ltar da ltar tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma dag gis dga' byed sems can rnams nyams par byas shing dam pa'i
[\[101b.4\]]chos kyang nub pa'i dus na ston pas nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi ches mang po bcas kyang dge slong ches nyung ngu dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing gnas par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /_/rnam shes gnas pa bdun zhes bya ba la/_bdun las 'phros pa'i bdun pa'i sdom gyi
[\[101b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa brgyad cu pa la sogs pa la lta bar bya'o/_/'di nyid du yang mdzod kyi gnas dang por/_de las gzhan yang ci rigs par/_/zhes bya ba'i skabs su skye mched gnyis po zhes bya ba 'grel par bris zin pa dang /_sems can gyi gnas 'chad par
[\[101b.6\]]'gyur ba las ming gzhan du byas pa rtogs par bya'o/_/mdo las sems can de dag 'di snyam du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skabs su tshangs pa'i dra ba las lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis bshad pa/_ji skad du tshangs
[\[101b.7\]]pa'i dra ba las zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la sngon gyi mtha' la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi dang po'i gzhi las 'di skad du 'don te/_dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus yod de/_'jig rten 'di 'jig par gyur pa na sems can phal cher 'od gsal
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]gyi lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_yid las byung ba'i gzugs can dbang po ma tshangs pa med pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang dbyibs mdzes pa/_rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la thogs pa med par 'gro ba/_dga'
[\[102a.2\]]ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'jig rten 'di 'chags par 'gyur ba'i dus yod de/_'jig rten 'di 'chags pa na nam mkha' stong pa la tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[102a.3\]]nas sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad pas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de na gcig pu zla med cing grogs med par gyur pa yun ring zhing dus ring po
[\[102a.4\]]zhig tu gnas te/_de nas sems can de dus ring por gnas pa na kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes sred pa skye zhing mngon par dga' ba yang dag par skyes so/_/sems can de de ltar sems la smon cing gnas pa na sems
[\[102a.5\]]can de dang skal ba mnyam pa sems can gzhan zhig tshe zad cing las zad pa bsod nams zad pas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du skyes par gyur to/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_bdag gcig pu zla med cing grogs
[\[102a.6\]]med par tshe ring zhing yun ring bar gnas te/_kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes dus ring por sred pa skyes shing dga' ba yang dag par skyes shing bdag gi sems la de ltar smon pas bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can
[\[102a.7\]]'dir skyes la sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis sprul pa/_bdag ni sems can 'di dag gi dbang phyug_/byed pa po/_sprul pa po/_/rab tu 'byin pa po/_/dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bur gyur pa'o/_/sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems can 'di gcig pu zla med cing
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]grogs med par gyur pa tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas pa sems can de tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/_kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes sred pa skyes shing yang dag par dga' ba skyes pa sems can de'i sems la 'di ltar
[\[102b.2\]]smon pas sems can de dang skal ba mnyam par bdag cag kyang 'dir skyes shing sems can 'di ni bdag cag gi sprul pa po/_sems can 'di ni bdag cag gi dbang phyug_/byed pa po/_'byin pa po/_rab tu 'byin par byed pa/_dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bur gyur pa'o zhes
[\[102b.3\]]'byung ngo /_/'od gsal gyi lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag 'du byed
[\[102b.4\]]thams cad ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa/_yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas spong bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad la yongs su skyo bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/dge
[\[102b.5\]]slong dag 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i dus yod de dus ring por gyur pa na lha rnams kyis char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs par 'gyur te/_lha rnams kyi char gyi rgyun ma phab pas sa chen po'i sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung po'i tshogs dang /_sman dang rtswa dang nags tshal thams cad skams par
[\[102b.6\]]'gyur zhing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas 'di dag ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas yongs su spong bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad la skyo bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang
[\[102b.7\]]bral bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang las dus ring por gyur pa na nyi ma gnyis 'char ba'i dus yod de/_'jig rten du nyi ma gnyis shar ba na sa chen po 'di ngam grog chung ngu dang /_ngam grog chen po thams cad skams par 'gyur zhing mi 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ro/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa mi brtan pa/_yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa yongs su gyur pa'i chos can yin pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad las yongs su skyo bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang
[\[103a.2\]]bral bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang las dus ring por gyur pa na 'jig rten 'dir nyi ma gsum 'char bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/_dge slong dag 'jig rten na nyi ma gsum 'char ba na sa chen po 'di'i chu klung chung ngu dang chu klung chen po thams cad skams shing
[\[103a.3\]]mi 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'dus byas 'di dag ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa mi brtan pa/_yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad las yongs su skyo bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral
[\[103a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang las dus ring por gyur pa na/_'jig rten 'dir nyi ma bzhi 'char ba'i dus yod de/_dge slong dag 'jig rten 'dir nyi ma bzhi 'char ba na mtsho chung ngu dang gang mtsho chen po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang /_chu klung chen po 'di lta ste/_gang
[\[103a.5\]]gA dang /_sin+d+hu dang /_si ta dang /_pak+Shu zhes bya ba de dag kyang de'i tshe skams par 'gyur zhing mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa/_yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa/_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[103a.6\]]dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad la yongs su skyo bar bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral bar bya'o/_/rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag dus ring por gyur pa na 'jig rten 'dir nyi ma lnga 'char bar 'gyur ba'i dus yod de/_'jig rten 'dir nyi ma lnga shar ba na rgya mtsho chen po las
[\[103a.7\]]chu dpag tshad brgya phrag gcig skams par 'gyur zhing nyams pa dang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun gyi chu skams shing nyams pa dang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag nyi ma lnga pa 'jig rten 'dir
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]shar ba na/_rgya mtsho chen po las chu dpag tshad stong phrag gcig skams par 'gyur zhing nyams pa dang mi 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dpag tshad stong phrag gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun gyi chu bskams shing nyams pa dang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[103b.2\]]dge slong dag nyi ma lnga pa 'jig rten 'dir shar ba na rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad stong phrag bdun gyi chu las par 'gyur zhing /_dpag tshad stong phrag drug dang lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi chu las par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag nyi ma lnga 'jig rten 'di na shar ba na rgya mtsho chen
[\[103b.3\]]po las dpag tshad bdun gyi chu las par 'gyur zhing drug dang lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang dpag tshad gnyis dang gcig gi chu las par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag nyi ma lnga pa 'jig rten 'dir shar ba na rgya mtsho chen po bdun las rgyang grags bdun gyi chu las par 'gyur zhing drug dang lnga dang bzhi dang
