[\[123a.5\]]mthug cing 'jam la rtsa ba brtan cing mnyen la phra ba kon da li ka sngon po lta bu dang /_mkhur tshos ha cang mtho ba dang rno ba ma yin la sha rgyas shing gang ba dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i kha dog can dang /_dpral ba'i mtshams [(]lags [,]legs [)]par dbyes shing dung dang zla ba 'khyil ba lta bu dang /_spyan
[\[123a.6\]]yangs shing mnyen la 'jam zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_rab tu dang zhing ma 'khums pa'i rdzi ma dang /_mthong la dul zhing dag la mi yo bas khyab pa dang /_shin tu chung ba ma yin pa'i stobs lnga pa'i phyir spyan mi 'dzums pa dang /_smin ma ring ba dang /_gnag pa dang /_'jam pa dang /_rjes su [(]'cham [,]'tsham [)]pa
[\[123a.7\]]dang /_mnyen pa'i dpral ba gser gyi byang bu dang zla ba ltar 'jam zhing yangs pa dang /_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu dang /_dbu sdug cing rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa dang /_gdugs ltar dbu yongs su rgyas pa dang /_dbu skra'i bkod pa 'jam zhing ma 'dzings pa bung ba ltar mnyen zhing
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'jam la rjes su 'brel zhing dri bsung mchog dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang klu'i 'gro bas spyi gtsug bltar mi nus pa'o/_/kha che ba rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sku la dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten thams cad la bkra shis pa 'byung bar byed pa 'di ltar
[\[123b.2\]]byed de/_gnas brtan dbyig bshes kyis ji skad du phreng ba dang /_dung dang /_gdugs dang dpal gyi be'u bzang po dang /_lcags kyu dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_mtshon cha dang /_zla ba dang /_chu dang /_pad+ma rnams kyis sku rnam par spras pa zhes bshad la/_don 'di nyid yang dag par brjod pa'i phyir
[\[123b.3\]]ji skad du yang dag pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan bzang po'i 'khor gzhan yang nyon cig_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lcags kyu dang /_dpal gyi be'u dang /_mu tig dang /_bum pa dang /_rta dang /_nya dang /_chu srin dang /_rus sbal dang /_nam mkha' lding
[\[123b.4\]]dang /_stag dang /_glang po che dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_khug rta dang /_ne+e tso dang /_khu byug dang /_ri dgas nag po dang /_rma bya dang /_ral gri dang /_rdo rje'i yan lag dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_nor dang /_mdung dang /_rtse gsum dang /_dgra sta dang /_mda' dang /_sprin
[\[123b.5\]]dang /_drag po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_nyi ma dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_zla ba dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_nor bdag dang /_yul 'khor skyong dang /_g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /_pad+ma dang /_ba dan bzang po dang /_me long dang /_dUr ba gzhon nu dang /_mu tig dang /_
[\[123b.6\]]gser dang /_sman chen po dang /_lha'i rnga dang /_drang srong chen po dang /_pa la dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_sor gdub dang /_rna cha dang /_seng ge dang /_khyu mchog dang /_me tog dang bcas pa'i shing gi yal ga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgyad cu ji skad du brjod pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpe
[\[123b.7\]]byad bzang po brgyad cu mtshan nyid stong dang ldan pa mu stegs can rnams kyang mthong nas 'byor pa'i phyir mngon par dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las kyang mtshan dang dpe byad kyi le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa las 'don pa lta bu ste/_rab
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'du byed thams cad las sems 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams
[\[124a.2\]]cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i phyir sen mo mdog snum pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rgyud mthon por skyes pa'i phyir sen mo mtho ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir sen mo zlum pa dag yin
[\[124a.3\]]no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba bsags pa'i phyir sen mo rgyas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis bsags pa'i phyir sen mo byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
[\[124a.4\]]lus dang ngag dang yid dang 'tsho ba yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyir rtsa mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa las grol ba'i phyir rtsa la mdud pa med pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rnams la thugs shin tu mi
[\[124a.5\]]mngon pa'i phyir long bu mi mngon pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir zhabs mnyam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge yin pa'i phyir seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa yin
[\[124a.6\]]no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po yin pa'i phyir glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nam mkha' la gshegs pa'i phyir ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
[\[124a.7\]]skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa'i phyir khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mdzes pa'i phyir mdzes par gshegs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rtag tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir mi g.yo
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bar gshegs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang yon tan yongs su dag pa ston pa'i phyir sku 'khril bag dang bcas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku byi dor byas pa lta bu
[\[124b.2\]]dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos go rims bzhin du 'chad pa'i phyir sku rim par 'tsham pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gsung thugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir sku gtsang ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs
[\[124b.3\]]rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'i phyir sku 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku rnam par dag pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dpe byad yongs su
[\[124b.4\]]rdzogs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mdzes shing rgya che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam par gshegs pa dag yin no/_/
[\[124b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir spyan rnam par dag pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rab tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sku 'jam zhing gzhon sha can dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs ma zhum pa'i
[\[124b.6\]]phyir sku zhum pa med pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i phyir sku rgyas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang srid pa'i tshogs yongs su zad pa'i phyir sku shin tu grims pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
[\[124b.7\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par 'chad pa'i phyir yan lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams ni tshul phun sum tshogs pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir dku zlum pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par dag pa'i phyir dku'i skabs phyin pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u
[\[125a.2\]]bcom pa'i phyir dku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rnams zad par mi byed pa'i phyir phyal phyang nge ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab pa'i chos rtogs shing khong du chud pa'i phyir lte ba zab pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[125a.3\]]'das rnams ni rjes su mthun zhing gzung bar 'os pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun nas mdzes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs mnga' ba'i phyir kun nas mdzes pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
[\[125a.4\]]thugs shin tu gtsang ba'i phyir kun du spyod pa gtsang ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba gnag bag med pa ston pa'i phyir sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku shing bal ltar yang ba'i chos ston pa brnyes pa'i phyir
[\[125a.5\]]phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi gnyen gyi tshogs spangs te/_dge sbyong chen po'i dngos po brnyes pa'i phyir phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang spangs par mi
[\[125a.6\]]'cha' ba'i phyir phyag gi ri mo zab pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma nyen pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dul ba'i phyir
[\[125a.7\]]ljags mnyen pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra mo ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ljags srab pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo chags pa can rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ljags dmar ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgras yongs su mi skrag pa'i phyir glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa brjod pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa dag yin no/_/
[\[125b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnam par log pa'i phyir mche ba zlum pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rnon po 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir mche ba rno ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba'i phyir mche ba
[\[125b.3\]]dkar ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam pa'i sa'i cha la zhugs pa'i phyir mche ba mnyam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rim gyis ston pa'i phyir mche ba byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes
[\[125b.4\]]rab mthon po'i sar zhugs pa'i phyir shangs mtho ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul bya gtsang sme'i skye bo dang ldan pa'i phyir shangs gtsang ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir spyan yangs pa dag yin no/_/
[\[125b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku thams cad kun du stug pa'i phyir rdzi ma stug pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu'i lha dang lha ma yin dang /_mi gzhon nu rnams kyis mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyan dkar nag 'byes
[\[125b.6\]]shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mdun phyogs su gzigs pa'i phyir smin tshugs ring ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir rdzi ma 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[125b.7\]]rnams ni skyon kun du mkhyen pa'i phyir smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam zhing mnyen pas skye bo'i rgyud 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir smin ma snum pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu don dang ldan pa mnga' ba'i phyir
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]snyan shal sdug cing snyan shal ring ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir snyan mnyam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul bya rgyud ma nyams pa mnga' ba'i phyir snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dag
[\[126a.2\]]yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta bar song ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram ze dang pha rol rgol ba rnam par gnon pa'i phyir dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dag yin no/_/sangs
[\[126a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dbu shin tu rgyas pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi skye bo la rnam par chags pa log pa'i phyir dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom
[\[126a.4\]]pas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas spangs pa'i phyir dbu skra stug pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dkar pos ma skyes pa'i bstan pa'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir dbu skra 'jam pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'dzings pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'i phyir
[\[126a.5\]]dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu tshig rtsub spangs pa'i phyir dbu skra mi bshor ba dag yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo byang chub kyi yan lag gi dri zhim pos rjes su mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir dbu skra dri zhim pa dag yin no/_/sangs
[\[126a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil na dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa mnga' ba'i phyir dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa dag yin no/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po 'di dag dang ldan no/_/de nyid du gzhan du gnas
[\[126a.7\]]brtan klu sgrub kyis yi ge gzhan dang tshig 'bru gzhan gyis rnam par bshad de/_ji skad du/_sangs rgyas yang dag dpe byad brgyad cu po/_/nga yis rab bshad yid la dad skyed nyon/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes rab brjod pa/_/sen mo zangs mdog snum dang sen mo mtho/_/smra mchog rtsa mi
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]mngon zhing rtsa yi ni/_/mdud pa mi mngon long bu mi mngon pa/_/ri dgas rgyal dang klu yi stabs dag tu/_/rnam par gshegs shing zhabs la mi mnyam med/_/khyu mchog ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang ni/_/g.yas su ldog cing mdzes par gshegs pa dang /_/byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham pa'i sku/_/
[\[126b.2\]]ma yo ba dang 'khril bag chags pa dang /_/kho lag yangs shing bzang dang gzhan yang ni/_/dpe byad yongs su rdzogs dang gom snyoms dang /_/dku zhum med dang gtsang zhing 'jam pa dang /_/gzhon sha chags shing sku ni rnam par dag_/yan lag nying lag shin tu rnam 'byes shing /_/thub pa'i dbang
[\[126b.3\]]po shin tu grims pa'i sku/_/gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par ni/_/dag cing rab tu rgyas pa'i sku mnga' ba/_/sku ni 'bar 'bur med cing skabs phyin dang /_/phyang nge'i phyal dang lte ba'i bug pa zab/_/shin tu kun nas blta na rab mdzes shing /_/lte ba g.yas kyi phyogs su 'khyil pa dang /_/
[\[126b.4\]]rgyal ba kun du spyod pa rab gtsang zhing /_/sme ba gnag bag smad du med pa dang /_/ljags mnyen srab cing zhal gyi gzugs brnyan 'char/_/rgyal ba'i zhal ni ha cang ring ba min/_/glang chen nga ro 'brug gi sgra dang ni/_/mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang /_/shing bal ltar 'jam shin tu
[\[126b.5\]]gzhon sha can/_/phyag gi ri mo dmar zhing zab pa dang /_/phyag gi ri mo yo ba ma yin dang /_/phyag gi ri mo mchog tu yangs pa dang /_/shin tu snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa'i gsung /_/mche ba zlum zhing mche ba rno ba dang /_/mche ba dkar zhing mche ba mnyam pa dang /_/thub pa seng ge'i mche ba byin gyis phra/_/_
[\[126b.6\]]tshems ni shin tu dkar zhing gtsang ba dang /_/spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug pa dang /_/'jam zhing shin tu yangs la mi dkar dang /_/smin ma'i spu ni snum zhing 'jam pa dang /_/snyan shal stug cing ring la snyan mnyam dang /_/bcom ldan snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams dang /_/dpral ba shin tu legs par
[\[126b.7\]]'byes pa dang /_/dbu ni rgyas la yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/dbu skra bung ba snum zhing dri zhim dang /_/dbu skra 'jam zhing yongs su ma 'dzings dang /_/dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa yis/_/sangs rgyas dbu skra rnam par brgyan pa yin/_/gang gis mtshan rnams gsal byed pa/_/sangs rgyas
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]yang dag dpe byad ni/_/bzang po brgyad cu 'di dag ste/_/bde gshegs thams cad gsal byed yin/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i sku/_/sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran gang /_/'di dang pha rol gnyis kar mnyam/_/gzhan yang slob dpon sna tshogs
[\[127a.2\]]blo gros kyis ji skad du/_bdag nyid snod mchog nyid du gzigs nas ni/_/bdag nyid yon gnas nyid du zhal 'ches te/_/'di ltar khyod kyis rtswa mchog tsam yang ni/_/sbyin bdag dbul ba de yang ma bkag gnang /_/gal te bgos na phyag g.yas brkyang nas ni/_/phyag g.yas rjes su gzung ba'i rjes mthun byed/_/
[\[127a.3\]]khyod la dpe byad brgyad cus bstod pa yis/_/ji ltar bdag kyang rjes su gzung bar mdzod/_/mnga' bdag khyod kyi sku yi stobs kyi tshad/_/gzhal nus 'jig rten gsum na 'ga' med 'dod/_/gus pa'i rnam pa'i 'byor pa 'di 'dra zhes/_/'phags pa gang phyir bdag 'dra ba yang gnas/_/khyod kyi sor mo ri
[\[127a.4\]]yi spor gnas pa/_/sen mo zangs kyi mdog 'dra 'od zer can/_/pad+ma rA ga mdzes pa'i zla shar nas/_/gser gyi rang bzhin snying po mdzes par byas/_/rtse ltar mtho zhing phra la mnyam zhing 'phro/_/dbyangs bcas 'od gsal sen mo mdzes par byas/_/legs skyes ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma ltar/_/lto ba ma
[\[127a.5\]]grums ma chag mnyam zhing mtho/_/steng du sdug mnyen dpal gyis bsdums pa ltar/_/shin tu gsal ba'i mdangs kyis rnam par mdzes/_/lha mi phyag byed tshe na skad cig la/_/skyes bu 'dul ba'i sen mo me long bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bstod pa snyan dngags kyi rgyan dang
[\[127a.6\]]bcas pa blta bar bya'o/_/gnas brtan thogs med kyis theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i sar mtshan dang dpe byad kyi le'u las/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'jig rten dang thun mong du bshad pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa ma brjod pa'i
[\[127a.7\]]phyir mngon par dad par byed pa ma yin pas mi gzung ngo /_/dpe byad bzang po 'di dag legs pa dang /_legs pa ma yin pa rnam par gzhag pa ni slob dpon go chas byin gyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i phung po rnam par bshad pa dbugs dbyung ba bzhi par rgyas par bshad pa blta bar bya'o/_/dper na rgyal
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]po kr-i kI'i rmi lam thun bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gser phreng can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa las 'di ltar 'don te/_de nas rgyal po kr-i kI yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
[\[127b.2\]]rgyas 'od srungs kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la rgyal po kr-i kIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ma dang bdag mtshan mo rmi lam na rmi lam thun bcu mthong ste/_btsun pa glang po che
[\[127b.3\]]chen po skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma thogs pa dang /_skom pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi bzhin du khron pa gda' ba dang /_phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang brje ba dang /_tsan dan shing tha mal pa la 'tshong ba dang /_kun dga' ra ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs la me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum
[\[127b.4\]]tshogs pa de ni thams cad ma byin par len pas phrogs pa dang /_glang po che chung ngus spos kyi glang po che bsdigs pa dang /_spre'u mi gtsang bas 'bags pa gzhan la skud pa dang /_spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /_snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos pa la snam bu yang de de bzhin du gnas
[\[127b.5\]]pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus te tshig ngan brjod cing chad pa dang gnod pa byed pa bdag gis mthong ngo /_mthong nas bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/_srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong zhes bdag rengs shing 'jigs pa dang /_skrag par gyur to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[127b.6\]]sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig rgyu 'di las khyod rgyal srid las nyams pa dang /_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur gyi ma 'jigs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po che skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma
[\[127b.7\]]thogs pa mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_/ma 'ongs pa na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i nyan thos dag rang gi skye bo gnyen bshes rgya chen po spangs nas rab tu byung ste/_
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]de ltar rab tu byung nas gtsug lag khang la khyim gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas ser sna kun du bsten cing lan mang du byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro rnams su ltung zhing skye bar 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis skom
[\[128a.2\]]pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi bzhin du khron pa gda' ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston pa de dag nyan par mi 'dod cing gnas par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang brje ba
[\[128a.3\]]rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos phye tshol ba'i phyir dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa'i rin po che yang dag par gsal bar byed de/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis tsan dan shing tha mal par 'tshong ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i
[\[128a.4\]]snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos dag lus ma bsgoms pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang /_sems ma bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/_lus ma bsgoms pa dang /_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang /_sems ma bsgoms pa
[\[128a.5\]]dang /_shes rab ma bsgoms pas mu stegs kyi bstan pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab dang mnyam par byed par 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag ma byin par len pas phrogs pa rmi lam du mthong ba de
[\[128a.6\]]ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos khyim la brten te dge 'dun gyi me tog dang 'bras bu btsongs shing btsongs te bzung nas 'tsho ba'i phyir sems pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ni de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po chung ngus spos kyi glang po chen po skrag par byed pa de rmi
[\[128a.7\]]lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des gang dag dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/_des shing dge ba de dag bskrad nas gnas gzhan na gnas par 'gyur te/_de ni de'i snga ltas so/_/
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas 'bags pa gzhan la skud pa rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i nyan thos sdig pa'i chos can tshul khrims 'chal ba de dag gis dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa des shing dge ba'i chos can dag la mi bden pa'i skyon
[\[128b.2\]]'gel bar 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i dus na ma ning yang rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos la snam bu yang de
[\[128b.3\]]bzhin du gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i bstan pa kha bco brgyad du gyes par gyur la rnam par grol ba'i snam bu ni ral bar mi 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus shing tshig ngan brjod de/_chad pa dang
[\[128b.4\]]gnod pa byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas she na/_de'i bstan pa lo stong du gnas shing ngan par smra ba dang chad pa byed pas nub par 'gyur te/_de'i snga ltas yin te/_de'i phyir khyod rgyal srid nyams pa 'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur gyi rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig_/de nas
[\[128b.5\]]rgyal po kr-i kI yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis dbugs phyung nas mngon par rab tu dad par gyur to zhes 'byung ngo //_//dge slong ma dkar mo yang gos dang bcas par yin te zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas
[\[128b.6\]]shAkya'i nang na shAkya skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_phyug cing zhes bya ba nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed pa las bu yang med bu mo yang med ces bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang khyim gyi lha la
[\[128b.7\]]sogs pa lha stong phrag du ma la gsol ba 'debs par byed kyang bu ma skyes so/_/ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na rtse dga' bar byed cing yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/des chung ma la smras pa/_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bzang mo gal te bu pho skyes na de lta na legs/_'di ltar bu mo skyes na lhan cig bskrad par bya'o/_/ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i chung ma la bu mo gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa mi'i kha dog las 'das pa lha'i kha dog thob pa gos dkar pos g.yogs pa/_
[\[129a.2\]]mngal gyi nyes pas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/_/ji tsam na chung ma la bu mo btsas pa thos nas khro ba dang bcas pas nang du zhugs pa dang /_rked pa lha'i gos kyis dkris pa'i bu mo de byin pa dang /_shAkyas bu mo de mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/de btsas pa'i btsas ston dag byas te ming
[\[129a.3\]]'dogs par byed pa na/_kye shes ldan dag bu mo 'di'i ming ci gdags/_gnyen rnams kyis smras pa gang gi phyir bu mo ni gos dkar po dang bcas par skyes pa de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mo zhes gdags so/_/bu mo dkar mo ji lta ji ltar cher skyes pa de lta de ltar gos kyang skye zhing dri ma dang bral
[\[129a.4\]]bar gyur to/_/de'i lus la rdul dang dri mas mi gos par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo rim gyis chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/_de la rgyal po'i bu dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_phyug po'i bu dag gis slong du 'ongs shing de dag gis gtses pa dang /_gal te ngas ma byin na 'gras par 'gyur ro zhes de'i pha lag
[\[129a.5\]]pa 'gram pa la gtad de de sems khong du chud cing 'dug par gyur to/_/ji tsam na bu mos pha sems shing 'dug pa mthong nas/_pha ci zhig sems/_de la des don dag rgyas par brjod pa dang /_bu mos smras pa/_pha 'di snyed bya ci dgos/_bdag ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[129a.6\]]kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis pha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de ji srid du pha dang mas gnang nas rab tu byung ste/_gos gang gis dkris te skyes pa de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos gos lnga par gyur to/_/des sbyor zhing brtson pa dang 'dun cing 'bad pas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba
[\[129a.7\]]'di nyid rab tu rig nas 'khor ba'i 'du byed thams cad rul ba dang lhung ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can spangs te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba gser dang bong ba/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil/_tsan+dan dang ste'u ru mtshungs
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]shing rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i spobs pa can rnyed pa dang bkur sti la kha phyir phyogs pa lha'i dbang pos mchod cing gus par bya ba dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun
[\[129b.2\]]pa dkar mos las ci zhig byas nas gang gis na phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang blta na sdug par gyur/_ci zhig byas pas na gos dkar pos dkris bzhin du skyes shing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[129b.3\]]dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis skye ba snga ma la las byas shing bsags la so sor thob par byas pa chu bo bzhin du nye bar gnas pa ste/_gzhan gyis byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
[\[129b.4\]]la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu dang me dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur gyi/_'on kyang las byas shing bsags pa ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs
[\[129b.5\]]shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu rnams tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa bla na med pa skyes bu
[\[129b.6\]]'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na brten zhing bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na phyug po'i chung ma dad pa can rang bzhin bzang zhing dge ba'i bsam pa
[\[129b.7\]]can zhig_/bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su 'ongs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid can byon pa/_rin po
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]che'i ri bo lta bu'i 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas shing blta bar bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das de mthong nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs
[\[130a.2\]]kyis chos bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad de/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos phul te/_rim gyis pha dang mas rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/dge slong
[\[130a.3\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_phyug po'i chung ma de nyid dge slong ma dkar mo yin no/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la sra brkyang gi chos gos phul bas gos dkar pos dkris bzhin du skyes shing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su bsrungs pa des na skye ba bcom zhing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
[\[130a.4\]]byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin zhing /_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pa de'i phyir dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spang
[\[130a.5\]]bar bya zhing /_gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni
[\[130a.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la/_bzhi las 'phros pa'i sgo lnga pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo las bsam par bya ba rnam pa gnyis te bshad pa dang /_'di nyid du yang go rims las bzlog pa'i mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par bshad pa lta bu'o/_/btab pa las 'di
[\[130a.7\]]skad du zhes bya ba la/_mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa dbang po'i rnam par bshad pa phra rgyas btab pa las bshad pa bzhin no/_/pha ma'i nur nur po'i mi gtsang ba las skyes zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_'di
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]na sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid drag pa/_dug drag pa bzhi sgrom cig gi nang du bcug par gyur cing /_de nas skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa/_rmongs pa ma yin zhing yang dag pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa bde ba 'dod cing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa 'tsho bar 'dod cing /_'tsho ba dang rjes su mthun pa 'ga'
[\[130b.2\]]zhig 'ongs te/_de la gzhan kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid drag cing dug drag pa bzhi sgom cig gi nang du bcug cing khyod kyis de la dus dus su byug par bya/_dus dus su khrus bya zhing /_dus dus su zas sbyin par bya zhing /_dus dus su yang dag par bde ba la
[\[130b.3\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/kye skyes bu gang gi tshe sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid drag cing dug drag pa bzhi po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig khros par gyur na de'i rgyus khyod 'chi ba 'am 'chi ba la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/kye skyes bu khyod bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig
[\[130b.4\]]ces smras na/_de nas skyes bu de sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gyi nang du bcug pas 'jigs nas/_gang gis na myur ba myur bar 'bros par byed pa na skyes bu gzhan zhig gis kye skyes bu khyod kyi phyi bzhin du bdar 'ong gi des khyod la gnod pa 'am gnod par 'gyur gyi kye skyes bu
[\[130b.5\]]khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas skyes bu de sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom cig gi nang du bcug pa dang /_gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa lngas rab tu 'jigs te gang gi na myur ba myur bar 'bros pa na/_skyes bu gzhan zhig gis
[\[130b.6\]]kye skyes bu gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa zhig gis phyi nas snyeg cing phyi nas nye bar 'ongs shing 'dug gi des khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bskyur bar 'gyur gyi/_kye skyes bu khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang /_sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid che ba bzhi sgrom cig gi nang du
[\[130b.7\]]bcug pa dang /_gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa lnga dang /_gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa drung na nye ba de dag gis shin tu 'jigs te myur ba myur bar bros pa dang /_des de na grong stong pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de grong stong pa der zhugs te/_ji srid du khang pa stong pa der bltas pa na stong pa 'ba'
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]zhig mthong ste/_brdzun pa nyid dang /_slu ba nyid dang /_snying po med pa nyid mthong zhing gang gnod pa mthong ba de dag kyang brdzun pa dang /_slu ba dang /_snying po med par mthong ba la skyes bu gzhan zhig 'di skad ces/_kye skyes bu khang pa stong pa 'dir grong la gnod pa'i rkun ma 'byung
[\[131a.2\]]bar 'gyur gyi des khyod bzung nas rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang phral bar 'gyur gyi/_kye skyes bu khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas skyes bu de sbrul gdug pa bzhi zhes bya bas/_gshed ma'i skyes bu drung na nye ba dang /_grong stong pa la gnod pa'i rkun ma
[\[131a.3\]]dag gis rab tu 'jigs te myur ba myur bar bros pa na/_des de na chu bo chen po ri las 'bar ba'i chu bo rgyun ring zhing gting zab pa myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa tshu rol gyi ngogs dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung bar gyur cing /_
[\[131a.4\]]pha rol gyi ngogs zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang /_bde ba dang bcas pa de tshu rol gyi ngogs las pha rol gyi ngogs su rgal bar byed par gru 'am gzings med par gyur cing /_de lta bu'i chu bo chen po ri las 'bab pa'i chu bo rgyun ring zhing gting zab pa myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa tshu rol gyi
[\[131a.5\]]ngogs dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung bar gyur cing /_pha rol gyi ngogs zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang bde ba dang bcas pa 'di las pha rol du rgal bar byed par gru 'am gzings gang dag gis rtswa 'am shing ngam yal ga dang 'dab ma dag bsdus te gzings
[\[131a.6\]]su zhugs shing /_gzings la brten te lag pa dang /_rkang pa'i rtsol ba brtsam par bya'o zhes de snyam du bsams nas/_rtswa dang shing dang 'dab ma dang lo ma dag phyogs gcig tu bsdus te/_gzings 'ching bar byed de/_gzings bcings te/_gzings la zhugs shing gzings la brten gzings la
[\[131a.7\]]gnas te/_lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsol ba rtsom par byed de/_ji ltar lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsol ba rtsom par byed pa de ltar sgrom spangs shing sbrul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom cig gi nang du bcug pa spangs par gyur cing /_gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa spangs par
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gyur cing /_gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa drung na nye bar spangs shing /_khang pa stong pa spangs shing /_grong 'joms pa'i rkun ma spangs par gyur cing /_chu bo chen po ri las 'bab cing rgyun ring la gting zab pa myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa ring du spangs par gyur cing /_tshu rol gyi ngogs
[\[131b.2\]]dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba spangs shing ring du byas par 'gyur zhing /_pha rol gyi ngogs zhi zhing bde ba dang grub pa dang bde legs su brgal nas pha rol tu phyin te tshangs shing gnas so/_/dge slong dag 'di ni ji srid du don shes par bya
[\[131b.3\]]ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin gyi/_'di'i don ni gzhan du blta bar bya ste/_dge slong dag sgrom cig ces bya ba ni lus kyi tshig bla dwags te/_gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa/_pha dang ma'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po las brten te skyes pa/_'bras chan dang zan dron gyis gsos pa/_
[\[131b.4\]]rtag par rgyun du brdzun pa slu ba yongs su 'jig pa'i chos can gyi tshig bla dwags so/_/sbrul gdug pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i tshig bla dwags so/_/de bzhi gang zhe na/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung ngo /_/dge slong dag sa'i khams 'khrugs na yang 'chi ba 'am 'chi ba la thug pa tsam gyi sdug
[\[131b.5\]]bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa lnga zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i tshig bla dwags so/_/gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa drung na nye ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dwags so/_/grong stong pa zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi skye mched rnams kyi tshig bla
[\[131b.6\]]dwags so/_/dge slong dag dge slong rigs kyi bu mig la stong pa nyid du lta bar byed cing dge slong dag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la rigs kyi bu de lta bas na stong pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur zhing brdzun pa nyid dang /_slu ba nyid dang /_snying po med pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_dge
[\[131b.7\]]slong dag rigs kyi bu mig la shin tu brdzun pa dang /_slu ba dang /_gsog dang /_snying po med par mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la shin tu brdzun pa dang /_slu ba dang /_gsog dang snying po med pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/grong 'joms
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]pa'i rkun po zhes bya ba ni phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi tshig bla dgas te/_gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong bas mig 'joms par byed do/_/rna ba sgras sna dris lce ros/_lus reg byas dge slong dag yid ni chos yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba rnams kyis 'joms par byed do/_/
[\[132a.2\]]dge slong dag chu bo chen po zhes bya ba ni chu bo bzhi po 'dod pa'i chu bo dang /_srid pa'i chu bo dang /_lta ba'i chu bo dang /_ma rig pa'i chu bo'i tshig bla dwags so/_/dge slong dag rgyun ring po zhes bya ba ni srid pa gsum po 'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa
[\[132a.3\]]gsum gyi tshig bla dwags so/_/tshu rol gyi 'gram dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i tshig bla dwags so/_/pha rol gyi 'gram zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang bde ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni phung po lhag
[\[132a.4\]]ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dwags so/_/gzings zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsol ba rtsom pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i tshig bla dwags so/_/pha rol tu phyin cing rgal la tshangs shing gnas so
[\[132a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dwags so/_/dge slong dag nyan thos rnams kyis dran par bya'o zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/kun dga' bo la gdams pa las kyang kun dga' bo
[\[132a.6\]]la gdams pa 'di ltar 'don te/_sring mo lus zhes bya ba ni lus kyi tshig bla dwags te/_gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa pha'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po las skyes pa 'bras chan dang zan dron gyis bskyed cing rtag tu 'drul zhing yongs su nyams pa 'jig cing rnam par 'gyur
[\[132a.7\]]ba'i chos can gyi tshig bla dwags so/_/de bzhin du gzhan las kyang ngo /_/dge slong dag khyed kyis yun ring por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi gtsug lag khang du bzhugs te/_de nas lam du gnas pa bzhi bcu po thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/_bsod
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]snyoms pa/_phyis mi len pa/_slob pa 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag yin la/_gang bdag gis 'di dag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ji ltar nye bar len pa med par zag pa dag las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas
[\[132b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong bzhi bcu'i tshogs la bos te/_dge slong dag sems can thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar ma rig pas bsgribs shing sred pas kun du sbyor ba/_sred pas bcings pa yun ring po nas 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi sngon
[\[132b.3\]]gyi mtha' mi shes so/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu mang ngam/_gang yang khyed cag gi yun ring po'i dus na 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags par gyur pa mang /_btsun pa ji ltar bdag
[\[132b.4\]]cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/_'di ltar chu bo chen po gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu bas bdag cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag 'dzag pa 'di nyid ches mang ngo /_/dge slong
[\[132b.5\]]dag legs so legs so/_/'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu bas khyod cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags par gyur pa ches mang ngo /_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas
[\[132b.6\]]'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu dang /_gang yang shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu mang ngam/_gang yang khyed cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags
[\[132b.7\]]pa mang /_btsun pa ji ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na 'di ltar na chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu dang /_gang yang shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu bas bdag cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags par gyur pa ches mang ngo /_/dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa
[\[133a.2\]]de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu bo dang /_gang yang shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu bas khyed cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags par gyur pa 'di nyid ches mang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge
[\[133a.3\]]slong dag khyed cag yun ring por glang po che dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/_glang po cher gyur cing lag pa bcad pa nyams su myong ba dang /_rkang pa bcad pa dang /_rna ba bcad pa dang /_mgo bcad pa dang /_so 'don pa lan du mar nyams su myong bar gyur cing /_lan du mar khrag zags par
[\[133a.4\]]gyur to/_/dge slong dag khyed cag khyi dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_ra dang /_ri dgas dang /_ma he dang /_phag dang /_khyim bya rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing khyim byar gyur te/_lag pa bcad pa nyams su myong ba dang /_rkang pa bcad pa dang /_rna ba bcad pa dang /_mgo
[\[133a.5\]]bo bcad pa dang /_mchu gcod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal du ma nyams su myong bar gyur cing lan mang du khrag zags par gyur to/_/dge slong dag khyed cag yun ring por rkun mar gyur te bzung ba dang /_mi gzhan gyis bzung ba 'phrog pa dang /_gzhan 'ching ba dang /_rgyun gcod pa dang /_bcings
[\[133a.6\]]pa 'grol ba dang /_chom rkun pa dang /_grong 'joms pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms pa dang /_yul 'joms pa dang /_ljongs 'joms pa yin no zhes bzung ba dang /_der lan du mar lag pa bcad pa nyams su myong zhing /_rkang pa bcad pa dang /_rna ba bcad pa dang /_sna bcad pa dang /_mgo bo
[\[133a.7\]]bcad pa nyams su myong zhing der lan du mar khrag zags par gyur to/_/dge slong dge slong dag khyed kyis yun ring por sdug bsngal drag pa tshab rtsub pa yongs su myong zhing dur khrod skyed do/_/khrag gi thigs pa blangs so/_/lan cig ma yin par dmyal ba dang /_lan cig ma yin par dud 'gro dang /_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]lan cig ma yin par yi dgas dang /_lan cig ma yin par ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag gzugs rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin snyam du sems/_btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'o/_/gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang
[\[133b.2\]]mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go 'di ni bdag ste/_'di ni bdag gi'o zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du
[\[133b.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin snyam du sems/_btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'o/_/gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba 'am/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa sdug bsngal ba/_gang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can de la 'phags
[\[133b.4\]]pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag ste/_'di ni bdag gi'o zhes bdag khas len par byed dam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir gzugs gang 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba 'am/_nang gi 'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa 'am/_phra ba
[\[133b.5\]]'am/_dman pa 'am/_gya nom pa 'am/_thag nye ba 'am/_rgyang ring ba 'am/_de thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi ma yin te/_bdag gi bdag med do zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par
[\[133b.6\]]shes pa gang cung zad 'das pa 'am/_ma 'ongs pa 'am/_da ltar byung ba 'am/_nang gi 'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa 'am/_phra ba 'am/_dman pa 'am/_gya nom pa 'am/_thag nye ba 'am/_rgyang ring ba de thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin zhing bdag ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi ma yin
[\[133b.7\]]no zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa gzugs la yid 'byung zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yid byung nas
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang bral nas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/grol nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/yang srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar
[\[134a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong bzhi bcu'i tshogs rnams nye bar len pa med par zag pa dag las sems rnam par grol lo zhes gsungs so/_/dmyal ba yi ni spyi tshugs yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[134a.3\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos bstan par bya yis de legs pa'i nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin zhe na/_dge slong dag skyes
[\[134a.4\]]pa 'am bud med tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can gang lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'am/_ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/_de'i dus na nad kyis thebs shing sdug bsngal zhing na la mal stan la 'dug cing khri dang stan gyi steng na 'dug pa la
[\[134a.5\]]lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa rnams kyis reg pa na gang yang de 'di ltar 'gyur te/_sngon gyi lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon du 'gyur zhing ches
[\[134a.6\]]gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste nyi ma nub pa'i dus na ri'am ri'i bang rim gyi grib ma sa la lhags par 'gyur/_rab tu lhags par 'gyur/_ches gsal bar lhags pa de bzhin du/_de 'di ltar gang gi tshe sngon gyi lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa
[\[134a.7\]]dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon sum du 'gyur te/_rab tu mngon du 'gyur zhing ches gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig pa byas te/_sdig pa byas so/_/drag po byas so/_/nyes par byas so/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bsod nams ma byas so/_/dge ba ma byas shing 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs pa'i skyabs ma byas pas pha rol du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes 'gyod pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/'gyod pa dang bcas te shi ba ni legs pa ma yin zhing dus byed pa dang pha rol du 'gro ba ni legs pa ma
[\[134b.2\]]yin no/_/'di ni 'gyod pa yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos gang zhe na/_dge slong dag skyes pa 'am bud med tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_
[\[134b.3\]]yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/_de'i dus na nad kyis thebs shing sdug bsngal zhing na la mal stan la 'dug cing khri dang stan gyi steng na 'dug pa la lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa rnams kyis reg
[\[134b.4\]]pa na gang yang de 'di ltar 'gyur te/_sngon lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa de'i tshe na mngon du 'gyur zhing /_rab tu mngon du 'gyur la/_ches gsal bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_nyi ma nub pa'i dus na ri'am ri'i
[\[134b.5\]]bang rim gyi grib ma sa la lhags par 'gyur/_rab tu lhags par 'gyur ches gsal bar lhags pa de bzhin du 'di ltar gang sngon lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon du 'gyur te/_rab tu mngon
[\[134b.6\]]du 'gyur zhing ches gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du kye ma bdag gis 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba byas te/_sdig pa drag po ma byas so/_/bsod nams byas so/_/dge ba byas shing 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs pa'i skyabs byas te 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro bar 'gyur
[\[134b.7\]]ro zhes 'gyod pa med par 'gyur te/_'gyod pa med par shi ba ni legs shing dus byed pa dang pha rol du 'gro ba ni legs pa yin te/_'di 'gyod pa yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bshad par bya'o zhes ji skad du bshad pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/'gyod pa dang bcas mi rnams kyi/_/'tsho ba shin tu dka' bar gnas/_/mi de rnams kyi 'gro ba dag_/gang du 'gro ba legs par nyon/_/yang sos dang ni thig nag dang /_/bsdus 'joms
[\[135a.2\]]ngu 'bod gnyis dang ni/_/tsha dang rab tu tsha ba dang /_/mnar med pa zhes bya ba ste/_/de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni/_/brgyad ces bya ste rgal bar dka'/_/drag po'i las kyis kun du gang /_/re re la yang lhag bcu drug_/rtsig pa bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang /_/rnam phyed ris su chad pa yin/_/lcags
[\[135a.3\]]kyi ra bas kun nas bskor/_/lcags dag gis ni gang ba yin/_/de nas lcags 'bar sa gzhi ste/_/'bar ba'i me dang ldan pa yin/_/dpag tshad stong phrag du mar ni/_/me lce dag gis khyab par gnas/_/ser sna can rnams 'dul byed pa'i/_/me lce'i sgra ni bsgrub par dka'/_/'joms
[\[135a.4\]]shing ba spu ldang ba dang /_/'jigs par byed cing sdug bsngal byed/_/yang dag sdom dang dka' thub can/_/drang srong rnams la skur 'debs pa/_/de dag spyi'u tshugs dag tu ni/_/dmyal bar lhung ba dag tu 'gyur/_/'tshed bzhin pa yi nya bzhin du/_/de dag drag pos 'joms shing 'tshed/_/
[\[135a.5\]]mtshon gyis bcom pa'i klu bzhin du/_/de dag rtag tu smre sngags 'don/_/'di ltar nyes par spyod pa rnams/_/'o dod chen pos smre sngags 'don/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ces bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[135a.6\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag mngal du 'jug pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dang /_shes bzhin du gnas pa dang /_'byung ba shes bzhin ma yin pa dang /_ma'i mngal du 'jug pa shes bzhin du ma yin gyi/_gnas pa dang /_'jug
[\[135a.7\]]pa shes bzhin dang /_ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_gnas pa yang shes bzhin du gnas pa yod do zhes gsungs so/_/'di rgyas par ni phra rgyas btab pa'i dbugs 'byung ba drug pa las blta bar bya'o/_/'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis las ni yod pa rnam par smin
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa ni yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das skya bseng gi grong khyer kol ma sha dam mya na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_
[\[135b.2\]]ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su byang ba tshangs par spyod pa/_gsal bar byed pa/_'di lta ste/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan par bya yis de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i
[\[135b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_mi skye ba ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_'gag pa gang du mi 'gro ste/_dge slong dag 'di ltar mig ni ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas kyang yongs su 'jig pa ste las ni yod do/_/rnam par smin pa ni yod do/_/chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa phung po 'di
[\[135b.4\]]'dor bar byed cing phung po gzhan nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa po ni mi dmigs so/_/de la chos su brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par
[\[135b.5\]]shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_
[\[135b.6\]]skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung /_'di ma skyes pas
[\[135b.7\]]'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa
[\[136a.2\]]dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/_dge slong dag thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge
[\[136a.3\]]ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa/_yongs su gsal bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par
[\[136a.4\]]bar tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/dang po nur nur po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_gnod sbyin dbang po'i khyim du mtshan mo gnas pa'i phyir gshegs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin dbang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar
[\[136a.5\]]'ongs te/_nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/srog gis ci zhig mi shes sam/_/srog gis ci zhig mi rtogs sam/_/srog ni
[\[136a.6\]]gang du bcings shing gnas/_/srog gi 'ching ba sred pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/srog gis gzugs rnams mi shes te/_/'du byed kyang ni rtogs ma yin/_/srog ni lus 'dir bcings shing gnas/_/srog ni 'ching ba sred pa yin/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni srog min
[\[136a.7\]]gsung /_/ji ltar tshang tshing 'dir gnas shing /_/ji ltar rim gyis gong bur 'gyur/_/ji ltar lus ni mngon 'phel 'gyur/_/dang por nur nur po yin no/_/nur nur po las mer mer po/_/mer mer po las nar nar skye/_/nar nar po las mkhrang 'gyur skye/_/mkhrang las rkang lag 'gyus pa dang /_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]skra spu sen mo la sogs dang /_/dbang po gzugs can rnams dang ni/_/mtshan rnams rim gyis skye bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe ma yis bzas pa dang /_/btung ba gnyis ka longs spyad pas/_/mngal gyi nang na gnas pa'i mi/_/des ni gso zhing skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas gnod sbyin dbang po bcom
[\[136b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/'di ltar/_gleng gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs las/_/zhes bya ba la mdor bstan pa brjod pa las 'di ltar 'don te/_kun dga'
[\[136b.3\]]bo ming dang gzugs la rkyen yod dam zhes 'dri na/_rkyen yod do zhes lan gdab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gang yin zhes 'dri na/_rnam par shes pa rkyen yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs so zhes ngas ji skad du
[\[136b.4\]]bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na/_khu ba dang khrag gi nur nur po'i nang du mngon par brgyal bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur ram/_
[\[136b.5\]]'phos par ma gyur na rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur nye bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo gal te byis pa dang /_gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma dang /_lang tsho'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par shes pa dang po nas 'di ltar chad cing ma byung bar gyur na ming dang gzugs 'di ltar rgyas shing
[\[136b.6\]]yangs pa rgya chen por 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo gal te rnam pa thams cad du rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs gdags par nus sam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir rgyu mtshan 'di dang /_rgyu 'di dang /_kun 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_rnam par shes
[\[136b.7\]]pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/_/'di ltar mdo de nyid las dge slong dag dge slong gis gang phan chad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gleng gzhi ni
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams bshad par bya yis de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di ltar
[\[137a.2\]]'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas/_'di 'ba' zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[137a.3\]]pa rnams ma byung yang rung ba 'di ni chos nyid de/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa'o zhes rang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mkhyen cing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ston par byed/_'chad par byed/_rab tu 'chad par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_'grel par byed/_rgyas par
[\[137a.4\]]byed/_ston cing yang dag par gsal bar byed de/_'di ltar skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_skye mched drug dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams te/_de bzhin
[\[137a.5\]]gshegs pa rnams byung ngam ma byung yang rung chos nyid de/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas so zhes de bzhin gshegs pas rang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mkhyen nas mngon par sangs rgyas nas ston par byed/_'chad par byed/_rab tu 'chad par byed/_rnam par 'byed par
[\[137a.6\]]byed/_'grel bar byed/_rgyas par byed/_ston cing yang dag par gsal bar byed de/_'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos rnams kyi gnas pa/_chos rnams kyi nges pa/_chos rnams kyi ji lta ba nyid/_de bzhin nyid/_mi 'gyur ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin
[\[137a.7\]]pa de bzhin nyid ji lta ba/_bden pa/_de kho na nyid/_ji lta ba bzhin mi 'gyur ba/_phyin ci ma log pa/_rkyen 'di tsam pa ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba go rims las bzlog pa ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'o/_/dge slong dag de la skye ba dang /_rga shi ni mi rtag pas 'dus byas bsags pa/_rten
[\[137b.2\]]cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i chos can/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can/_'gag pa'i chos can du de ltar yongs su shes par bya'o/_/skye ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_skye mched drug dang /_ming dang gzugs
[\[137b.3\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'du byed kyang mi rtag pa/_'du byas pa/_bsags pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i chos can/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can/_'gog pa'i chos can du de yongs su shes par bya ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes
[\[137b.4\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang yang 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin shes shing /_rab tu mthong zhing bar tu rig la/_rab tu rten cing rab tu yid la byas shing /_
[\[137b.5\]]legs par so sor rtogs na/_de ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam 'on te byung bar ma gyur/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na ci zhig tu byung bar gyur/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar byung bar gyur zhes sngon gyi mtha' rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung
[\[137b.6\]]bar 'gyur ram/_'on te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci zhig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes phyi ma mtha'i rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ci zhig 'di ji ltar yod pa ni ci zhig 'byung bar
[\[137b.7\]]ni ci zhig sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs shing 'chi 'pho ba na gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes nang gi bdag nyid la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang kha cig 'jig rten gyi lta bar gyur pa tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_bdag tu smra ba dang /_yang dag par ldan pa dang /_
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]mtshams sbyor bar byed par smra ba dang /_yang dag par ldan pa dang /_gso bar smra ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /_dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dag de'i tshe na yongs su shes shing yongs su spangs par 'gyur/_rtsa ba bcad par 'gyur
[\[138a.2\]]te/_shing ta la rtsa ba bcad pa ltar ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta
[\[138a.3\]]ba bzhin shes shing rab tu mthong zhing rab tu rig la rab tu yid la byas shing /_rab tu rten la legs par so sor rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams bstan par bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu
[\[138a.4\]]bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/ma rig pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu can du gsungs zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das skya bseng gi grong khyer kol ma sha dam mya na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag thog mar dge ba/_bar du
[\[138a.5\]]dge ba zhes bya ba nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa 'di lta ste/_rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya yis de legs par zhes bya ba nas bshad par bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu
[\[138a.6\]]mtshan dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_dge slong dag mig ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag mig gi rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag las ni rgyu/_las ni rkyen/_las ni rgyu mtshan no/_/dge slong dag las
[\[138a.7\]]ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o/_/dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni sred pa/_rkyen ni sred pa/_rgyu mtshan ni sred pa'o/_/dge slong dag sred pa yang rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]ste/_dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa/_rkyen ni ma rig pa rgyu mtshan ni ma rig pa'o/_/dge slong dag ma rig pa yang rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu ni gang /_
[\[138b.2\]]rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa/_rkyen ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa/_rgyu mtshan ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/_/dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang
[\[138b.3\]]bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o/_/dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_ming dang gzugs la brten nas ma rig pa las skyes pa yid la byed pa rnyog pa skyes te/_gang rmongs shing kun du rmongs la ma rig pa de sred pa
[\[138b.4\]]don du gnyer ro/_/sred pa dang bcas nas rnam par rig byed kyi las byed de/_dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rgyu can ma rig pa ni sred pa'i rgyu can/_sred pa ni las kyi rgyu can/_las ni mig gi rgyu can no/_/dge slong dag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus
[\[138b.5\]]dang /_yid kyang rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag yid kyi rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag yid kyi rgyu ni las/_rkyen ni las/_rgyu mtshan ni las so/_/dge slong dag las kyang rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan
[\[138b.6\]]dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni sred pa/_rkyen ni sred pa/_rgyu mtshan ni sred pa'o/_/dge slong dag sred pa yang rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni
[\[138b.7\]]gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa/_rkyen ni ma rig pa/_rgyu mtshan ni ma rig pa'o/_/dge slong dag ma rig pa rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu dang /_rkyen dang /_rgyu mtshan gang zhe na/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rgyu'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rkyen no/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rgyu mtshan no/_/dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rgyu dang bcas/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa
[\[139a.2\]]yang rkyen dang bcas/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/_dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ni gang /_rkyen ni gang /_rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/_dge slong dag yid dang /_chos la brten nas ma rig pa las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa
[\[139a.3\]]rnyog pa skyes te/_gang rmongs shing kun du rmongs la/_ma rig pa de sred pa don du gnyer ro/_/sred pa dang bcas na rnam par rig byed kyi las byed de/_dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rgyu can/_ma rig pa ni sred pa'i rgyu can/_sred pa ni las kyi rgyu can/_las ni
[\[139a.4\]]mig gi rgyu can te/_'di ni rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/_dge slong dag rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i chos bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du rgyu dang bcas/_rkyen dang bcas/_rgyu mtshan
[\[139a.5\]]dang bcas pa'i chos bshad par bya'o zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba la phung po'i sngon gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mdo mdzod gyi gnas gnyis par mi
[\[139a.6\]]ldan pa'i 'du byed kyi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skabs su bris pa blta bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyang bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du de ma thag kho nar dge slong dag khyed da la rten cing 'brel
[\[139a.7\]]par 'byung ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par bshad par bya zhes mdo bris pa blta bar bya'o/_/'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag rten cing 'brel
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]par 'byung ba'i thog ma dang /_rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya yis de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dang po gang zhe na/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
[\[139b.2\]]byed dang /_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len
[\[139b.3\]]pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kun du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig kun
[\[139b.4\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dngos po zhes bya'o/_/rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces 'byung ba ma rig pa gang zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /_sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa
[\[139b.5\]]dang /_nang mi shes pa dang /_phyi mi shes pa dang /_nang dang phyi rol mi shes pa dang /_las mi shes pa dang /_rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang /_rgyu mi shes pa dang /_'bras bu mi shes pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas mi shes pa dang /_
[\[139b.6\]]chos mi shes pa dang /_dge 'dun mi shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi shes pa dang /_rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang /_brten
[\[139b.7\]]par bya ba dang /_brten par bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_spang bya dang spang bya ma yin pa rnams dang /_dkar po dang /_nag po rnams dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang /_'di ltar reg pa'i skye mched drug 'di ltar yang
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor ma rig pa ste/_gang yang de dang de la mi shes pa dang /_ma mthong ba dang /_mngon par ma rtogs pa dang /_mun pa dang /_rmongs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ste 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed gang zhe na/_'du byed ni
[\[140a.2\]]rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed do/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes 'byung ba rnam par shes pa gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam
[\[140a.3\]]par shes pa'o/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes byung ba ming gang zhe na/_gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste/_tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/_/gzugs gang zhe na/_gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de
[\[140a.4\]]thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa ste/_gzugs 'di dang sngar bstan pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces 'byung ba skye mched drug gang zhe na/_nang gi skye mched drug ste/_mig
[\[140a.5\]]nang gi skye mched dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang gi skye mched do/_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes 'byung ba reg pa gang zhe na/_reg pa'i chos drug ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/reg pa'i
[\[140a.6\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes 'byung ba tshor ba gang zhe na/_tshor ba gsum ste/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes 'byung ba sred pa gang zhe na/_sred pa gsum ste/_'dod pa'i sred pa dang /_gzugs kyi sred pa dang /_
[\[140a.7\]]gzugs med pa'i sred pa'o/_/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes 'byung ba len pa gang zhe na/_nye bar len pa bzhi ste/_'dod pa nye bar len pa dang /_lta ba nye bar len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa'o/_/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes _
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'byung ba srid pa gang zhe na/_srid pa rnam pa gsum ste/_'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o/_/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes 'byung ba skye ba gang zhe na/_sems can de dang de dag sems can gyi ris mthun pa de dang [(]dar [,]der [)]skye zhing yang dag par skye ba dang /_
[\[140b.2\]]'jug pa dang /_mngon par grub pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_phung po thob cing khams dang skye mched thob la/_phung po mngon par grub cing dbang po dang grong mngon par rab tu byung ba ste 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes 'byung ba rga shi gang zhe na/_gang spyi ther dang /_skra dkar
[\[140b.3\]]dang /_'khyogs shing gnyer ma mang ba dang /_sgur po sgu bo/_gre ba sgra ngar ngar pos 'gags pa/_lus sgu zhing 'khar ba la brten pa/_sme ba'i thig les lus nyams pa/_lus bcings shing bcings pa dang /_dbang po rnams yongs su nyams shing yongs su smin pa dang /_'jig pa dang
[\[140b.4\]]'du byed rnams yongs su rnyings shing rgas par gyur pa 'di ni rga ba zhes bya'o/_/'chi ba gang zhe na/_sems can gyi skal pa mnyam pa de dang de las 'chi 'pho zhing 'jig la nub cing tshe dang drod nyams la phung po 'phos shing dbang po rnams 'gags te/_shi zhing dus byed par 'gyur ba 'di ni 'chi ba
[\[140b.5\]]zhes bya ste/_'chi ba 'di dang rga ba gnyis ga gcig tu bsdus nas rga shi zhes bya'o/_/'di ni rten cing 'brel par [(]'byang [,]'byung [)]ba'i rnam par dbye ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu
[\[140b.6\]]bshad do/_/'di lta ste glang po'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_glang po'i rjes lta bu'i mdo bar ma'i bdun po tha ma las bstan pa mdzod kyi gnas dang por blta bar bya'o/_/der bstan pa phyogs tsam 'di ltar 'don te/_sa'i khams gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sa'i khams ni rnam pa
[\[140b.7\]]gnyis te/_nang dang phyi rol gyi'o/_/nang gi sa'i khams kyang yod do/_nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang yang lus 'di la nang gi bdag nyid kyi sra ba dang /_mkhrang ba dang /_zin pa dang /_zin par gyur pa ste/_de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_so dang /_rdul dang /_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dri ma dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_rtsa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_snying dang /_glo ba dang /_mchin pa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_pho ba dang /_long ka dang /_gang rags par gyur pa ste/_gang lus 'di la sra ba dang /_mkhrang ba zin pa
[\[141a.2\]]dang /_zin par gyur pa 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/_nye bar 'ongs nas zhes bya
[\[141a.3\]]ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/ci bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba byas sam/_'on te gzhan zhig gis byas/_dge slong rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni ngas kyang ma byas la/_gzhan gyis kyang ma byas kyi/_de bzhin
[\[141a.4\]]gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rang nyid kyis mkhyen cing mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'chad par byed/_ston par byed/_rnam par 'byed par byed/_'brel pa dang ston cing yang dag par
[\[141a.5\]]gsal bar byed de/_'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du/_'di 'ba' zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di ltar 'di med pas 'di mi
[\[141a.6\]]'byung /_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces bya ba nas skye ba dang rga shi 'gag par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/dper na gzhan las ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams 'byung gi gzhan du ma rig pa'i
[\[141a.7\]]rkyen med par 'du byed rnams ma yin na zhes bya ba la/_yang dag par ldan pa'i gleng gzhi las dang ldan pa dang /_'bras bu can zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi [(]tshogs [,]tshigs [)]su bcad pa gsum pa'i mdo sa can las 'di ltar 'don to/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na skye ba'i rkyen med par rga shi 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_
[\[141b.2\]]skye mched drug dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ma rig pa yod na 'du byed 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na ma rig pa med par 'du byed rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa skye ba med na rga shi 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na skye ba 'gags pas rga shi
[\[141b.3\]]'gag par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dang srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_skye mched drug dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
[\[141b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na skye ba med na rga shi 'byung bar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis ni
[\[141b.5\]]tshangs pa'i dra ba las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin te zhes bya ba la/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_dge bsnyen stong dang /_slong mo za ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rgyal po'i
[\[141b.6\]]khab dang pa Ta li'i grong khyer gyi bar na rgyal po bzhugs sa smyug ma'i ldum bu can du mtshan mo bzhugs pa'i phyir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na kun du rgyu rab dga' zhes bya ba rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod
[\[141b.7\]]par byed do/_/kun du rgyu rab dga'i lhan cig gnas pa tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/_chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod de/_slob dpon dang nye bar gnas pa 'di gnyis ka yang lta ba gzhan dang gzhan du gyur cing /_'dod pa dang blo
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]tha dad par smra ba yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po bzhugs sa na 'dus par gyur cing 'dug pa de dag bar skabs su 'di lta
[\[142a.2\]]bu'i gtam gleng langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs pa ni ngo mtshar te/_gang gi phyir da ltar kun du rgyu rab dga' sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod/_chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyi bsngags
[\[142a.3\]]pa brjod ces bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po bzhugs sa na 'dus par gyur ces 'dug pa de dag 'di lta bu'i gtam brjod pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pas lha'i rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas gsan to/_/gsan nas
