[\[180b.5\]]nyi ma stong dang /_zla ba stong dang /_ri rab stong dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /_lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi stong dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum stong dang /_'thab bral stong dang /_dga' ldan
[\[180b.6\]]stong dang /_'phrul dga' stong dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong rnams la ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes brjod do/_/stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/_ji srid du nyi ma phyogs snang zhing gsal bar byed
[\[180b.7\]]pa de srid du stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/_nyi ma stong dang /_zla ba stong dang /_ri rab stong dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /_lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi stong dang /_sum
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]cu rtsa gsum stong dang /_'thab bral stong dang /_dga' ldan stong dang /_'phrul dga' stong dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong rnams te/_'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste/_dge slong dag
[\[181a.2\]]gang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong la ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/_ji srid du nyi ma phyogs gsal bar byed pa de srid du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams te/_nyi ma
[\[181a.3\]]stong dang /_zla ba stong dang /_ri rab stong dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /_lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi stong dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum stong dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul
[\[181a.4\]]dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong rnams la ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya la/_dge slong dag gang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong la stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya la/_gang
[\[181a.5\]]stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing yi rang ngo //_//yang
[\[181a.6\]]ji ltar snod rnams kyi tshad dang bye brag yod pa de bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang bye brag yod dam zhe na zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[181a.7\]]dge slong rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das de'i dus dang de'i dus la bab kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bstan du gsol/_dge slong
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin no zhes dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[181b.2\]]dge slong dag dmyal ba rnams kyi tshe'i nang na ches ring ba ni bskal pa ste de dag las dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na tshe ches ring ba ni bskal pa ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi nyin
[\[181b.3\]]zhag sum cu gang yin pa de yi dwags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag de nyid kyis nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig yin la/_zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin te/_de ltar brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ni yi dwags rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du
[\[181b.4\]]brtsis na lo stong phrag bco lngar 'gyur te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchu dang mgrin pa skams shing shin tu sdug bsngal ba/_/lus ni brag gi ri ltar che zhing mtho/_/rang gis
[\[181b.5\]]skra yis g.yogs shing rnam par bsgribs/_/shin tu rid cing kha ni khab mig tsam/_/gcer bu rang gi skra yis rnam par bsgribs/_/rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor shin tu mtho ba ste/_smre sngags 'don cing lag na ka pa la thogs/_/de dag bkres skom sdug bsngal gyis gdungs
[\[181b.6\]]shing /_/slong ba'i sgra 'byin tshor ba sdug bsngal myong /_/ser sna bsten cing phan tshun phrag dog gi/_/las kyi 'bras bus yi dwags 'jig rten skyes/_/dge slong dag shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/
[\[181b.7\]]dge slong dag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni nga yir bya ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/_tshe nges shing tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu 'gro ba khyad par can mtho ris su
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]'gro ste/_dge slong dag rnam pa 'dis na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/phongs pas sdug bsngal sems can
[\[182a.2\]]dag_/gzhan gyi nor dag 'dod byed cing /_/gzhan dag bkol zhing dman pa dag_/de dag dam pa sten mi byed/_/phyug cing nor rnams mang ba dang /_/nye bar longs spyod dang ldan pas/_/nor dang 'bras dang g.yog 'khor ldan/_/de dag dam pa ston par byed/_'di ni ji srid
[\[182a.3\]]'tsho'i bar du/_/bsod nams dge ba'i las byed pas/_/lha bzhin dga' ba dang ldan pa'i/_/phun sum tshogs pa chen po 'thob/_/lkog gyur ma yin 'di dag ltos/_/'jig rten bde ba gang cung zad/_/de dag sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni/_/nga yir med
[\[182a.4\]]cing yongs 'dzin med/_/gos mchog rab tu sten byed pa/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/de dag rnams la nad med cing /_/de na grang dang dro ba med/_/gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs/_/de ni ston gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gling na/_/ma tshang med cing dum bu min/_/
[\[182a.5\]]gtsang ba'i 'bru dag skye ba ste/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/nor bu'i 'od kyis de dag rnams/_/rtag tu gsal zhing mdzes par byed/_/gang de rnams la gtsang byed pa/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/de na tshod ma cung zad med/_/sran ma sogs kyang yod ma yin/_/kha dog dri
[\[182a.6\]]dang ror ldan pa'i/_/'bras dag rtag tu longs spyod byed/_/rdza ma gcig tu btsos pa ni/_/sten las langs par gyur gyi bar/_/snod du zad par mi 'gyur te/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/ku ba bzhin du 'bras gzhan gyis/_/bcad nas yal ga las slar skye/_/ma smin pa yang smin
[\[182a.7\]]par byed/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chu bo bzang /_/de dag chu bo shin tu bsil/_/'thungs na gnod par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/glu gar dag gi shing rnams kyis/_/de dag rtag tu dga' bar byed/_/rtag tu yid ni bde byed pa/_/de ni
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/glu gar shing gis rab mdzes shing /_/gos kyi shing dag mang po dang /_/spos shing phun sum tshogs pa dag_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/glu gar dri dang me tog dang /_/chos gos rnams la rtag tu ni/_/gang dang 'dra ba 'dod pa dag_/de dag de dang
[\[182b.2\]]'dra bar 'gyur/_/de dag sa gzhi 'jam pa ni/_/shing bal dag dang 'dra ba la/_/rtag tu rab tu dga' byed pa/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/de dag khro ba yod min te/_/phan tshun dag tu rtse zhing dga'/_/phrag dog ser sna med pa dag_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/mtshan gyi
[\[182b.3\]]thun ni dang po la/_/skad cig tsam du char bab pas/_/rdul dag sel bar byed pa ni/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/de dag yongs su 'dzin med de/_/ma yis bu yang ngo mi shes/_/mya ngan med cing dga' ba ste/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/ma yis lam stong dag tu ni/_/bskyur
[\[182b.4\]]nas 'gro bar byed pa na/_/mdzub mo'i rtse las 'o ma 'dzag_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/'ga' zhig shi na de dag rnams/_/ngu bar mi byed bskyur te 'gro_/gleng dag kha yis gtsang byed pa/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/shin tu yongs su bsrungs pa ste/_/glu dang gar gyis
[\[182b.5\]]dga' bar byed/_/rtsed 'jo dga' bar byed pa dag_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/mi rnams kyi ni tshe lo dag_/stong phrag rab tu zad pa na/_/gzhan dag tu ni 'chi byed pa/_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/mi yi lus kyi phan pa dang /_/longs spyod rgya chen la brten nas/_/lha yi nang
[\[182b.6\]]du skye ba dag_/de ni sngon gyi sbyin pa'i 'bras/_/dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe ni 'phel ba dang 'grib pa las shes par bya ste/_tshe tshad dpag tu med pa dang /_tshe lo stong phrag brgya bcu dang /_tshe lo brgya dang /_tshe lo bcu pa yang yin te/_dge slong dag da ltar ni
[\[182b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams yun ring du 'tsho na lo brgya thub la/_cung zad lhag pa yang yod de/_/tshad 'di tsam du yang dag pa'i bde ba myong bar byed do/_/dge slong dag lo brgya 'tsho ba na gnas skabs bcu nyams su myong bar gyur te/_sngas mtho ba la nyal ba'i byis pa ni gnas skabs
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]dang po'o/_/rtse zhing dga' ba'i rang bzhin can ni gzhon nu'i gnas skabs gnyis pa'o/_/'dod pa spyod cing lang tsho la bab pa ni gnas skabs gsum pa'o/_/spro ba dang stobs dang ldan pa ni gnas skabs bzhi pa'o/_/shes rab dang spobs pa dang ldan pa ni
[\[183a.2\]]gnas skabs lnga pa'o/_/dran pa dang dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can ni gnas skabs drug pa'o/_/nyes pa dang bcas par gyur pa gnas skabs bdun pa'o/_/rgyal pos shes shing dga' bar gyur pa ni gnas skabs brgyad pa'o/_/na zhing rgas par gyur pa ni gnas skabs dgu pa'o/_/
[\[183a.3\]]tshe dang yid dang bral bar gyur pa ni gnas skabs bcu pa ste/_dge slong dag tshe lo brgya 'tsho ba na gnas skabs bcu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshe lo brgya 'tsho ba na dus tshigs sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_dus tshigs brgya ni dgun no/_/dus tshigs brgya ni sos
[\[183a.4\]]ka'o/_/dus tshigs brgya ni dbyar ro/_/dus tshigs sum brgyar 'tsho ba na zla ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_dgun zla ba bzhi dang /_so ga zla ba bzhi dang /_dbyar zla ba bzhi'o/_/zla ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis su 'tsho ba na zla ba phyed pa brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'tsho bar
[\[183a.5\]]'gyur te/_dgun brgyad/_sos ka brgyad/_dbyar brgyad de/_zla ba phyed pa brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'tsho ba na nyin zhag stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_bcu gnyis ni dgun no/_/bcu gnyis ni sos ka'o/_/bcu gnyis ni dbyar ro/_/nyin zhag stong phrag sum cu
[\[183a.6\]]rtsa drug tu 'tsho ba na kha zas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/_gzhan ni phyed za ste/_de la 'di dag ni zas gzhan te/_khros pa na yang mi za/_sdug bsngal ba na yang mi za/_rtsol ba byed pa na yang mi za/_gso sbyong byed pa na yang mi za/_bya ba la chags pa na yang mi za/_rnyed
[\[183a.7\]]pa na yang mi za/_ma rnyed pa na yang mi za/_gnyid log pa na yang mi za/_smyo ba na yang mi za/_bag med pa na yang mi za ste/_za ba dang mi za ba gcig tu bsdus nas zas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ngas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bshad
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]cing /_'chi ba dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_nyin zhag dang /_zas dang /_zas gzhan yang bshad zin to/_/dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba
[\[183b.2\]]bcu gnyis la lo 'khor ba gcig yin la/_des lha'i lo lnga brgya ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/mi rnams kyi lo'i grangs su brtsis na lo stong phrag dgu bcur 'gyur te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin
[\[183b.3\]]zhag gcig yin la des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis lo'i 'khor gcig ste/_des na lo lnga brgya ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/mi'i tshe'i tshad du bgrangs na lo bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu dang /_/bye ba phrag stong ngo /_/dus ma yin par
[\[183b.4\]]'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/lus kyis nyes spyad spyod pa dang /_/ngag gi nyes spyad spyod pa dang /_/yid kyis nyes spyad spyod pa dang /_/gang yang skyon dag sdud byed pa/_/dmyal ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/_/yang
[\[183b.5\]]sos dag tu skye 'gyur te/_/lo ni bye ba stong phrag tu/_/yang sos dag tu bcom par 'gyur/_/phan tshun khon la dga' ba dang /_/skyes bu gnod pa byed pa dag_/dmyal ba dag gi las rnams kyis/_/yang sos dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag yang mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya gang yin
[\[183b.6\]]pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_des lha'i lo stong ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi grangs su brtsis
[\[183b.7\]]na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang 'bum phrag drug cu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de ni dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig tu 'gyur la/_des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin la/_des ni lo stong ni dmyal ba chen po thig
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]nag gi tshe tshad yin no/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi grangs su brtsis na lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang /_lo stong phrag bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/_dus mi yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
[\[184a.2\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas dge 'dun rnams dang ni/_/pha dang ma la brnyas pa dag/_thig nag dag tu skye 'gyur te/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/gzhan dag gnas nas skrod byed cing /_/skyes bu mdza' bo 'byed pa dag_/thig nag dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[184a.3\]]de bzhin dbyen dang brdzun dag dang /_/dmyal ba dag gi las rnams kyis/_thig nag dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni lha 'thab bral ba rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla
[\[184a.4\]]ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/_des na lha'i lo nyis stong ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi grangs su brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang /_lo 'bum phrag bzhi bcur 'gyur te/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nyid dmyal ba chen po
[\[184a.5\]]bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo nyis stong ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi grangs su brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu
[\[184a.6\]]gcig dang /_lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag gsum dang /_lo stong phrag bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad de/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge ba rnam gsum mi byed cing /_/mi dge rnam pa gsum byed
[\[184a.7\]]pa/_/dmyal ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/_/bsdus 'joms dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/ra dang lug dang ma he dang /_/khyim bya dang ni phag dag dang /_/de bzhin srog chags gzhan gsod pa/_/bsdus 'joms dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_/de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig_/des na lha'i lo bzhi stong ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/de nyid mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi grangs su brtsis na lo bye
[\[184b.2\]]ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_lo 'bum phrag drug cu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nyid dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi zhag gcig yin la des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu
[\[184b.3\]]'bod pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu dang /_lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gcig dang /_lo stong phrag bye ba phrag bzhi bcu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di
[\[184b.4\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag pa khrag dang bcas pa yis/_/srog dag gcod par byed pa dag_/sdig pa'i las dag kun spyod pa/_/ngu 'bod dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/chags dang bral bzhin ngu 'bod du/_/yun ring dag tu bsreg par 'gyur/_/sgyu dang tshul 'chos byed pa dag_/
[\[184b.5\]]'jigs pa'i skad dag 'don par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong phrag brgyad ni 'phrul dga'i lha
[\[184b.6\]]rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba brgya phrag sum cu dang /_lo 'bum phrag bzhi bcu ste/_dus mi yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nyid sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba
[\[184b.7\]]gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i stong phrag brgyad ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no/_/de nyid mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang /_lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lnga dang /_stong phrag bye ba phrag
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]lnga bcu rtsa gnyis te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lta ba'i thibs pos rab g.yogs shing /_/sred pas kun nas btul ba dang /_/sdig las kun du spyod pa dag_/ngu 'bod
[\[185a.2\]]chen por skye bar 'gyur/_/gnod pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /_khyim dag 'bigs par byed pa dag_/'bar zhing ba spu langs pa yi/_/ngu 'bod chen por sreg par 'gyur/_/mdza' bo 'byed par byed pa dag_/ral gyi bya rgod khwa dag gis/_bskor te za zhing 'joms par 'gyur/_/dge slong
[\[185a.3\]]dag gang mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong phrag bcu drug ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi lha'i tshe tshad yin no/_/
[\[185a.4\]]de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_lo [(]'brum [,]'bum [)]phrag drug cu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nyid dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig yin la/_des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig_/zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo
[\[185a.5\]]stong phrag bcu drug ni dmyal ba chen po tsha ba pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin te/_de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du bgrangs na lo bye ba bye ba phrag lnga brgya dang /_lo bye ba phrag sum cu dang /_lo 'brum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad khri dang /_stong phrag bye ba phrag drug cu ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/
[\[185a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang /_/dam pa pha dang ma rnams la/_/rab tu gdung bar byed pa dag_/rtag tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur/_/skye bo mang po rnams la ni/_/yongs su gdung zhing gnod byed pa'i/_/dmyal
[\[185a.7\]]ba yi ni las dag gis/_/tsha ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag khyed sems can dmyal ba chu bur can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad nyan par 'dod dam/_de bzhin te bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab po/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab kyis/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]la chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bstan du gsol/_de thos nas dge slong rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag des na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'di ni yul ko sa la'i til khal nyi shus gang
[\[185b.2\]]ba'i sbyang ba kha sdom cig yod par gyur la/_de las skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis lo brgya zhing til 'bru re re bton na/_dge slong dag yul ko sa la'i til khal nyi shu'i til sbyang mthar yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur ba ni ches myur gyi/_chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can
[\[185b.3\]]rnams kyi che'i mtha' ni ma yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/ji ltar chu bur can nyi shu gang yin pa de ni chu bur rdol ba ba gcig yin no/_/ji ltar chu bur rdol ba ba nyi shu gang yin pa ni so thams thams pa gcig yin no/_/ji ltar so thams thams pa nyi shu gang yin pa de ni a chu zer ba gcig yin no/_/ji ltar
[\[185b.4\]]a chu zer ba nyi shu gang yin pa de ni kyi hud zer ba gcig yin no/_/ji ltar kyi hud zer ba nyi shu gang yin pa de ni ut+pal ltar gas pa gcig yin no/_/ji ltar ut+pal ltar gas pa nyi shu gang yin pa de ni pad+ma ltar gas pa gcig yin no/_/ji ltar pad+ma ltar gas pa nyi shu gang yin pa de ni pad+ma chen po
[\[185b.5\]]ltar gas pa gcig yin no/_/gang gi phyir lha sbyin gyi phyogs pa dge slong ko ka li ka dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu la sems rab tu sdang bas sems can dmyal ba chen po pad+ma chen po ltar gas par skyes so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis ka ba tshig pa la yang gdug pa'i
[\[185b.6\]]sems bskyed par mi bya na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu'i skye ba thob pa dag_/kha nas rtsub pa'i tshig smra zhing /_/nyes par spyad pa smra byed
[\[185b.7\]]cing /_/bdag nyid rab tu 'joms par byed/_/gang zhig smad bya bstod byed cing /_/bstod bya smod par byed pa dang /_/kha nas 'thab cing rtsod pa dag_/bde ba myong bar mi 'gyur te/_/skad cig tsam gyi dus kyis kyang /_/rang gi nor dag 'phrog par byed/_/gang gi dus ni mang po ru/_/bde gshegs
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]yid rab sdang byed pa/_/chu bur rdol du stong phrag brgya/_/chu bur can du sum cu drug_/gang zhig 'phags pa smod byed cing /_lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa can/_/sdig sems mi bden smra ba dag_/bdag gis rab tu bsags nas ni/_/kha na ma tho med stobs las/_/de dag zad
[\[186a.2\]]cing spong byed 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi dge spangs pa 'dod pa yi/_/'bras
[\[186a.3\]]bu mtho ris skye bar 'gyur/_/mi 'dod pa yi las byed pa/_/rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur/_/dge sbyong dag dang bram ze dang /_/pha dang ma la gnod pa dang /_/de bzhin bla ma gnod byed pa/_/rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad
[\[186a.4\]]ni bskal pa gcig yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/gang gi phyir skyes bu rmongs pa lha sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis [(]khrug [,]khrag [)]phyung ba dang /_dge slong ma dgra bcom ma bsad pas rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes
[\[186a.5\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig 'phags pa'i bstan pa dang /_/chos kyis 'tsho ba'i 'phags pa la/_/rab tu khro bar byed pa dang /_/sdig can log lta ston byed pa/_/'bras bu mgul pa gcod pa dang /_/'bras bu rang
[\[186a.6\]]la gnod par 'gyur/_/'dod pa dag las ma grol na/_/sdig pa dag las grol mi 'gyur/_/dge ba dag las grol ba dag_/sdig can gdung las grol mi 'gyur/_/de dang de dag ma grol na/_/pha rol dag tu 'ching bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa 'ching bar mi 'gyur te/_sdig bcas byis pa
[\[186a.7\]]'ching bar 'gyur/_/rab tu 'tshe ba'i las byas pas/_/dmyal ba dag tu 'gro 'gyur te/_/dmyal ba'i las dag byas pa yis/_/mnar med dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lha'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa phyed yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig yin to/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshangs pa chen po'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i
[\[186b.2\]]tshad ni bskal pa gnyis te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad de/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/
[\[186b.3\]]dge slong dag dge chung gi lha rnams kyi che'i tshad ni bskal pa bcu drug ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag dge rgyas pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni
[\[186b.4\]]bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_dge slong dag sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed dang sum brgya ste/_
[\[186b.5\]]dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa lnga brgya ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong phrag gcig ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag
[\[186b.6\]]mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong phrag gnyis te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong phrag bzhi ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni
[\[186b.7\]]bskal pa stong phrag brgyad de/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong phrag bcu drug ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyi khri
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ste/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa drug khri ste/_dus
[\[187a.2\]]ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do/_/dge slong dag mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi srid pa'i mtha' ni
[\[187a.3\]]'di tsam ste/_srid par skye ba ni 'di tsam ste/_'di tsam gyis na 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba dang /_'ongs pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba zhes gdags so/_/dge slong dag srid pa dang srid par skye ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o/_/cung zad tsam dang skad cig tsam du
[\[187a.4\]]yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa'i bsngags pa nga mi smra ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag srid pa mngon par 'grub pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_'di lta ste/_mi gtsang ba ni chung yang dri mi zhim par gsal ba ste/_dge slong dag de bzhin du cung zad tsam mam skad cig tsam du srid pa mngon par 'grub pa'i bsngags pa
[\[187a.5\]]nga mi smra ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag srid pa mngon par 'grub pa ni sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar rgyug ste/_mngon par rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la mi 'grol lo/_/yang dang yang du dmyal ba dang /_/yang dang yang du dud 'gro dang /_/
[\[187a.6\]]yang dang yang du yi dgas dang /_/yang dang yang du ngan song ngan 'gror lhung ngo /_/dge slong dag de lta bas na de'i phyir khyed kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_srid pa dang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa bcad pa de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka'
[\[187a.7\]]stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo //_//dge slong dag klu chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag klu chen po brgyad po 'di dag ni bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis mi rdzi ba/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul nyams su myong bar byed/_so sor nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/_de dag gang zhe na/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo la sogs pa ste/_'di dag ni mthu dang 'phrul rab tu che ba ste/_rgya mtsho la brten
[\[187b.2\]]pa lha ma yin dang 'thab pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi dpung byed pa ste/_stobs che ba/_dug che ba/_gzi brjid che ba/_brang gis 'gro ba/_'thab mo'i tshul sna tshogs pa'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/til sbyang nang nas lo brgya zhing /_/til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_go
[\[187b.3\]]rims las bzlog par le'u gnyis pa'i de ma thag pa'i mdo las te/_dbyangs dang tshoms dang lha yi sgo/_/bram ze ko ka glog dang rgyal/_/yangs pa can reg nyon mongs dang /_/ko ka li ka srid mi rtag_/ces 'byung ba'i ko ka li ka'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i mdo las blta bar bya'o/_/nyi ma
[\[187b.4\]]bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni lung bar ma'i bdun pa las 'di skad du 'don te/_mdzod kyi gnas 'di nyid du sems can gzugs can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag kyang yod de zhes bya ba der mdo ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar 'du shes tha dad par shes par byed pa bris zin to/_/
[\[187b.5\]]'jig rten gdags pa las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di ltar 'byung ste/_dus mthar 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/_/sprin las chu dag mi 'byung ste/_/rtswa dang gel pa gso shing tshogs/_/nyi ma gcig gis sreg par 'gyur/_/de bzhin chu klung chung ngam grog_/nyi ma gnyis pas nyams shing skams/_/
[\[187b.6\]]chu klung ngam grog chen po dag_/gsum pa'i 'bar bas sreg par 'gyur/_/yid 'ong ma dros zhes bya'i mtsho/_/mi ma yin ldan rgya che ba/_/gtsang ba'i chu yis rab gang ba/_/nyi ma bzhi pas skams par 'gyur/_/'byung po phal chen tshogs kyi gnas/_/rin chen 'byung gnas 'jigs sgra
[\[187b.7\]]can/_/nyi ma bcu phyed pas gdungs shing /_/ma lus yongs su skams par 'gyur/_/sa dang rin chen bzhi rang bzhin/_/ri rab drug pas gdungs pa las/_/shin tu du ba 'thul bar 'gyur/_/bdun pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba yis/_/nyi ma bdun pas sreg par 'gyur/_/sa 'dzin pa
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]dang sa rnams ni/_/rab tu 'bar bas sreg par 'gyur/_/de nas me 'od rno zhing mtho/_/res 'ga' de yi 'od dag gis/_/dmyal ba dang ni yi dgas su/_/zhugs te rtag tu gdung zhing sreg_/gcod med shin tu 'od zer rno/_/gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa/_/rtag tu
[\[188a.2\]]gdungs pas nyams byed pa'i/_/rkun ma'i dpon po bdun zhes grags/_/'dod chags gzhal yas khang rnams dang /_/'dod pa'i rnam pa kun ldan pa'i/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams dang /_/shin tu yid 'ong 'dod lha'i tshogs/_/tshangs dang bcas pa'ang sreg par 'gyur/_/ri rab dang
[\[188a.3\]]ni sa chen dang /_/lha rnams zad cing 'gyur shes nas/_/blo ldan dam pa 'phags rnams blo/_/thar pa'i gnas la rtag 'jug gis/_/mdo las ni gtso bo smos zhes bya ba la/_rgyal po dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo gnyis pa las 'di ltar 'don te/_dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i
[\[188a.4\]]rgyal po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ji lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi 'khor lo rin po che 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de tshes bco lnga'i nyin par mgo bo khrus byas shing gso sbyong la gnas te/_khang thog tu song ste blon
[\[188a.5\]]po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa na/_shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong dang ldan pa lte ba dang mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_mdzes pa/_bzo bos ma byas pa/_lha rdzas thams cad pa/_gser gyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po
[\[188a.6\]]rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba tshes bco lnga'i nyin par mgo bo khrus byas te/_gso sbyong la gnas shing khang thog tu song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa na/_shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa lte ba mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa/_
[\[188a.7\]]mdzes pa bzo bos ma byas pa/_lha rdzas thams cad pa/_gser gyi rang bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes thos nas de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di snyam du ci bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin nam zhes/_des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po brtag par 'dod nas stan las langs te
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_lag pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo rin po che legs par blangs te lag pa g.yon par bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pas 'khor lo de sgyur zhing 'di skad smras te/_'khor lo rin po che bzang po 'dis sngon gyi 'khor los
[\[188b.2\]]sgyur ba'i lam las rgyal zhing rnam par rgyal bar byed par gyur cig ces smra'o/_/de nas 'khor lo rin po che dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po shar phyogs su steng gi nam mkha' la 'khor lo rin po ches mdun du lam drangs te mngon par 'phags te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur
[\[188b.3\]]ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che dang lhan cig dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'gro ba na 'khor lo rin po che gang du gnas pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa gnas par byed do//_//khams mang po pa'i mdo las ji skad bshad pa lta bu
[\[188b.4\]]ste/_gang snga phyi med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu 'byung ba 'di gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/gcig ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/gang snga phyi med par gling gcig tu 'khor los
[\[188b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po gnyis 'byung ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/gcig ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do zhes 'byung ba mdo las ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lung ring po'i bdun pa'i mdo las 'don pa lta bu ste/_mdzod kyi gnas dang por phyag 'tshal ba'i tshigs su bcad
[\[188b.6\]]pa 'di ltar de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos dang zhes bya ba der bris par blta bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo drug pa las/_de nas tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[188b.7\]]grogs po dge sbyong ngam bram ze tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa gang de dag gis nang du yang dag 'jog kyang khyed cag gi tshe dang mnyam pa dag byung ste/_dge sbyong ngam bram ze de dag ni nges par 'byung ba la nges par 'byung ba'i blo can/_nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa la yang nges par 'byung ba ma yin
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]pa'i blo can te/_de de tsam du nges par 'byung ba shes shing mthong ba'i gnas med do/_/yang grogs po khyed ni nges par 'byung ba la nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i 'du shes can/_nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa la nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes can te/_khyod ni nges par 'byung
[\[189a.2\]]ba shes pa'am mthong ba'i gnas med do/_/yang grogs po khyed ni sa la mngon par dga' ba/_sa la bsngags pa/_nga'i nye bar gnas pa/_dngos po la nye bar gnas pa/_nga'i ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byed pa/_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang sa gzhi dang lha dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang tshangs pa la
[\[189a.3\]]mngon par dga' ba tshangs pas bsngags pa/_nye bar gnas pa/_dngos po la nye bar gnas pa/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ba'o/_/tshangs pa de bzhin no/_/dngos po bdun po de dag gang yang rung ba zhig bdag gi grangs su 'gro ba'am/_der gyur pa'am/_de dang 'dra bar gyur pa'am/_
[\[189a.4\]]de lta bur gyur tam/_tshangs pa ngas ni brgyad po de dag dang khyod 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su shes so/_/khyod 'di lta bu rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o zhes rig go/_/ji ltar grogs po khyod kyis brgyad po de dag dang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su shes sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[189a.5\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ji srid nyi ma mun 'phrog cing /_/phyogs rab snang bar byed kyi bar/_/de srid stong gi 'jig rten du/_/'di ltar dbang sgyur rab tu byed/_/mchog dang mchog min rab tu shes/_/'dod chags bral dang bral min min/_/'di lta'i
[\[189a.6\]]dngos po'am dngos po gzhan/_/tshangs pa khyod kyis nyams su myong /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ji srid nyi ma mun 'phrog cing /_/phyogs rab snang bar byed kyi bar/_/de srid stong gi 'jig rten la/_/
[\[189a.7\]]bdag ni dbang rab sgyur byed la/_/mchog dang mchog min rab mkhyen cing /_/'dod chags bral dang bral min mkhyen/_/'di lta'i dngos po'am dngos po gzhan/_/tshangs pa nga yis nyams su myong /_/mdo las ji skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo dang
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]po dang gnyis pa'i mdo dang po las te/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung na rin po che sna bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[189b.2\]]'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che ni bdun pa ste/_dge slong dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba na rin po che bdun po de dag 'jig rten
[\[189b.3\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du rab tu byung na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran
[\[189b.4\]]pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_btang snyoms dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bdun pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[189b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag 'jig rten du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/gzhan yang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bzhin no zhes bya ba la/_rgyal po dang yang dag par
[\[189b.6\]]ldan pa'i mdo gsum pa dang bzhi pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi srid pa bar ma'i rnam par bshad pa mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa zhes bya bar bris zin to//_//sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ri dgas dgra'i ma'i
[\[189b.7\]]kun dga' ra ba na rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i gnas 'jog dang ba ra dwa dza gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_bsil khang nas babs te bsil khang gi grib ma zhig la 'chag cing bzhugs
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog gis bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka bsil khang nas babs te/_bsil khang gi grib ma la gcig pu 'chag cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa ba ra dwa dza la 'di skad ces smras te/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan
[\[190a.2\]]'das dgongs kyi dus na bsil khang nas babs te bsil khang gi grib ma la gcig pu 'chag cing bzhugs pa shes sam/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das 'chag cing gang na bzhugs pa der bcom ldan 'das las cung zad cig chos zab mo rab tu snang ba nyan pa'i rnyed pa thob par bya'o/_/de nas
[\[190a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog dang tshe dang ldan pa ba ra dwa dza gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig 'chag cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bse s+tha la
[\[190a.4\]]bos te/_khyed cag bram ze gnas 'jog dang ba ra dwa dza gnyis bram ze'i rigs las rab tu byung ste/_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngam/_bram ze kha cig 'di ltar yid du mi 'ong ba mi dga' ba 'ba' zhig yongs
[\[190a.5\]]su rdzogs pas rnam par smad pas rnam par smod par byed dam/_btsun pa de bzhin te/_bram ze dag yid du mi 'ong zhing mi dga' ba 'ba' zhig yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par smod pas rnam par smod par byed do/_/ji ltar khyed cag bram ze gzhon nu gnas 'jog dang ba ra dwa dza gnyis la yid du mi
[\[190a.6\]]'ong zhing mi dga' ba 'ba' zhig yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par smod pas rnam par smod par byed/_btsun pa bram ze rnams bdag cag la 'di skad du smra ste/_bram ze rnams kyi rigs ni mchog ste/_rigs gzhan ni dman pa'o/_/bram ze rnams ni rigs dkar ba ste/_rigs gzhan ni gnag
[\[190a.7\]]pa'o/_/bram ze rnams ni tshangs pa'i bu ste/_lto ba las skyes pa/_kha las skyes pa/_tshangs pa las skyes pa/_tshangs pas sprul pa tshangs pas byin pa las khyed cag rigs mchog btang nas rigs dman pa dag len par byed dam/_dkar po'i rigs gtang ste/_nag po'i rigs
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]len par byed dam/_gang gi phyir da ltar khyed cag dge sbyong mgo reg sdig pa'i grogs po skye dgu'i bdag po ma [(]yan [,]yin [)]pa rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ba ni ma legs shing ma rung ste/_shes rab cher nyams so zhes btsun pa 'di lta bu'i ngo bo yid du mi 'ong zhing mi dga' ba 'ba' zhig
[\[190b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pas rnam par smod pas rnam par smod par byed do/_/gnas 'jog bram ze rnams kyis gang smras pa de ni mi bden pa so sor ma brtags par smra ba ste/_ji ltar byis pa rmongs pa rnams 'di skad du smra ste/_bram ze rnams ni rigs mchog ste/_/gzhan ni rigs dman pa'o/_/
[\[190b.3\]]bram ze rnams kyi rigs dkar ba ste/_gzhan ni rigs gnag pa'o/_/bram ze rnams ni dag par byed pa/_bram ze rnams tshangs pa'i bu ste kha las skyes pa lto las skyes pa tshangs pa las skyes pa tshangs pas byin pa'o zhes smra ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas 'jog 'di ltar bram ze
[\[190b.4\]]rnams bag ma len pa dang /_bag ma gtong ba dang /_sbrum pa dang /_btsa' ba dang /_'o ma bsnun pa dang bram ze las skyes pa mthong zhing 'di ltar mngal nas skyes par mthong bzhin du brdzun du smra ba ste/_mi bden pa brjod bya ma yin pa brdzun du smra ba 'di skad du bram ze rnams kyi rigs ni mchog ste/_
[\[190b.5\]]rigs gzhan ni dman pa'o/_/bram ze rnams kyi rigs ni dkar ba ste/_rigs gzhan ni nag pa'o/_/bram ze rnams tshangs pas byin pa zhes smra'o/_/gnas 'jog 'di ji snyam du sems/_rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang /_
[\[190b.6\]]yid kyis nyes par spyod par byed la 'on te bram ze rnams ma yin nam/_btsun pa bram ze dang dmangs rigs dang rje'u rigs dag kyang lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dag spyod par bgyid do/_/gnas 'jog ji snyam du sems/_bram ze rnams
[\[190b.7\]]lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa spyod cing 'on te rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dag ma yin nam/_btsun pa bram ze rnams lus kyis legs par spyad pa spyod cing dag gis legs par spyad pa dang yid kyis legs
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]par spyad pa spyod la rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang ngo /_/gnas 'jog 'di ji snyam du sems/_rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag lus kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod cing ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyad nas de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis
[\[191a.2\]]lus zhig ste shi ba'i rkyen gyis ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing bram ze rnams ma yin nam/_'on te bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs kyang yin/_btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag kyang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa spyad/_ngag gis
[\[191a.3\]]nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyad nas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas 'jog de ji snyam du sems bram ze rnams lus kyis legs par spyad pa spyad cing ngag dang yid kyis legs par
[\[191a.4\]]spyad pa spyad nas de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur zhing rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag ma yin nam/_'on te rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs kyang yin/_btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang lus
[\[191a.5\]]kyis legs par spyad pa spyad cing /_ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa spyad nas de de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas 'jog de ji snyam du [(]sams[,]sems[)]/_rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag brnab sems dang /_
[\[191a.6\]]gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang /_the tshom rnams dang ldan zhing bram ze rnams ma yin nam/_'on te bram ze rnams kyang yin/_btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs
[\[191a.7\]]pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang /_the tshom rnams dang ldan no/_/gnas 'jog de ji snyam du sems bram ze rnams la brnab sems med cing gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom rnams med cing rje'u rigs dang dmangs
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rigs dag ma yin nam/_'on te rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang yin/_btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang brnab sems med pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom med pa dang ldan no/_/
[\[191b.2\]]bse s+tha de ji snyam du sems/_dmangs rigs rnams lus kyis gnyis byed cing ngag dang yid kyis gnyis byed la bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing bram ze rnams ma yin nam/_'on te bram ze rnams kyang yin/_btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang lus kyis gnyis
[\[191b.3\]]byed cing ngag dang yid kyis gnyis byed la bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo /_/gnas 'jog 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma bstan pa de dag dang /_rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag dang ldan zhing bram ze rnams ma yin pa dang /_gang ngas dge ba'i chos rnam pa mang
[\[191b.4\]]po yongs su bshad pa de dag las cha tsam dang bram ze rnams ldan zhing rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag ma yin na/_bram ze rnams kyi rigs ni mchog ste gzhan ni dman pa'o/_/bram ze rnams kyi rigs ni dkar ba ste gzhan ni rigs nag po'o/_/bram ze rnams ni dag par byed pa tshangs pa'i
[\[191b.5\]]bu ste kha las skyes pa skye ba las skyes pa tshangs pas byin pa'o zhes brjod pa legs par 'gyur na/_gnas 'jog gang bram ze rnams ni tshangs pa'i bu ste kha las skyes pa snying las skyes pa tshangs pa las skyes pa tshangs pas sprul pa tshangs pas byin pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba de ni nga la
[\[191b.6\]]yang dag par smra ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas te/_'di ltar tshangs pa zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/gnas 'jog ji snyam du sems/_de la bram ze rnams bag ma len pa
[\[191b.7\]]dang gtong bar gdags pa dang /_chu dang sngags dang bsam gtan dag bya bar 'os pa yin nam/_btsun pa bram ze rnams bag ma len pa dang gtong ba dang chu dang /_sngags dang bsam gtan dag bya bar 'os pa yin no/_/gnas 'jog gang las bag ma len pa dang gtong bar gdags pa shes shing
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]rigs su smra ba dang rus su smra ba dang lang tshor smra ba yang shes sam/_gnas 'jog sems can gang ris su smra bas bcings pa dang /_rtsod par smra bas bcings pa dag bla na med pa'i rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa mngon du byas pa dang mngon du byed par mi rigs so/_/gnas
[\[192a.2\]]'jog rigs su smra ba dang lang tshor smra ba btang ste/_bla na med pa'i rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa mngon du byas shing mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/_/gnas 'jog 'di ji snyam du sems/_rgyal po gsal rgyal la ko sa la ba rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas shing bsnyen bkur dang phyag bya zhing
[\[192a.3\]]thal mo sbyar bar byed dam/_btsun pa de de bzhin te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal sde rab tu pham byed la ko sa la pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/bse s+tha 'di ji snyam du sems/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal de bzhin
[\[192a.4\]]gshegs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal bar byed dam/_btsun pa de de bzhin te/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la gus zhing rab tu gus par byed do/_/gnas 'jog ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal de bzhin gshegs
[\[192a.5\]]pa la gus pa gus par 'jug pa ma yin gyi/_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rigs mthon po bdag ni rigs dma' ba/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni grags pa che ba bdag ni grags pa chung ba/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni nus pa che ba/_bdag ni nus pa chung ba/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni longs spyod che ba/_bdag
[\[192a.6\]]ni longs spyod chung ba zhes ma yin gyi/_'on kyang chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ko sa la'i rgyal po sde rab tu pham byed bsnyen bkur zhing bla mar byed mchod par byed de gus pa las kyang gus par 'jug go/_/gnas 'jog dkyil 'khor gsum po 'di dag ni 'dres shing rab tu 'dres pa
[\[192a.7\]]ste/_gal te dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos sems can thams cad mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa 'di lta ste mi nyid do/_/gsum gang zhe na/_rgyal rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_bram ze'i dkyil 'khor dang /_rje'u rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/_gnas 'jog rgyal rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]thog mar byung ba gang zhe na/_gnas 'jog gang 'jig rten 'di 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus yod de/_'jig rten 'di 'jig par gyur pa na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de na de dag gzugs can yid las byung ba/_dbang po ma nyams shing
[\[192b.2\]]tshang ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rdzogs pa/_mdzes shing kha dog dang ldan pa/_rang gi 'od can/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga'i ba'i zas can/_tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa dag ste/_de'i dus na sa chen po 'di chus gang zhing rgya mtsho dang cha'i rang bzhin
[\[192b.3\]]gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis mkhrang zhing spris ma lta bur gyur te/_'di lta ste 'o ma skol ba bsil mor gyur pa na steng du rlung gis spris ma mkhrang por gyur pa lta bu ste/_de bzhin du sa chen po rgya mtsho dang chu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i steng du rlung
[\[192b.4\]]gis mkhrang zhing spris ma lta bur gyur te/_de nas sa chen po 'di kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa/_'di lta bu'i kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan pa ste/_'di lta ste/_sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba lta bu'o/_/gnas 'jog 'jig rten 'di chags pa na 'jig rten
[\[192b.5\]]'dir 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas sems can tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad pa kha cig gnas de nas shi 'phos te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs can yid las byung ba dbang po tshang zhing ma nyams pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_
[\[192b.6\]]mdzes shing kha dog dang ldan pa rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa/_tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa dag go/_/de'i dus na nyi ma dang zla ba 'jig rten du rab tu ma byung ste/_rgyu skar dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_nyin
[\[192b.7\]]zhag dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_zla ba dang /_lo dag 'jig rten du ma byung zhing skyes pa dang bud med du gdags pa yang med de/_gzhan du na sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de na sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis sor mo'i rtse mos de'i ro myangs
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]so/_ji lta ji ltar ro myangs pa de lta de ltar 'dod par gyur to/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rim gyis kham gyi zas yongs su spyod par gyur to/_/sems can de sor mo'i rtse mos sa'i ro myong bar byed cing /_ji lta ji ltar myang ba de lta de ltar 'dod par gyur
[\[193a.2\]]cing ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rim gyis kham gyi zas yongs su spyod par byed pa sems can gzhan de rnams kyis mthong ste/_mthong nas sa'i ro la sor mo'i rtse mos ro myong bar byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar myang ba de lta de ltar 'dod par gyur ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rim gyis
[\[193a.3\]]kham gyi zas yongs su spyod par byed do/_/gang yang sems can de dag sa'i ro'i kham gyi zas rim gyis yongs su spyod par byed pa na/_sems can de dag gi lus la lci ba nyid dang rtsub pa nyid du zhugs shing mdzes pa dang 'od nub cing mun pa dag 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/_'jig
[\[193a.4\]]rten du mun pa byung na nyi ma dang zla ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin te/_rgyu skar dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_nyin zhag dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_zla ba dang /_lo yang 'jig rten du rab tu byung bar gyur te/_/de dag kha zas de za zhing dus ring zhing yun
[\[193a.5\]]ring du gnas te/_de dag las nyung zhing ches nyung bar za ba de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur la/_gang mang zhing ches mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis su gyur te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis las sems can de dag khyod ni kha dog
[\[193a.6\]]ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang po yin no zhes phan tshun brnyas pa byed par gyur to/_/sems can de dag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rtag tu byed pa'i rgyus sa'i ro de dag nub par gyur to/_/sa'i ro de nub pa dang sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas 'di skad du
[\[193a.7\]]kyi hud ro kyi hud ro zhes nyam thag pa'i smre sngags 'don to/_/'di lta ste/_mi'i nang na rngan pa cung zad tsam thob nas sngon gyi mi rnams kyi yi ge dang tshig 'bru'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa lta bu ste/_kyi hud ro kyi hud ro zhes de skad du smra bar byed do/_/gnas 'jog 'di ltar sa'i ro de nub
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]pa dang sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas 'di skad du kyi hud ro kyi hud ro zhes smre sngags 'don cing 'di skad du rjod par byed kyang de dag gis ngas smras pa'i sgra ni 'di/_ngas smras pa'i don ni 'di zhes sgra dang don ni mi shes so/_/gnas 'jog sa'i ro de nub pa dang sems can de dag la
[\[193b.2\]]sa'i zhag cig byung bar gyur te/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/_'di lta bu'i kha dog dang ro dang ldan pa ste/_'di lta ste/_dong ka'i me tog lta bu/_ro 'di lta ste sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba lta bu'o/_/de dag zas de la za zhing dus ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/_de dag las gang nyung zhing
[\[193b.3\]]ches nyung bar za ba de dag ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur la/_gang mang zhing ches mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis su gyur te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis las sems can de dag khyed ni kha dog ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang ba yin
[\[193b.4\]]no zhes phan tshun brnyas pa byed par gyur te/_sems can de dag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rtag tu byed pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag de yang nub par gyur to/_/sa'i zhag de nub pa dang sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas 'di skad du kyi hud ro kyi hud ro zhes nyam
[\[193b.5\]]thag pa'i smre sngags 'don te/_'di lta ste/_de ltar mi rnams kyi nang na rngan pa cung zad tsam thob nas sngon gyi mi rnams kyi yi ge dang tshig 'bru'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa lta bu ste/_kyi hud rA sa kyi hud rA sa zhes smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/gnas 'jog sa'i zhag de nub pa
[\[193b.6\]]dang sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas 'di skad du kyi hud ro kyi hud ro zhes smre sngags 'don zhing rjod par byed kyang ngas smres pa'i sgra ni 'di/_ngas smras pa'i don ni 'di zhes sgra dang don dag ni mi shes so/_/gnas 'jog sa'i zhag de nub pa dang sems can de dag la myu gu'i tshal
[\[193b.7\]]kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/_'di lta bu'i kha dog dang ro dang ldan pa ste/_'di lta ste/_ka dam+pa'i me tog lta bu/_'di lta bu'i ro ste 'di lta ste sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba lta bu'o/_/de dag kha zas de za zhing dus ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/_de
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]dag las gang nyung zhing ches nyung bar za ba de dag kha dog dang ldan par gyur la/_gang mang zhing ches mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis su gyur te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis las sems can de dag
[\[194a.2\]]la khyod ni kha dog ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang ba yin no zhes brnyas pa byed par gyur te/_sems can de dag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rtag tu byed pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de yang nub par gyur to/_/gnas 'jog myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang sems can de dag 'dus
[\[194a.3\]]shing tshogs nas 'di skad du mdun du song mdun du song zhes smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/'di lta ste da ltar mi rnams la gang cung zad tsam rtsa rno ba de dag gis skrod cing skrod par byed nas sngon gyi mi rnams kyi yi ge dang tshig 'bru'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa lta bu ste/_mdun du song mdun du song zhes
[\[194a.4\]]smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/gnas 'jog myu gu'i tshal de nub pa dang /_sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs shing mdun du song mdun du song zhes smre sngags 'don par byed kyang ngas smras pa'i sgra ni 'di/_ngas smras pa'i don ni 'di yin zhes smras pa'i sgra dang don ni mi shes so/_/gnas
[\[194a.5\]]'jog myu gu'i tshal de nub pa dang /_sems can de dag la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu pags pa dang shun pa med cing gtsang la dag pa sor mo bzhi'i tshad tsam gyis 'khrigs pa dgongs ka brngas na nang par skye zhing /_nang par brngas na dgongs ka skye ba/_brngas shing brngas shing skye ba/_
[\[194a.6\]]brngas pa dang skye ba yang mi shes pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/de dag de za zhing tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang yang sems can de dag ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu zas su za ba dang yongs su spyod pa na dbang po tha dad pa dag byung bar gyur te/_gcig la ni pho'i dbang po/_gcig la ni mo'i
[\[194a.7\]]dbang po/_de dag pho dang mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag phan tshun du mig gis mig la btsugs te lta bar byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar mig gis mig la btsugs te lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/_/ji lta ji ltar chags pa de lta de ltar sred do/_/ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]log par zhugs so/_/sems can de dag log par zhugs pa sems can gzhan gyis mthong nas rdul dag gtor bar byed/_gseg ma dang gyo mo dag 'thor zhing 'di skad du/_kye sems can grong pa bya ba ma yin pa byed pa/_sems can grong pa bya ba ma yin pa byed pa da ltar sems can
[\[194b.2\]]sun 'byin pa byed dam/_zhes smra bar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_da ltar mi'i nang nas bag ma gtong ba na phye ma dag 'thor bar byed/_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dag kyang 'thor zhing bu mo bde bar gyur cig_/bu mo bde bar gyur cig ces smra ba lta bu ste/_de bzhin du sems can de dag log
[\[194b.3\]]par zhugs pa sems can gzhan gyis mthong nas rdul dag 'thor bar byed cing gyo mo dang gseg ma dag kyang 'thor zhing 'di skad du/_kye sems can grong pa bya ba ma yin par byed pa/_grong pa bya ba ma yin pa byed pa da ltar sems can dag sun 'byin par byed dam zhes smra bar byed do/_/gnas
[\[194b.4\]]'jog gang sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa de ni da ltar chos su mngon par 'dod la/_gang sngon 'dul ba ma yin pa de ni da ltar 'dul bar mngon par 'dod cing /_gang sngon smad pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar rjes su bsngags te/_lan gcig dang lan gnyis dang gsum dang bdun gyi bar du sten
[\[194b.5\]]bar byed do/_/gang yang sems can 'di dag chos ma yin pa'i shin tu sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs len cing gnas pa na 'di skad du bdag cag khyim dag byas la der bya ba ma yin pa bya'o zhes khyim bya ba'i 'du shes skyes so/_/khyim gyi rtsom pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i dang po ni de yin no/_/de dag
[\[194b.6\]]ni chos dang chos ma yin pa yin la/_'di ni chos dang chos te/_mchog tu gyur pa ni rgyal po'i dbang po'o/_/de dag nub mo bza' bar bya ba'i sA lu nub mo len cing nang par bza' bar bya ba nang par len du 'gro ba las/_de nas sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis
[\[194b.7\]]dgongs ka dang nang par gnyis dus gcig tu blangs so/_/de nas sems can gzhan de dag gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can bdag cag sA lu len pa'i phyir cha bar bya'o/_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can dag shes par gyis shig_/bdag
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]gis ni dgongs ka dang nang par dus gcig tu blangs so/_/de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_kye ma thabs 'di rab tu legs te/_bdag cag gis ni nyin zhag gcig nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du blang bar bya'o zhes sems can de dag gis nyin zhag gcig
[\[195a.2\]]nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sA lu blangs so/_/gang yang sems can de dag ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu sog 'jog gis spyod cing nye bar longs spyod pa na sA lu de dag shun pa dang sbun pa can du gyur cing brngas shing brngas pa dag kyang phyir mi skye la brngas pa dag kyang shes par gyur te/_
[\[195a.3\]]sA lu de dag ris su chad cing ris su gnas par gyur te/_de nas sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas smre sngags 'don par byed de/_bdag cag sngon gzugs can yid las byung ba/_dbang po ma nyams shing tshang ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_mdzes shing kha dog
[\[195a.4\]]dang ldan pa/_nam mkha' la thogs pa med par 'gro ba/_dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa ring du gnas te/_bdag cag la sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa dag byung la bdag cag gis ro de kham gyi zas su rim gyis yongs su longs spyad pa las lci ba dang
[\[195a.5\]]mkhrang ba lus la zhugs pas mdzes pa dang 'od nub cing mun pa 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/bdag cag de dag za zhing dus ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/_bdag cag de dag nyung bar za ba de dag ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur la/_gang ches mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas
[\[195a.6\]]rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis las sems can de dag khyod ni kha dog ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang ba yin no zhes phan tshun brnyas pa byed par gyur te/_de dag bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rtag tu byed pa'i rgyus sa'i ro de nub ste/_sa'i zhag
[\[195a.7\]]byung bar gyur te/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa ste/_bdag cag de za zhing tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/bdag cag de dag las ches nyung bar za ba de dag ni kha dog dang ldan la/_gang ches mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog dang mi ldan par gyur te/_zas
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis su gyur to/_/de dag bdag cag kha dog rnam pa gnyis las sems can de dag khyod ni kha dog ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang ba yin no zhes phan tshun brnyas pa byed par gyur te/_bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
[\[195b.2\]]rtag tu byed pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag de nub par gyur to/_/myu gu'i tshal zhig byung bar gyur te kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa ste/_bdag cag de za zhing tshe ring zhing dus ring du gnas te/_bdag cag de las gang ches nyung bar za ba de dag ni kha dog dang ldan par
[\[195b.3\]]gyur la/_gang mang bar za ba de dag ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/_zas rnam pa gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis su gyur te/_kha dog rnam pa gnyis las de dag khyod ni kha dog ngan zhing nga ni kha dog bzang ba yin no zhes phan tshun brnyas pa byed par gyur te/_bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rtag tu
[\[195b.4\]]byed pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de dag nub ste ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu dag byung ste/_sbun pa dang lkog med cing gtsang ba sor bzhi tsam gyi 'khor ba nang brngas na nub skyes zhing nub brngas na nang skye ba brngas shing brngas shing yang skye ba brngas pa dang skyes pa yang mi shes pa dag byung ste/_bdag
[\[195b.5\]]cag de za zhing tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/_/gang yang bdag cag 'bras sA lu sog 'jog tu longs spyod par byed pa na sA lu de dag spun pa dang shun pa dang bcas par gyur cing brngas shing brngas pa dag kyang mi skye la/_brngas pa dang skyes par yang shes so/_/ris dang ris su gnas par gyur
[\[195b.6\]]to/_/da ni bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs te zhing dag bgo bar bya/_mu dang mtshams dag gcad par bya'o zhes smras te/_de 'dus shing tshogs nas zhing dag 'god par byed/_mu 'dren cing mtshams dag 'jog par byed do/_/gnas 'jog 'di ni 'jig rten na mtshams byung ba rnams kyi dang po
[\[195b.7\]]ni 'di yin te/_chos dang chos ma yin pa'o de la chos kyi chos ni 'di yin te/_rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos mchog go/_/de nas sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig gis rang la sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi la ma byin par blangs so/_/de nas sems can de sA lu rang la yod bzhin du ma byin par
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]len pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyed rang la sA lu yod bzhin du ci'i phyir gzhan gyi la ma byin par len par byed/_sems can khyod phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig ces smra bar byed de/_des lan gnyis lan gsum du
[\[196a.2\]]rang la sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi la ma byin par blangs pa dang /_sems can de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du mthong nas sems can de la/_kye khyod rang la sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi la ci'i phyir ma byin par len pa song shig ces smras so/_/de dag gis phar 'dren tshur 'dren byed cing
[\[196a.3\]]tshogs kyi nang du smod cing bshung ba'i bar du byed do/_/kye sems can khyod rang la sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi la ci'i phyir ma byin par len par byed ces smras so/_/de nas sems can de dag la sems can des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can dag sems can 'dis sA lu'i phyir phar
[\[196a.4\]]'dren tshur 'dren cing tshogs kyi nang du smad pa'i bar du byas so/_/de nas sems can de dag gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye sems can khyod rang la sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi la ci'i phyir ma byin par len te/_khyod sA lu'i rgyu las 'dren pa dang tshogs kyi nang du smod pa'i bar du
[\[196a.5\]]byung gis phar song shig_/phyin chad de ltar ma byed ces smras so/_/de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_sA lu'i rgyu las 'dren pa dang phan tshun tshogs kyi nang du smod pa'i bar du byung ba ma mthong ngam/_bdag cag rnams 'dus shing tshogs te bdag cag las gzugs bzang ba
[\[196a.6\]]mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_nus pa che ba zhig btus te zhing gi dpon por bskos te gang bdag cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba de dag chad pas gcod cing /_phan gdags par bya ba de dag la phan 'dogs par bya zhing bdag cag gi zhing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba de la chos dang ldan pa'i dpya
[\[196a.7\]]dag sbyin par bya'o zhes sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas sems can de dag la mdzes pa gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa stobs che ba zhig btus te zhing gi dpon por bskos so/_/des sems can chad pas gcad par bya ba dag chad pas gcod cing phan gdags par bya ba dag
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]phan 'dogs par byed cing sems can de dag gi zhing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba chos dang ldan pa'i dpya dag 'bul bar byed do/_/skye bo mang pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /_/zhing srung pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya ba'i ming byung
[\[196b.2\]]ngo /_/tshul khrims 'phel zhing rgyas par spyod pa dang /_shes rab 'phel zhing rgyas par spyod pa ste/_chos kyi skye dgu dga' bar byed pas rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /_/gnas 'jog 'jig rten du rgyal rigs kyi dkyil 'khor byung ba rnams kyi dang po ni 'di yin no/_/de yang chos kyi ste chos ma
[\[196b.3\]]yin pas ni ma yin te/_de la chos ni 'di yin te/_chos rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos so/_/gnas 'jog bram ze rnams kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten du byung ba rnams kyi dang po gang zhe na/_de nas sems can de dag las sems can kha cig yongs su 'dzin pa ni nad/_yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'bras/_
[\[196b.4\]]yongs su 'dzin pa ni zug rngu/_yongs su 'dzin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba zhes rig nas grong las dgon par song ste/_yal ga dang 'dab ma dag bsdus te khang pa byed de/_nang za ba nang par grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug cing nub za ba nub mo grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug pa na/_
[\[196b.5\]]de nas sems can de dag sems can de la 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di ni dka' ba spyod pa ste yongs su 'dzin pa ni nad/_yongs su 'dzin pa ni zug rngu/_yongs su 'dzin pa ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes rig nas grong las dgon par song ste/_yal ga dang 'dab ma dag
[\[196b.6\]]bsdus te khang pa byed do/_/de nang par za ba nang par grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug_/dgongs ka za ba'i phyir dgongs ka grong du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par byed de/_de la sbyin par bya zhing mchod par bya ba yin no zhes shes so/_/de nas sems can kha cig bsam gtan gyi bde ba
[\[196b.7\]]dang rab tu dben pa'i bde ba ma rtogs te/_phyogs gcig tu song nas sa'i khang pa byas te bdag cag 'dir gsang sngags dag bcing bar bya/_rig byed dag bcing bar bya'o zhes de dag de na gsang sngags dag 'ching zhing rig byed dag 'ching bar byed do/_/de nas sems can kha cig bsam gtan gyi bde ba
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]dang /_rab tu dben pa'i bde ba dag mngon par ma rtogs te/_gsang sngags 'ching ba dang rig byed 'ching ba dag mngon par ma rtogs na slar yang grong gi mthar song ste khang pa sgo bzhi pa dag byas te gnas par byed do/_/bdag cag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bya ste/_dge sbyong
[\[197a.2\]]dang bram ze 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag la ji ltar nus pa stobs ji lta bar bsod snyoms dag sbyin par bya'o zhes de de na sbyin pa dag gtong /_bsod nams dag byed cing dge sbyong dang bram ze 'gro zhing 'ong ba la nus pa ji lta ba dang stobs ji lta bar bsod snyoms dag sbyin par byed do/_/grong las dgon pa rten cing
[\[197a.3\]]gnas yid phyir phyogs shing yid phyogs pas bram ze bram ze zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /_/yang dngos po gang bsam gtan byed pa de dag la bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /_/dgon pa las slar yang grong du zhugs pa de dag ni grong pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /_/gnas 'jog 'jig
[\[197a.4\]]rten du bram ze'i dkyil 'khor byung ba rnams kyi dang po ni 'di yin no/_/de yang chos yin gyi chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/de la 'di ni chos chos kyi mchog rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos so/_/gnas 'jog dmangs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten du byung ba rnams kyi dang po gang yin zhe na/_
[\[197a.5\]]de nas sems can brtson 'grus can kha cig khang pa so sor byas nas bzo'i gnas kyi las la gnas par byed de/_kye sems can 'di dag ni brtson 'grus brtsams shing khang pa so sor byas nas bzo'i gnas kyi las la gnas pas de yang dmangs rigs dmangs rigs zhes bya ba'i ming byung
[\[197a.6\]]ngo /_/gnas 'jog 'jig rten du dmangs rigs kyi dkyil 'khor byung ba rnams kyi dang po ni 'di yin no/_/de yang chos yin gyi chos ma yin pas ni ma yin te/_de la chos ni 'di yin te rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos so/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum 'jig rten du byung ba na dkyil 'khor bzhi
[\[197a.7\]]pa yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal rigs kyi rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs gos ngur smrig bgos te/_yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ni rgyal rigs rnams kyis mngon par brjod cing phyag btsal ba dang thal mo sbyar ba'i las bya bar rigs pa yin zhing /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bram ze'i rigs dang dmangs rigs kyis kyang mngon par brjod cing thal mo sbyar ba'i las bya bar rigs pa yin no/_/bram ze'i rigs dang rje'u'i rigs dang dmangs rigs kyi rigs kyi bu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
[\[197b.2\]]rab tu byung ba ni rgyal rigs kyis mngon par brjod cing phyag bya ba dang thal mo sbyar ba'i las bya bar rigs pa ma yin zhing /_bram ze'i rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs kyis kyang mngon par brjod cing phyag btsal ba dang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud pa'i las bya bar 'os pa yin no/_/
[\[197b.3\]]gnas 'jog rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang rnams kyi nang na rgyal rigs mchog yin gyi/_bram ze ni ma yin te/_gnas 'jog tshangs pa stong gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rigs su gyur pa'i rten byed pa'i/_/rkang gnyis rnams la rgyal rigs mchog_/rig pa dang ni rkang
[\[197b.4\]]par ldan/_/lha dang mi yi nang na mchog_/ces tshangs pa stong gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang yin pa de ni legs par bshad pa yin zhing nyes par bshad pa ma yin la/_legs par brjod pa yin zhing nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/_nga yang 'di skad du/_rigs su gyur
[\[197b.5\]]pa rten byed pa'i/_/rkang gnyis rnams la rgyal rigs mchog_/rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan/_/lha dang mi yi nang na mchog_/ces smra'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa gnas 'jog dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba ra dwa dza gnyis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol
[\[197b.6\]]lo zhes gsungs so/_/bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dus pa gsum pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa las sngon gyi slob dpon mdo 'don pa bzhin te/_gnas rnam pa gsum gyis bskal pa mthar 'byin par byed de/_mtshon dang nad dang mu ge'o/_/gsum
[\[197b.7\]]po de dag ni bar gyi bskal pa ste/_mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang /_/nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'o/_/'jig pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_mes 'jig pa dang chus 'jig pa dang /_rlung gis 'jig pa'o/_/'jig pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'od gsal
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]dang dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dag ste/_gang gi tshe 'jig rten mes 'jig pa de'i tshe 'od gsal gyi lha dag 'jig pa'i rtse mor 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'jig rten chus 'jig pa de'i tshe dge rgyas kyi lha dag 'jig pa'i rtse mor 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'jig rten rlung gis
[\[198a.2\]]'jig pa de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig pa'i rtse mor 'gyur ro/_/mdo las ji skad du sdug bsngal gyi dbang po 'gags so zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong lnga po 'di dag ni dbang po ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang /_sdug bsngal gyi
[\[198a.3\]]dbang po dang /_yid bde ba'i dbang po dang /_bde ba'i dbang po dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o/_/dge slong yid mi bde ba'i dbang po ni skye ba yin zhing yid bde ba'i dbang po ni skye ba yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de yang rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen dang bcas pa
[\[198a.4\]]rnam pa dang bcas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis yid mi bde ba'i dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen de dag rtag pa zhig gam mi rtag pa zhig_/yang de 'di snyam du gyur te/_gang
[\[198a.5\]]yid mi bde ba'i dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa'i yid mi bde ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag gang las rtag par 'gyur zhes de yid mi bde ba'i dbang po skyes shing byung ba dag mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/rtsol ba dang bcas
[\[198a.6\]]par rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_so sor rab tu zhi bar rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_de la 'di'i sems nye bar sdud do/_/gang du 'di'i yid mi bde ba'i dbang po skyes shing byung ba ma lus par yongs su 'gag par 'gyur zhing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs
[\[198a.7\]]par 'gyur/_gang du 'di'i sems sdud par 'gyur/_gang du 'di'i yid mi bde ba'i dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag par 'gyur zhe na/_'di ni dge slong 'dod pa las dben zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'dir 'di'i sems nye bar bsdus
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]shing 'dir 'di'i yid mi bde ba'i dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gags shing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par gyur te/_'di ni dge slong 'di lta ste yid mi bde ba'i dbang po nges par 'byung ba la mkhas shing lhag par bya'o zhes bya'o/_/dge slong sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni skye ba
[\[198b.2\]]yin zhing sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni 'byung ba yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de yang rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen dang bcas pa rnam pa dang bcas pa 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de 'di snyam du rgyu gang dang rkyen gang
[\[198b.3\]]gis sdug bsngal gyi dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen de dag rtag pa zhig gam mi rtag pa zhig_/de 'di snyam du gang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag rtag
[\[198b.4\]]par lta ga la 'gyur zhes de sdug bsngal gyi dbang po skyes shing byung ba dag mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/rtsol ba dang bcas par rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_so sor nub par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa ste/_de la de'i sems nye bar sdud do/_/gang 'di'i sdug
[\[198b.5\]]bsngal gyi dbang po skyes shing byung ba ma lus par yongs su 'gag par 'gyur zhing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing gang du 'di'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag par 'gyur zhe na 'di na dge slong rtog pa dang
[\[198b.6\]]dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'dir 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing 'dir 'di'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag shing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur te/_'di ni dge slong
[\[198b.7\]]'di lta ste sdug bsngal gyi dbang po'i nges par 'byung ba la mkhas shing lhag par byang ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong yid bde ba'i dbang po ni skye ba yin zhing yid bde ba'i dbang po ni 'byung ba yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de yang rgyu dang bcas shing rkyen dang bcas pa rnam pa dang
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bcas pa mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de 'di snyam du 'gyur te/_gang yid bde ba'i dbang po skyed par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang rkyen gang yin pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi dbang po bzhin rgyas par
[\[199a.2\]]bya ste/_gang du 'di'i sems sdud par 'gyur gang du 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa dag ma lus par yongs su 'gag cing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur zhe na/_'di na dge slong dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral zhing zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan gsum pa
[\[199a.3\]]bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'dir 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing 'dir 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa dag ma lus par yongs su 'gag cing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par gyur te/_dge slong 'di lta ste yid bde ba'i dbang po nges par 'byung ba la
[\[199a.4\]]mkhas shing lhag par bya ba zhes bya'o/_/dge slong bde ba'i dbang po skyes shing byung ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so zhes bya ba sdug bsngal gyi dbang po bzhin brjod par bya'o/_/gang du 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing gang du 'di'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ma lus par yongs su
[\[199a.5\]]'gag cing ma lus par yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur zhe na/_'di na dge slong bde ba spangs shing zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'dir 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing /_'dir 'di'i bde ba'i dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag
[\[199a.6\]]cing zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du bde ba'i dbang po'i nges par 'byung ba la mkhas shing lhag par byang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong btang snyoms kyi dbang po skyes shing byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de yang rgyu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi dbang po
[\[199a.7\]]bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/_gang du 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing gang du 'di'i btang snyoms kyi dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag cing ma lus par zad cing gtugs par 'gyur zhe na/_'di ni dge slong rgyu mtshan thams cad dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_sems kyi rgyu mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin lus
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]kyis mngon sum du byas shing gnas te/_'dir 'di'i sems nye bar sdud cing 'dir 'di'i btang snyoms kyi dbang po ma lus par yongs su 'gag cing ma lus par zad cing gtugs par 'gyur te/_dge slong 'di lta ste 'di ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po'i nges par 'byung ba la mkhas shing lhag
[\[199b.2\]]par byang ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa ni nang bdag nyid kyi skyon dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la bar ma yang dag par ldan pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa las/_'jig rten dang po zhes bya ba'i mdo las te/_'char byed 'di na dge slong 'dod pa las
[\[199b.3\]]dben zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs te/_gang 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs zhe na 'di na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni
[\[199b.4\]]'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs so/_/gzhan yang dge slong rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te nye bar gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs
[\[199b.5\]]pa ste/_gang 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs she na/_dga' ba dang bcas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs so/_/gzhan yang dge slong dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral zhing bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs
[\[199b.6\]]te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'dir 'di dag 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs pa ste/_gang 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs she na/_'di ni bde ba 'di ni bde ba zhes bya ba ste 'di 'phags pa rnams kyis g.yo ba dang
[\[199b.7\]]bcas par gsungs so/_/gzhan yang bde ba spangs te/_bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste 'di tsam ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mi g.yo bar gsungs so/_/chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las mdzod kyi
[\[200a\]]
