[\[219b.2\]]dang /_mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams phan tshun dpung pa dag bsnun/_'gyel te kha rog par gyur/_dpa' zhum par gyur/_phrag pa zhum par gyur/_spobs pa med par gyur te sems pa la zhugs te gnas so/_/ston
[\[219b.3\]]pas [(]'ang [,]'ong [)]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ji srid nyi ma ma byung ba/_/de srid srin bus snang bar byed/_/nyi ma shar bar gyur pa na/_/snang ba med cing nag por gyur/_/ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_/ma byung bar du rtog ge snang /_/rdzogs sangs 'jig rten snang ba na/_/rtog ge mi snang
[\[219b.4\]]nyan thos min/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje 'di snyam du skyes bu rmongs pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa la yun ring ba nas nye bar 'tsho'o snyam pas gang gis na mu stegs can gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi khang pa mi snang bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i rlung dmar dang char pa dag btang ba dang /_de las kha cig ni
[\[219b.5\]]'jigs nas ri phug tu zhugs so/_/kha cig ni rtswa'i phug tu/_kha cig ni nags kyi phug tu/_kha cig ni kun dga' ra bar/_kha cig ni lha khang du/_kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi khang par zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi
[\[219b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul chen po dang lha dang lha rnams kyi mthu chen pos ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi khang pa la char thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bab pa rnam pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jigs pas
[\[219b.7\]]skrag pa'i mi rnams ni/_zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang yang 'di ltar 'don te zhes bya ba la/_re zhig reg pa bzhi pa'i mdo de dang de las te/_de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog grags pa'i bu chos mthong ba/_chos thob
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]pa/_chos rig pa/_chos kyi rnam grangs rtogs pa/_chos la the tshom las brgal zhing som nyi las brgal ba/_gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba chos la mi 'jigs pa thob pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
[\[220a.2\]]thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so/_/rab tu 'phags so/_/btsun pa bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_'di nas bzung
[\[220a.3\]]ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong zhing skyabs su 'gro ste mngon par dad do zhes gsungs te/_'di yang mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par tshe zad pas 'chi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas bris zin to/_/gang yang mdo las ji skad du dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la yang skyabs su song
[\[220a.4\]]shig ces bya ba la reg pa bzhi pa'i mdo de las 'di skad 'don te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis la bos te/_khyed cag sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig_/chos la skyabs su song shig ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
[\[220a.5\]]la yang skyabs su song shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la yang skyabs su mchi'o zhes gsungs so/_/bstan bcos las 'di skad
[\[220a.6\]]du zhes bya ba la ye shes la 'jug pa las gang ji skad du gang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de ci zhig la skyabs su 'gro zhe na/_chos gang dag dang ldan nas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa dang 'dogs pa dang ming dang tha snyad du bya ba ste/_sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro zhes
[\[220a.7\]]gsungs so/_/ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi sgo bzhi pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga par rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa 'di ltar 'don to/_/btsun pa ji ltar nad pa zhes bya ba la 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi sgo bzhi pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]las/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la dris pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji skad du nad pa bskyang zhing ji ltar nad pa gso bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs par ji ltar bde bar nad pa bskyang bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/shAkya nang
[\[220b.2\]]pa rnams zhes bya ba la 'dul ba mu tig gi sgo dang po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa las te/_de las ji skad du myos par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa nyid du rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa
[\[220b.3\]]ma spangs shing /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba ma spangs pa'o/_/chos bzhi po 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni mkhas pa gsal ba skyes bu dam pa zhes bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa spangs
[\[220b.4\]]shing srog gcod pa las slar log pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa las log par g.yem pa dang /_'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
[\[220b.5\]]pa ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa zhes bya ste/_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_tshig rtsub mo dang /_tshig kyal pa ma spangs pa'o/_/chos bzhi po 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni mkhas pa gsal ba skyes bu dam pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_brdzun du
[\[220b.6\]]smra ba spangs pa dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal ba spangs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/lus dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i tshoms las 'don pas srog gcod pa dang phra ma bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba yang nyes par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gang yang bcom ldan
[\[220b.7\]]'das kyis ji skad du zhes bya ba la 'dul ba'i rab tu byung ba'i gzhi las 'di ltar 'don te/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig_/bzhi po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di ltar rab tu byung
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos su gsungs te/_de dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gis ltung bas dge slong ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur na/_dge slong ma yin/_dge sbyong ma yin/_shAkya'i bu ma yin te/_dge slong
[\[221a.2\]]gi dngos po nyams shing bcom par 'gyur te/_dge sbyong gi dngos po zhig cing ltung ba dang pham pa dang phyir gsor mi rung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bcos su med cing sngon por 'gyur du mi rung la 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur du mi rung ba de bzhin du dge slong
[\[221a.3\]]'di lta bu'i ngo bo'i myos par 'gyur ba 'thung na yang dge slong ma yin/_dge sbyong ma yin/_shAkya'i bu ma yin te/_dge slong gi dngos po las nyams shing bcom par 'gyur te/_de'i dge sbyong gi dngos po zhig cing lhung ba dang /_pham pa dang /_phyir bcos su mi rung bar 'gyur ro zhes
[\[221a.4\]]gsungs so/_/'di dag ni 'dul ba las bstan te zhes bya ba la/_rnam par 'byed pa'i pham pa dang po las 'di skad du 'don te/_yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_ming gi dge slong dang /_khas 'ches pa'i dge slong dang /_slong bas na dge slong dang /_nyon
[\[221a.5\]]mongs pa bcom pa'i dge slong ngo /_/ming gi dge slong gang zhe na/_gang ming dang ming du brjod pa dang /_nges tshig dang btags pa dang rig byed dang /_tha snyad du dge slong zhes bya ba dang /_dge slong gi rigs dang /_spyir dge slong zhes brjod pa ste/_'di ni ming gi dge slong zhes bya'o/_/khas 'ches
[\[221a.6\]]pa'i dge slong gang zhe na/_dge slong ma yin bzhin du dge slong zhes bdag nyid khas 'che zhing rkun mar gnas bzhin du bdag nyid dge slong zhes khas 'che ba ste/_'di ni khas 'che ba'i dge slong zhes bya'o/_/slong bas na dge slong gang zhe na/_gang chos dang ldan par slong zhing 'tsho bar byed pa ste/_'di ni
[\[221a.7\]]slong bas dge slong zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i dge slong gang zhe na/_gang gi zag pa dang bcas pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yang srid par nad dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba de dag spangs shing yongs su shes par gyur cing rtsa ba
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]nas bcad de/_shing ta la mgo bcad pa bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba mnyam pa mi skye ba'i chos can du byas pa ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa bcom pas na dge slong zhes brjod do/_/don 'di la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong yin par dgongs te/_de
[\[221b.2\]]yang khro ba med pa dang gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/dge 'dun gyi longs spyod pas kham bu gcig kyang ma gnang zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/mu stegs can gyi nyan thos dag 'dun pas don du gnyer nas bya ba byed pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
[\[221b.3\]]mthong zhing rig nas 'di snyam du mu stegs can gyi nyan thos dag 'dun pas don du gnyer nas nyes par bshad pa'i chos la mu stegs kyi bya ba byed na/_bdag kyang skye bo mang pos dge 'dun la yon dbul bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na
[\[221b.4\]]ba der song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag kyang skye bo mang po'i tshogs dag dge 'dun la yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/
[\[221b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis bskul bar gyis shig_/khyim bdag gis bskul nas 'di skad du 'phags pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskul bar mdzod cig dang de ltar na bdag cag gi mdzes par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i skabs de lta bu dge slong rnams kyis
[\[221b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis de la grogs dag sbyin par bya'o/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_gal te sgrogs par byed na bdag cag las bsod nams mang por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[221b.7\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis bsgrag par bya'o/_/khyim bdag 'di lta bu'i zhes bsgrag par bya'o/_/des 'di skad ces 'phags pa rnams kyis bsgrags na bdag cag la bsod nams chen por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis bsgrag par bya zhing
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/_/der sgrib pa dang bcas nas 'khor lo la 'dzeg par bya'o/_/der tshad pa dang char pas gnod na gtsug lag khang bya'o/_/der skye bo mang po'i tshogs 'dus pas bsgribs shing mi mthong na sgo bzhi gdod par
[\[222a.2\]]bya zhing sgo bzhi'i steng du 'dzegs te bsgrag par bya'o/_/gos kyi rnyed pa mang du byung bas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyal byed kyi tshal gang bar byas so/_/der ma byin par len pa dag gis phrogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzlog par bya'o/_/gzhan gyi ltung
[\[222a.3\]]ba dag sdud pa yang 'gegs par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang yang phrogs pa dag bzlog par bya'i gang bcings pa dag ni bzlog par mi bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
[\[222a.4\]]tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/_ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/_shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/_rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa/_'dud par bya ba/_rab tu 'dud par bya ba/_thal mo sbyar bar bya ba/_'dun par
[\[222a.5\]]bya ba/_'jig rten gyi bla na med pa'i yon gnas de dag la gos kyi phreng ba 'di dag bdag 'bul lo zhes smras so/_/de nas so so'i skye bo dag 'di skad du bdag cag 'ching ba mtha' dag pa rnams kyis 'di dag mi 'thob po zhes smras so/_/de nas slob pa dag 'di skad du/_bdag ni kun tu
[\[222a.6\]]sbyor ba dag gis lhag ma dang bcas pas bdag cag gis kyang mi 'thob po zhes smras so/_/mi slob pa dag 'di snyam du zhes bya ba nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba zhes bya ba nas rgyas par ro/_/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyed cag nga'i drung na
[\[222a.7\]]bsam pa thag pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pas tshangs par spyad pa spyod dam zhes smros shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis nga'i drung na bsam pa thag pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod cing tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dag la kha zas ro brgya pa dang /_brgya stong ri ba'i gos dang /_gzhal yas khang lnga brgya dag
[\[222b.2\]]gzhang mod kyi/_'on kyang dge slong dag yongs su longs spyod pa ni lnga ste/_bdag pos yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_skal bas yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_rjes su gnang bas yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_bu lon gyis yongs su longs spyod pa dang /_rku bas yongs su longs
[\[222b.3\]]spyod pa rnams so/_/de la bdag pos yongs su longs spyod pa ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/skal bas yongs su longs spyod pa ni slob pa'o/_/rjes su gnang bas yongs su longs spyod pa ni so so'i skye bo dge ba'i chos can rnams so/_/bu lon gyis yongs su longs spyod pa ni yang yang lhung
[\[222b.4\]]ba dag go/_/rku bas yongs su longs spyod pa ni tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams te/_rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung zhing dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba rnams la ni rjes su ma gnang ste/_dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dge 'dun gyi zas la kham su gcig tsam dang /_gnas sa phyi rting
[\[222b.5\]]gang tsam yang ma yin no/_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis byung ba dag yang dag par bgo bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa bskrad par bya'o zhes gsungs na gang gis bskrad
[\[222b.6\]]par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge 'dun gyis so/_/ji ltar bskrad par bgyi/_de'i snod dag gdon par bya'o/_/'dug rten dag gzhan du bsgyur bar bya zhing /_/lhung bzed kyi gzhi rten yang gzhan du bskyur zhing /_bar bur gyi snod kyang gzhan du bskyur bar bya'o/_/btsun pa gal te skrod pa na
[\[222b.7\]]ka ba la 'ju na ji ltar bskyur bar bya/_ka ba gcad par bya'o/_/de gang gis slar bsab par bya/_dge 'dun gyis so/_/gal te de sgo skyes la 'ju na/_sgo skyes bton par bya'o/_/gang gis de slar bsab par bya/_/dge 'dun gyis so/_/'dul ba'i gleng gzhi gnyis pa'i sdom gyi tshigs
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]su bcad pa bdun pa dang po las de skad du 'don to/_/shing rul dag ni bsal bar bgyi/_zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das tsam pa ni rdzing gi 'gram na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du
[\[223a.2\]]gdan ji lta ba bzhin bshams pa la bzhugs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo [(]sngan [,]stan [)]las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas bcom
[\[223a.3\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus shing tshogs nas mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan
[\[223a.4\]]'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang rang gi stan la ji lta ba bzhin 'dug go/_/de nas mtshan mo'i thun dang po 'das shing thun bar pa la bab pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa
[\[223a.5\]]mtshan mo'i thun dang po 'das shing thun bar ma la bab lags gyis/_bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_de skad ces gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan
[\[223a.6\]]pa kun dga' bo yang rang gi stan la 'dug go/_/de nas mtshan mo thun dang po 'das shing bar ma yang 'das la/_thun tha ma snang ba byung bar chas shing ring po mi thogs par skya rengs 'char ba'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[223a.7\]]btsun pa mtshan mo'i thun dang po 'das shing bar ma yang 'das la/_thun tha ma la bab ste snang ba byung bar chas shing da ni ring po mi thogs par skya rengs 'char ba'i dus la bab kyis/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun yun ring du bzhugs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das so sor thar
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor yongs su ma dag pa de srid du dgag gis khyod rang gi stan la ji lta ba bzhin 'dug cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang gi stan la ji lta
[\[223b.2\]]ba bzhin du 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dus shing 'dug par gyur te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang la dgongs nas/_kun dga' bo dge slong
[\[223b.3\]]gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor yongs su ma dag pa de srid du dgag gis khyod rang gi stan la ji lta ba bzhin 'dug cig ces gsungs/_bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la blta bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sems ting nge 'dzin gang la mnyam
[\[223b.4\]]par gzhag na dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la bltas pa ni dge slong gzhan zhig tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can nang rul pa dung gi
[\[223b.5\]]sgra ltar kun du spyod pa/_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba zhig dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug pa mthong ngo /_mthong nas stan las langs te dge slong de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste/_sgo'i phyi rol du bton
[\[223b.6\]]te/_'di skad ces skyes bu rmongs pa nyams pa khyod phar song 'di ni khyod dge slong gi tha ma ste/_deng nas bzung ste dge slong gi gnas khang ngam longs spyod la ji ltar sngar bzhin du longs spyod par ma byed cig ces smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge slong de sgo'i phyi
[\[223b.7\]]rol du bton nas sgo lcags bcug cing lde mig dag bsdams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang la dgongs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]skad ces kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su ma dag pa de srid du dgag gis zhes bka' stsal pa'i dge slong de bdag gis dpung pa nas bzung ste/_sgo'i phyi rol du bton lags so/_/'di skad ces skyes bu rmongs pa nyams pa khyod phar song /_
[\[224a.2\]]'di ni khyod kyi dge slong gi tha ma ste/_de nas bzung ste dge slong gi gnas khang ngam longs spyod la ji ltar sngar bzhin du longs spyod par ma byed cig ces smras te/_de sgo'i phyi rol du bskrad nas sgo lcags bcug ste lde mig bsdams te mchis lags kyis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
[\[224a.3\]]'dun bzhugs nas ring du lon gyis/_bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don du gsol/_maud gal gyi bu skyes bu rmongs pa des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags pa mthong ngam/_ston pa dang /_dge slong gi
[\[224a.4\]]dge 'dun mtshan thog thag gtses pa mthong ngam/_ji ltar da lta skyes bu rmongs pa des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags nas song ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na khyed cag nyid kyis dang por zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pas phyis zla ba
[\[224a.5\]]phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_maud gal gyi bu dge slong gi 'khor yongs su ma dag par de bzhin gshegs pas zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bton na skyes bu rmongs pa de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/maud gal
[\[224a.6\]]gyi bu 'di lta ste/_'di ni dge slong tshangs par spyod pa gzhon zhing rab tu gzhon pa rnams dang de 'di ltar 'gro ba dang 'ongs pa dang lta ba dang rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang brkyang ba dang chos gos snam sbyar len pa dang /_lhung bzed len pa la 'dra ste/_ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi spobs pa'i
[\[224a.7\]]ltung ba gang rung ba zhig 'gal bar byed pa na/_de yang dge 'dun gyi sbom po gang yang rung ba dag gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la dge slong rnams 'di snyam du dge sbyong sun 'byin par byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge sbyong gi sre da ste des dge slong 'dus pa 'di dag yang dag par
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]rangs pa lta bus nyams par byas shing dge sbyong sun 'byin par ma gyur cig snyam ste/_'di lta ste/_zhing pa'i khyim bdag dag nas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir nas kyi skyon du gyur pa de dang 'dra ba'i sre da rtsa ba nas 'don par byed de/_'di lta ste/_nas gzhan dang sdong bu dang
[\[224b.2\]]'dab ma dang /_yal ga dag 'dra zhing /_'di lta ste/_ji srid du mgo bo ma byung gi bar du nas gzhan dang 'dra zhing /_mgo bo byung bar gyur pa na zhing pa'i khyim bdag de 'di snyam du 'di ni nas rlag par byed pa ste nas kyi sre da byung ngo snyam nas khyim bdag zhing pa des zhing pa gzhan dag kyang
[\[224b.3\]]rlag par byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes 'di dag rtsa ba nas bcad cing bskyur bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin du de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed len pa dag la 'dra bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dge slong dag pa gzhan dag kyang sun 'byin par 'gyur du 'ong zhes
[\[224b.4\]]bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di lta ste/_zhing pa'i khyim bdag dag dbyar 'das te ston gyi dus na chu 'gram gyi yur ba dge 'chos par 'dod na/_sta re rnon po dag thogs te nags kyi nang du zhugs nas de de na shing dag rdung bar byed rab tu rdung bar byed/_kun du rdung bar byed de/_de na shing gang dag
[\[224b.5\]]brdungs shing rab tu brdungs pa kun du brdungs pa na/_sgra brtan zhing sgra zab la rnga'i sgra lta bu de dag khyim bdag zhing pa des 'dor bar byed do/_/de na shing gang dag brdungs rab tu brdungs kun du brdungs pa na sgra mi brtan zhing sgra mi zab la rnga'i sgra lta bu mi 'don pa de dag khyim bdag zhing pa des rtsa
[\[224b.6\]]ba nas bcad de mgo bo dag blangs te/_gang yang rul cing snying po med par gyur pa dag dor nas chu'i yur ba dag 'tsho bar byed do/_/de bzhin du len pa dag las 'dra ste zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du dge sbyong sun 'byin par byed pa byung zhing /_dge sbyong gi sre da dang dge sbyong shing rul pa lta bu'o
[\[224b.7\]]zhes bya ba nas 'dis dge slong gzhan dag kyang sun 'byin par gyur zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang snam sbyar gyi bar du'o/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag zhing pa dag 'bras kyi phung po 'phyar bar byed pa na/_'bras gang dag brtan par gnas shing snying po dang bcas pa de dag
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu gnas par 'gyur/_gang phub ma dang snying po med pa de dag rlung gis phyogs gcig tu byed par 'gyur te/_'dis gzhan dag kyang rlag par byed par 'gyur ro zhes khyim bdag zhing pa des btsas shing bsrungs nas 'jig par byed do/_/de bzhin du lhung
[\[225a.2\]]bzed len pa dag la 'dra bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong sun 'byin par byed pa 'byung ngo /_/dge sbyong gi sre da dang /_dge sbyong shing rul ba lta bu dang /_dge slong snying po med pa zhes bya ba nas gzhan dag kyang sun 'byin par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du'o/_/ston pas
[\[225a.3\]]gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kha na ma tho bcas shing 'khyog_/sgyu dang ser sna dang bcas shing /_/dben par song ste nye bar spyod/_/sdig par lta zhing ma gus pa/_/brdzun du smra zhing mi shes pa/_/sdig pa 'dod cing khro ba dang /_/lhan cig gnas pa shes byas nas/_/de dag 'dre zhing
[\[225a.4\]]'grogs pa dag_/rtag tu rab tu spang bar bya/_/dge slong min pa dge slong du/_/smra ba sre da bsal bar gyis/_/shing rul dag ni bsal bar gyis/_/snying po med pa dor bar gyis/_/sdig 'dod rnam par spangs nas ni/_/spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/dag cing rab tu dag pa dang /_/
[\[225a.5\]]lhan cig gnas par sems pas na/_/de dag 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'di ltar dge sbyong ni rnam pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba la/_drug na drug pa'i mdo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po las 'di ltar 'don te/_de nas bcom
[\[225a.6\]]ldan 'das phreng ba can nas ljongs rgyu zhing sdig pa can du gshegs nas dza lo ka'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phreng ba can nas ljongs rgyu zhing sdig pa can du gshegs te dza lo ka'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos te/_thos nas 'dus shing tshogs
[\[225a.7\]]te/_rab tu 'dus shing tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]gtam gyis yang dag par ston pa dang /_yang dag par bskul ba dang /_yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par gsal ba mdzad do/_/de'i tshe na 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas mgar ba'i bu tsun da zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig
[\[225b.2\]]pa can gyi gyad rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan cing yang dag par bskul yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ste/_bcom ldan
[\[225b.3\]]'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/mgar ba'i bu tsun da de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas mgar ba'i bu tsun da sdig pa can gyi gyad dag song nas yun ring du lon pa dang /_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan
[\[225b.4\]]'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdag gi khyim du gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mgar ba'i bu tsun da la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar
[\[225b.5\]]mdzad do/_/de nas mgar ba'i bu tsun da bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/de nas mgar ba'i bu tsun da de nyid kyi mtshan mo shing thog dang 'bru dag btsos shing bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
[\[225b.6\]]'dun la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i kha zas dang ston mo dag bshams te/_gdan dag bshams chu snod dag bzhag cing btsun pa gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab kyis da ni bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dus tshod rjod par byed pa'i pho nya dag btang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan
[\[225b.7\]]'das snga dro chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis mngon sum du byas te/_mgar ba'i bu tsun da'i gdugs tshod gang na ba der gshegs so/_/nye bar gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas mgar ba'i bu tsun das sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun mngon par phyogs shing bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rgya shug gi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang legs par sbyar ba'i 'bru dag gis rang
[\[226a.2\]]gi lag nas 'bul zhing stobs par byed do/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i kha zas dag rang gi lag gis 'bul zhing stobs par byed do/_/de'i tshe na dge slong sdig pa can dge slong gzhan zhig gi rmog brkus te mchan khung du bcug ste/_dge slong sdig pa can de sangs
[\[226a.3\]]rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang tsun das mthong ngo /_/de nas mgar ba'i bu tsun das rnam grangs du mar rgya shug gi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang legs par sbyar ba'i 'bru dag gis rang gi lag nas 'bul zhing stobs par byed cing dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza'
[\[226a.4\]]ba dang btung bas rang gi lag nas 'bul zhing bstabs par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zhing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/_stan dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba zhus pa/_pha rol rgal
[\[226a.5\]]cing som nyi spangs/_/thub pa rab zad rnam 'dren mchog_/kha lo sgyur mchog 'jig rten na/_/dge sbyong du mchis bdag 'dri'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge sbyong bzhi ste lnga pa med/_/de dag gsal bar ngas shes bya/_/lam gyis rgyal dang lam ston dang /_lam
[\[226a.6\]]phyir 'tsho dang lam sun 'byin/_/gsol pa/_lam gyis rgyal ba gang la brjod/_/ji ltar mtshungs med lam ston yin/_/lam phyir 'tsho ba dris pas gsungs/_/lam sun 'byin pa gsal bar mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig the tshom zug rngu spangs/_/
[\[226a.7\]]gzhan gyis bkri min mya ngan 'das/_/'jig rten lhar bcas ston pa yi/_/sangs rgyas lam gyis rgyal zhes brjod/_/blang dang spang bya mchog rig nas/_/chos rnams de bzhin ston cing 'byed/_/thub pa dkri min the tshom chad/_/lam ston dge sbyong gnyis pa yin/_/gang zhig chos gnas
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]legs ston cing /_/dran pa'i bdag nyid lam phyir 'tsho/_/kha na ma tho med gnas slob/_/dge slong gsum pa lam phyir 'tsho/_/'phags pa'i rtags kyis g.yogs byas nas/_/'gran cing khyim sun 'byin pa dang /_/'chal cing ma dul sgyu dang bcas/_/gzugs brnyan bzhin spyod
[\[226b.2\]]lam sun 'byin/_/khyim pa thos ldan 'phags nyan thos/_/blo bzang 'di ltar bsams byas nas/_/thams cad 'di ltar ma yin zhes/_/shes nas ma dad par mi bya/_/ji ltar gdug bcas gdug bcas min/_/dag dang ma dag mnyam par byed/_/gcig gis sdig pa'i las byas
[\[226b.3\]]nas/_/sdig bral gzhan la'ang skye bo dogs/_/kha dog gzugs dang mtshan nyid bzang /_/mthong nas gzhan la ches min bya/_/ma dul phal cher 'jig rten na/_/shin tu dul ba'i rtags kyis spyod/_/gser gyi gzugs brnyan snying po lcags/_/phyi rol gser g.yogs sun
[\[226b.4\]]'byin ltar/_/nang du gdug bcas phyi rol du/_/'khor dang bcas shing 'phags ltar spyod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mgar ba'i bu tsun da'i sbyin pa la rjes su thugs rangs shing thugs rangs par mdzad de/_dul zhing khon dang mi ldan pa'i/_/sbyin bdag bsod nams rab 'phel te/_/
[\[226b.5\]]dge zhing sdig pa rab sdangs nas/_/nyon mongs zad cing log par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgar ba'i bu tsun nga la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bskul zhing dga' bar mdzad nas bzhengs te gshegs so zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa byin pa zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[226b.6\]]phran tshegs kyi sgo gnyis pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa las dga' byed la brten te bslab pa bcas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas 'dul ba las tshig le'ur byas pa bkod pa/_gal te nyes par gyur pa la/_/'chab sems gcig kyang ma skyes na/_/pham pa byung bar gyur kyang ni/_/
[\[226b.7\]]pham par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/mdo sde dang 'dul ba las zhes bya ba la re zhig mdo sde ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i dang po las te/_mdzod kyi gnas 'di nyid du/_/gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi/_/skyabs su ma song ba la med/_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ces bris par blta bar bya'o/_/'dul ba las kyang de lta bu bsnyil bar bya'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la rab tu byung ba'i gzhi'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa bslab pa'i gnas bzhi pa las te/_bya rog skrod dang sun 'byin dang /_/rkun ma'i gnas dang
[\[227a.2\]]ma ning dang /_zhes 'byung la/_phran tshegs kyi sgo bdun pa sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa las kyang /_mtshan gnyis de bzhin mtshan gcig dang /_zhes 'byung la/_de nyid kyi phyir rab tu 'byin pa'i dus na brtag pa'i phyir mkhan pos 'di ltar dri bar bya ste/_khyod za ma ma yin nam/_
[\[227a.3\]]ma ning ma yin nam/_mtshan gnyis pa ma yin nam zhes dri zhing de khas len na khyod mi skye ba'i chos can yin gyis song shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo /_/gang yang mdo las ji skad du dge slong dag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu ni zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa
[\[227a.4\]]na'o/_/dge slong dag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu ni zla ba phyed phyed cing gnas nas byung ste shin tu yongs su dag pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par byed de/_lus sa la bsgyur cing gnas te rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gang la yang gnod par mi byed do/_/de ci'i
[\[227a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu 'di snyam du bdag sngon mir gyur pa na shin tu yongs su dag cing phun sum tshogs pa'i bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa ma bsrungs pas da ltar sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/gal te bdag sngon mir gyur
[\[227a.6\]]pa na shin tu dag cing phun sum tshogs pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa dang bcas na/_bdag nga ltar sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na bdag sngon mir gyur pa na phun sum tshogs shing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i gso sbyong yan lag
[\[227a.7\]]brgyad pa ma bsrungs pas da ltar bdag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so snyam du sems so zhes gsungs so/_/sgo nga las skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa yang de bzhin no/_/de ni mdo las 'byung
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ba'i las rnams bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la/_dge ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsum tshan gsum pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i lhag ma las bstan pa 'chad pa po nyid kyis ji ltar rigs par mdo las nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/_de
[\[227b.2\]]yang 'di skad du 'don te/_yon skyon snyigs ma snyigs ma can/_/nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum dang /_/gtsang thub lus bsod bsod min dang /_/'das sogs bde gshegs gsal bar mdzad/_/gnas gsum gyis ni bsdus pa dang /_/ched du bsam brjod gsum dag dang /_/las
[\[227b.3\]]rnams gsum dang 'das dang dge/_/slob dang mthong dang 'dod dag gzugs/_/mthong ba'i chos la bde ba dang /_/yid bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang /_/log lta spang bya chung ngu dang /_/ser sna dang ni ser sna med/_/brnab sems brnab sems med pa dag_/tshogs su yang dag bsdebs pa
[\[227b.4\]]yin/_/yon po ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi yon po dang /_ngag gi yon po dang /_yid kyi yon po'o/_/skyon ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi skyon dang /_ngag gi skyon dang /_yid kyi skyon no/_/snyigs ma can ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi snyigs ma can dang /_ngag gi snyigs ma can dang /_
[\[227b.5\]]yid kyi snyigs ma can no/_/snyigs ma ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi snyigs ma dang /_ngag gi snyigs ma dang /_yid kyi snyigs ma rnams so/_/nyes par spyad pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'dod chags kyi nyes par spyod pa dang /_zhe [(]sdong [,]sdang [)]gi nyes par spyod pa dang /_gti mug gi nyes par spyod
[\[227b.6\]]pa'o/_/gtsang byed ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus gtsang byed dang /_ngag gtsang byed dang /_yid gtsang byed do/_/thub pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus thub pa dang /_ngag thub pa dang /_yid thub pa'o/_/'du byed ni rnam pa gsum ste/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi
[\[227b.7\]]'du byed do/_/'du byed rnam pa gsum las chos rnams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed bshad pa/_gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'di na 'di ltar slob ste/_gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa ste/_'byung ba
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]chen po bzhi gang yin pa de yang mi rtag pa 'dus byas pa bsams pas bsgrubs pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin no zhes rig nas mi g.yo ba la mos pa can du 'gyur te/_de de ltar rtogs nas de la lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas so/_/skye mched la sems
[\[228a.2\]]mngon par dang ste/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan thos mi g.yo ba la snyoms par 'jug cing shes rab rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs pas rnam par shes pa mi g.yo bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod cing skabs yod de/_'di ni
[\[228a.3\]]mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i las gnyis pa bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'di ni 'di ltar yang dag par so sor slob ste/_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_
[\[228a.4\]]pha rol gyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes 'di dag ni mi rtag pa 'dus byas pa bsams pas bsgrubs pa rten cing
[\[228a.5\]]'brel bar 'byung ba yin no zhes rig nas mi g.yo ba la mos pa can du 'gyur te/_de de ltar rtogs nas de la lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas so/_/skye mched la sems mngon par dang ste/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan thos mi g.yo ba la snyoms par 'jug pa'i
[\[228a.6\]]shes rab rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs pas rnam par shes pa mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_'di ni mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i las gsum pa bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'di na 'di
[\[228a.7\]]ltar yang dag par so sor slob ste/_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du shes gang yin pa'i 'du shes 'di dag mi rtag pa 'dus byas pa bsams pas bsgrubs pa rten cing 'brel
[\[228b.2\]]par 'byung ba yin no zhes rig nas ci yang med pa la mos par 'gyur zhing /_de de ltar rtogs te de lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas so/_/skye mched la sems mngon par dang [(]sta[,]ste[)]/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan thos ci yang med pa la snyoms par 'jug cing shes rab
[\[228b.3\]]rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs pas rnam par shes pa ci yang med par 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod de/_'di ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lam dang po bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'di na 'di ltar so
[\[228b.4\]]sor yang dag par slob ste/_bdag 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' yang cung zad med do/_/bdag gi 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' yang cung zad med do zhes rig nas ci yang med pa la mos par 'gyur te/_de de ltar rtogs nas de la lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas te/_skye mched la sems mngon par dang
[\[228b.5\]]ste/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan thos ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing shes rab rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs pas rnam par shes pa ci yang med par 'gro ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/'di ni ci yang med
[\[228b.6\]]pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i las gnyis pa bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'jig rten ni stong pa'o/_/'jig rten ni stong pa ste/_kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni stong pa'o zhes so sor rab tu rtog ste 'di lta ste/_rtag pa dang brtan pa dang /_g.yung drung dang /_mi 'gyur ba'i
[\[228b.7\]]chos can gyis stong zhing bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o zhes rig nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mos par 'gyur te/_de de ltar rtogs nas de la lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas pa'o/_/skye mched la sems mngon par dang ste/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]thos ci yang med pa la snyoms par 'jug cing shes rab rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs pas rnam par shes pa ci yang med par 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/'di ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba'i
[\[229a.2\]]las gsum pa bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa nyan thos 'di na 'di ltar yang dag par so sor slob ste/_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs gang yin pa
[\[229a.3\]]dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang ci
[\[229a.4\]]yang med pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa 'dus byas pa bsams pas bsgrubs pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin no zhes rig nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mos par 'gyur te/_de de ltar rtogs nas de la lan mang du bsgrubs shing gnas
[\[229a.5\]]te/_skye mched la sems mngon par dang ste/_sems mngon par dang bas da ltar 'phags pa nyan thos 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing shes rab rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bsgrubs nas rnam par shes pa 'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[229a.6\]]min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni gnas yin zhing go skabs yod do/_/'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i las bstan pa'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab na rnga yab thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob cing
[\[229a.7\]]'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na dge slong 'di snyam du bdag med do/_/bdag gi med do/_/bdag 'byung bar ma gyur cig bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces btsun pa de ltar rtogs pa'i dge slong
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/_kun dga' bo gcig tu nges pa ma yin te/_kha cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la kha cig ni mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'di na rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis 'di ltar rtogs
[\[229b.2\]]pa'i dge slong kha cig mthong ba'i chos nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur la/_kha cig ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'gyur ba lags/_kun dga' bo 'di na dge slong 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur te/_bdag med do/_/bdag gi med do/_/bdag 'byung bar ma
[\[229b.3\]]gyur cig_/bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces gang yod cing gang byung ba de spongs shing btang snyoms su bya ba 'thob ste/_de btang snyoms la zhen cing nges par byed de/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'di ni nye bar len pa dang bcas shing mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la yongs su mya ngan las mi
[\[229b.4\]]'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ci 'phags pa nyan thos de'i dus na nye bar len pa gang gis nye bar len pa dang bcas pa lags/_/'di lta ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo ste/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'du byed lhag mas so/_/btsun pa 'phags pa nyan thos de'i dus na nye bar
[\[229b.5\]]len pa gang gis nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa 'di ni mchog_/nye bar len pa 'di ni gtso bo ste/_'di lta ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo ste/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'du byed lhag ma'o/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/_'phags pa nyan thos de'i dus
[\[229b.6\]]na nye bar len pa gang gis nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa de ni mchog nye bar len pa de ni gtso bo ste/_'di lta ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo ste/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'du byed lhag ma'o/_/kun dga' bo 'di na dge slong 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur te/_bdag med do/_/
[\[229b.7\]]bdag gi med do/_/bdag 'byung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces gang yod cing gang byung ba de spong zhing btang snyoms su bya ba thob ste/_de btang snyoms la ro mi myong zhing mi zhen cing nges par mi byed de/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'di ni nye bar len pa dang bcas shing yongs su
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'dis dge slong kha cig ni mthong ba'i chos nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_kha cig ni mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mi g.yo bar
[\[230a.2\]]nye bar 'gro ba'i lam bstan cing /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lam yang bstan/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lam yang bstan/_nye bar len pa med par mya ngan las 'da' ba yang bstan lags kyi/_btsun pa 'phags pa'i
[\[230a.3\]]rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan du gsol/_kun dga' bo 'di ni dge slong 'di ltar so sor yang dag par slob ste/_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs gang yin pa
[\[230a.4\]]dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_pha rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched gang yin pa dang /_'du shes
[\[230a.5\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched gang yin pa 'di tsam ni 'jig tshogs te/_ji tsam du 'jig tshogs gang yin pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur/_na bar 'gyur/_rga bar 'gyur/_'chi 'pho zhing skye bar 'gyur te/_'di 'chi ba zhes bya'o/_/'chi ba med pa gang zhe na/_nye bar len pa spangs pa nges par
[\[230a.6\]]byung ba/_sred pa zad pa 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa ste/_kun dga' bo ngas 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i lam bstan cing ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lam yang bstan cing 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lam
[\[230a.7\]]yang bstan/_nye bar len pa med pa mya ngan las 'das pa bstan cing /_'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yang bstan te/_kun dga' bo 'di ni ston pas dge slong rnams la bya ba byed/_thugs rje dang rjes su brtse bas don du 'dod pa dang phan par 'dod de bdag gis byas so/_/da ni khyed
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]cag rnams kyis bya ba dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khang pa stong pa dang /_ri dang ri'i phug dang /_sog ma'i spyil bu dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang nags dag tu mal stan rnying pa dag la dge slong dag bsam gtan bya zhing bag med par mi bya ste/_phyis 'gyod par
[\[230b.2\]]gyur ta re/_'di nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/bar sdom la/_mi rtag rnam gsum bdag dang cung zad med/_mthong chos bdag dang lta dang ji tsam bstan/_/de la mdo dang pos ni bsam gtan gyi lam bstan cing /_mdo gnyis pa la sogs pas ni gzugs med
[\[230b.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bstan par shes par bya'o/_/mig gi gzugs rnams mthong nas gzugs la so sor yang dag par rtog par byed do zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag rnam grangs gang gis rnam grangs gang la brten te dge slong dad pa
[\[230b.4\]]gzhan du gyur cing /_'dod pa yang gzhan du/_thos pa yang gzhan du rnam pa yongs su spyod pa yang gzhan du mthong ba'i bsam gtan la bzod pa yang gzhan du gyur la/_srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa nyid du lung ston pa de lta bu yod dam/_btsun pa bcom ldan
[\[230b.5\]]'das chos kyi rtsa ba/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi spyan zhes bya ba nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag rnam grangs gang gis rnam grangs gang la brten te dge slong dad pa gzhan du gyur cing zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang
[\[230b.6\]]dag pa nyid du lung bstan pa de lta bu yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag rnam grangs gang gis rnam grangs gang la brten te zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa nyid du lung ston par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di
[\[230b.7\]]ni dge slong mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas gzugs la so sor yang dag par rtog par byed kyi/_gzugs rnams la 'dod chags par yang dag par so sor rtog par ni mi byed de/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs rnams la chags pa med cing nang gi
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]bdag nyid kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs rnams la chags pa med do zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/dge slong dag 'di na dge slong rna bas sgra la/_snas dri la/_lces ro la/_lus kyis reg bya la/_yid kyis chos rnams rnam par
[\[231a.2\]]shes nas chos la so sor yang dag par rtog par byed kyi/_chos la 'dod chags par so sor yang dag par rtog par mi byed de/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos rnams la chags pa med cing /_nang gi bdag nyid kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos rnams la chags
[\[231a.3\]]pa med do zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/gang yang dge slong de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa nyid du lung ston par 'gyur ba yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gang yang dge slong
[\[231a.4\]]de rna bas sgra nas snga ma bzhin du yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas chos so sor yang dag par rtog par byed kyi/_chos la 'dod chags par so sor yang dag par rtog par mi byed de/_nang gi bdag nyid kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos rnams la chags pa med cing /_nang gi bdag
[\[231a.5\]]nyid kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos rnams la chags pa med do zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes na/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos 'di dad pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_thos pa dang /_rnam pa yongs su dpyod pa dang /_mthong ba'i bsam gtan la bzod pas rig
[\[231a.6\]]par bya ba [(]yan [,]yin [)]snyam mam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/chos 'di ni yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong zhing rig par bya ba yin no/_/btsun pa de bzhin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ni rnam grangs gang gis dang rnam grangs gang la brten nas dad pa yang gzhan du
[\[231a.7\]]zhes bya ba nas/_srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa nyid du lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no zhes gsungs so/_/gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe zhes bya ba la/_gang las nye bar bstan ce na/_gleng gzhi ni chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs las
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]'don te/_kun dga' bo ji tsam gyis na bdag nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing bdag nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi rtsa ba/_bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi spyan te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong rnams don 'di
[\[231b.2\]]bstan na dge slong rnams kyis thos nas legs par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo 'di ni tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/kun
[\[231b.3\]]dga' bo gzhan yang 'di na kha cig tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag ni rig cing tshor ba'i chos can no zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang 'di na kha cig tshor ba bdag yin no zhes
[\[231b.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing bdag ni rig cing tshor ba'i chos can no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mod kyi 'on kyang bdag ni so sor myong ba ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_kun dga' bo de la tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par
[\[231b.5\]]rjes su mthong zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de la 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshor ba ni gsum po 'di dag ste/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe tshor ba
[\[231b.6\]]gnyis po sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/khyod gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba na bde ba'i tshor ba de yang mi rtag ste/_'gag pa'i chos can te/_bde ba'i tshor ba 'gags pa na bdag dang bral zhing bdag 'ong ba med
[\[231b.7\]]par gyur tam ci/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang gi tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe tshor ba gnyis po bde ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/khyod gang gi tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de yang mi
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]rtag cing 'gag pa'i chos can te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'gags pa na bdag dang bral zhing bdag 'ong ba med par gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gang gi tshe bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe tshor ba gnyis po bde ba dang
[\[232a.2\]]sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gnyis po dag 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/khyod gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba de yang mi rtag cing 'gag pa'i chos can te/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'gags pa
[\[232a.3\]]na bdag dang bral zhing 'ong ba med par gyur tam zhes so/_/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_/de 'di ltar bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'dres shing 'chol ba'i tshor ba myong ba la tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de dge'am/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun
[\[232a.4\]]dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis na tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing yang dag par rjes su lta ba 'di ni ngas mi bzod do/_/kun dga' bo de la kha cig tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mod kyi 'on kyang bdag ni rig cing tshor ba'i chos can no zhes
[\[232a.5\]]yang dag par rjes su lta zhing yang dag par rjes su lta ba de la 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/_gang yang tshor ba med pa de lta tshor ba bo mi dmigs so/_/kun dga' bo gang tshor ba med pa de la tshor ba po mi dmigs na bdag ni rig cing tshor ba'i chos can no zhes smra ba de dag dge ba yin nam/_btsun
[\[232a.6\]]pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis na bdag rig cing tshor ba'i chos can no zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba 'di ni ngas mi bzod do/_/kun dga' bo de la tshor ba bdag yin no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/_bdag ni rig cing tshor
[\[232a.7\]]ba'i chos can no zhes yang dag par rjes su lta ba 'di ni ngas mi bzod rjes su mi mthong mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag ni so sor myong ba med pa'o zhes yang dag par rjes su lta zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gang la tshor ba
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]po mi dmigs so/_/kun dga' bo gang la tshor ba med pa de la tshor ba po mi dmigs kyang bdag ces bya bar 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo bdag tu rlom pa thams cad du mi bden na bdag ni so sor rig pa med pa'o zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ba
[\[232b.2\]]na dge ba yin nam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis na bdag ni so sor rig pa med pa'o zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di ni ngas mi bzod do/_/kun dga' bo 'di tsam gyis na bdag yang dag par rjes su mthong
[\[232b.3\]]zhing yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar dge slong gi dge 'dun la bud med ces brjod pa zhes bya ba la/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong rnams kyis lan gsum gyi bar du phyir bzlog pa dang /_de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis the tshom thams
[\[232b.4\]]cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las ci zhig mdzad nas las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i gsung /_phan pa'i gsung /_gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dag kyang kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong rnams
[\[232b.5\]]kyis lan gsum gyi bar du phyir bzlog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis te/_sngon gzhan gyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba nas/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur
[\[232b.6\]]smin/_zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[232b.7\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma pham pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de phyug po'i bur gyur te/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rab tu byung ngo /_/rab
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]tu byung nas sde snod gsum par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la rtsod pa byung ste/_des rtsod pa de cher 'phel bar byas so/_/ji tsam na dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa zhig gis de bton nas rtsod pa de zhi bar byas pa dang /_des bud med rnams kyi rtsod pa zhi bar byas
[\[233a.2\]]sam zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun la bud med ces smras so/_/ngag gi nyes par spyad pa des de'i skyes pa'i dbang po nub cing bud med kyi dbang po byung bar gyur cing skye ba lnga brgyar bud med du skyes shing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis de'i bud med kyi
[\[233a.3\]]dngos po bzlog cing skyes pa'i dngos po thob par byas so/_/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na phyug po'i bur gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sde snod gsum par gyur kyang ngas dge 'dun la ngag gi nyes par spyod pa smras pas las de'i rgyus kau shAm+bI pa'i dge slong rnams kyis lan gsum
[\[233a.4\]]gyi bar du nga'i tshig phyir bzlog go/_/'di nyid phran tshegs las sangs rgyas mang po'i rtogs pa brjod par tshigs su bcad par byas te/_de nas sangs rgyas mi pham pa'i/_/sngon byung sde snod gsum par gyur/_/dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa na/_/dge 'dun bud med ces brjod pa'i/_/ngag gi
[\[233a.5\]]nyes par spyad byas pas/_/bud med nyid du nye bar song /_/slar yang sems rab dad pa yis/_/skyes pa'i dngos po nyid du gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/ji ltar nyung rum zhes bya ba la/_rgyal po ka na ka'i nyung rum long ba zhes bya ba cig yod do zhes grag ste/_de lam na 'gro ba na ba lang lnga
[\[233a.6\]]brgya'i khyu zhig khrid de 'gro ba mthong nas/_'di dag ci byed ces dris pa dang /_smras pa dbang po dag gdon pa'i phyir ro/_/de 'di snyam du bdag kyang sngon byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'di lta bur gyur la/_'di yang 'di lta bur gyur te/_mi des las 'di byas pas skye ba mang por
[\[233a.7\]]rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsam pa'i khyad par drag po mngon du byas nas ba lang nyos te grol bar byas so/_/de nas nyung rum de'i skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos thos nas rab tu dga' ste de nyid bud med kyi srung mar gzhag go/_/ji _
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ltar pi lin ta'i bu'i gtam rgyud ces bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag gi a mra'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze mo pi lin ta'i bu drug dus las 'das par gyur to/_/de de dag dus byas pas sgren mor byung ste/_smyo zhing sems g.yengs nas de dang der
[\[233b.2\]]'khyams zhing bcom brlag gi a mra'i tshal gang na ba der song [(]do[,]ngo [)]/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/bram ze mo pi lin tas thag ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pa dang bcas
[\[233b.3\]]pas gzugs bsdus te dran pa rnyed par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo pi lin ta ring po nas gzigs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bram ze mo pi lin ta la bla gos byin te/_dgab par gyis shig dang chos bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[233b.4\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze mo pi lin ta la bla gos byin zhing bram ze mo pi lin ta chos gos bla gos kyis g.yogs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs
[\[233b.5\]]gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze mo pi lin ta la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan par mdzad/_yang dag par bskul bar mdzad/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad de/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
[\[233b.6\]]'das dus dang por bya ba 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa rnams ro chung zhing nyes dmigs dang bcas pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang /_thar pa dang dben pa'i rjes su bsngags
[\[233b.7\]]pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgyas par gsal bar mdzad de/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /_chos khyad par can bstan pa'i snod du mkhyen
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos khyad par can ston par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rgyas par rab tu gsal bar mdzad de/_dper na khrus mkhan gyi gos
[\[234a.2\]]shin tu dag pa tshos su bcug na tshon rtsi len pa de bzhin du bram ze mo pi lin ta stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon du gyur te/_'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams mngon par rtogs so/_/de nas bram ze mo pi lin
[\[234a.3\]]ta chos mthong /_chos thob/_chos rig_/chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud/_chos la the tshom dang yid gnyis las brgal te/_ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar nas phyag byed
[\[234a.4\]]cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so/_/rab tu 'phags so/_/bdag 'di nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_/
[\[234a.5\]]deng nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te song zhing skabs su 'gro la mngon par dad do/_/de nas bram ze mo pi lin ta bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung
[\[234a.6\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze mo pi lin ta'i bu bdun pa dus las 'das par gyur to/_/de dus las 'das pa na mya ngan mi byed de/_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_brang rdung ba dang /_smre bar mi byed cing /_rmongs pa med do/_/de nas ba ra d+h+wa dza'i rigs kyi bram zes bram ze mo pi
[\[234a.7\]]lin ta la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sngon gyi rab tu dga' ba yi/_/bu dag dran par gyur pa na/_gdung ba dang ni sdug bsngal zhing /_/nyin mtshan zas dag gcod par byed/_/bdun pa dag ni rnam pa thams cad du/_/khyod rang gis ni zos sam ci/_/pi lin tas smras pa/_ci
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ste yang yang gdung bar bya/_/bu dang tsha bo stong phrag dang /_/gnyen bshes tshogs ni brgya phrag dang /_/yun rings dus nas ngas zos shing /_/bram ze khyod kyis kyang de bzhin/_/bu dang tsha bo tshad med dag_/phan tshun du ni zos nas ni/_/phyir yang skye ba dag tu 'gyur/_/mya ngan dang ni
[\[234b.2\]]smre ba dang /_/yongs su gdung ba su zhig byed/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi ba las/_/nges par 'byung bar shes par gyis/_/ngas ni skye dang 'chi ba las/_/nges par 'byung bar rab shes shing /_/sangs rgyas kyis ni rab bstan pas/_/rab tu gdung ba med par byas/_/pi lin ta khyod ci yi phyir/_/
[\[234b.3\]]rmad du byung ba'i gtam dag sgrogs/_/chos gang zhig gis rtogs shing shes/_/ci zhig rab tu zhig gyur nas/_/pi lin ta khyod rmad byung ba'i/_/gtam dag rab tu smra bar byed/_/bram ze bcom brlag a mra'i tshal/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs nas su/_/thub pa sdug
[\[234b.4\]]bsngal thams cad dag_/spong bar byed pa'i chos rtogs te/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'da' ba dang /_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_/yang dag rjes ston bcom ldan 'das/_/de yi bstan
[\[234b.5\]]la bdag rab dga'/_/de yi chos dag shes nas su/_/bu yi mya ngan med par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang a mra'i tshal du 'gro/_/bdag gi bu yi mya ngan dag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sel bar 'gyur/_/bram ze rdzogs sangs kha ba dang /_/gser gyi mdog 'dra'i pags pa can/_/
[\[234b.6\]]rnam par 'dren pa chu bo brgal/_/ma dul ba dag 'dul bar byed/_/de nas bram ze de myur du/_/shing rta rta la zhon nas ni/_/dga' zhing rab tu dang ba yis/_/bcom brlag a mra'i nags su song /_/bram zes sangs rgyas mthong nas ni/_/sems dag rab tu dang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[234b.7\]]mngon par dad pa'i sems bcas pas/_/ston pa'i drung du nye bar song /_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'da' ba dang /_/zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa dag_/de yis thos nas dam pa'i chos/_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]de nyid du ni mngon par rtogs/_/de yi chos rnams shes nas su/_/rab tu byung ba'i dngos po 'dod/_/bram ze de ni rab byung nas/_/bag yod bzhin du spyod pa ni/_/nyin zhag gsum gyis gsum rig par/_/thub pa yis ni lung bstan to/_/bram ze gsum rig gyur
[\[235a.2\]]nas ni/_/kha lo sgyur la 'di skad smras/_/khyod myur song la shing rta 'dis/_/bram ze mo la byin par gyis/_/pi lin ta la 'di skad brjod/_/khyod sems rab tu dga' bar gyis/_/bram ze sangs rgyas mthong nas ni/_/sems rab mngon par dang bar 'gyur/_/sems rab mngon par dang ba
[\[235a.3\]]yis/_/ston pa'i drung du nye bar phyin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'di sred pa rnam pa drug ces bya ba la/_gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las spyod pa ni rnam pa drug ste/_gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las spyod pa drug gang zhe na/_shan pa la sogs pa
[\[235a.4\]]dang /_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa bdun dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam pa brgyad dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa bcu rnams so/_/dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las spyod pa ni rnam
[\[235a.5\]]pa bdun te/_dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las spyod pa bdun gang zhe na/_tshul khrims rnam pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims rnam pa bdun dang /_tshul khrims rnam pa brgyad dang /_tshul khrims rnam pa bcu dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa bzhi'o/_/
[\[235a.6\]]mi gnag mi dkar la rnam par smin pa med pa'i las spyod pa bcu ste/_gzhan du ma bstan to/_/gong du bris pa de las nag po drug dkar po bdun dkar po yang ma yin nag po yang ma yin pa bcu/_dkar nag 'dres ma'i ni cung zad kyang ma bstan to/_/mdo thams cad la [(]dbyang [,]dpyad [)]par bya'o/_/
[\[235a.7\]]de la mdo ni 'di ltar brjod par bya ste/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag las ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las kyang yod/_dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las kyang
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]yod/_dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa dkar gnag gi las kyang yod/_dkar po yang ma yin nag po yang ma yin la rnam par smin pa med cing las de dag zad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i las kyang yod do/_/gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las gang zhe na/_tshul khrims
[\[235b.2\]]'chal ba rnam pa bcu'o/_/dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las gang zhe na/_gzugs med pa bzhi'o/_/dkar nag la rnam par smin pa dkar nag gi las gang zhe na/_ji ltar gnod pa dang bcas pa'i lus kyi 'du byed cing nye bar stsogs pa dang /_gnod pa med pa'i
[\[235b.3\]]lus kyi 'du byed cing nye bar stsogs pa'o/_/dkar po yang ma yin nag po yang ma yin la las de dag zad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa gang zhe na/_'di na dge slong 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar na gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang
[\[235b.4\]]gzugs med pas bsdus pa yang mdo las dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las su bshad pa yin no/_/stong pa nyid chen po'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_lung bar ma las/_dge sbyong dge sbyong mnyam gnyis dang /_/dmigs bcas yongs shes rjes 'brang dang /_chen po bzhi
[\[235b.5\]]bcu stong nyid gnyis/_/tshoms su yang dag bsdebs nas brjod/_/ces bya ba'i sdom gyi mtha'i mdo las 'di ltar 'don te/_/gang gi phyir 'phags pa nyan thos nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la rang gi sems kyis so sor brtag par bya ste/_ci nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
[\[235b.6\]]rnams la bdag tu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_bdag tu 'dun pa'i phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes la ma 'gags shing ring du ma byas pa yod dam/_'on te nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la bdag tu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_bdag tu 'dun pa'i phra rgyas
[\[235b.7\]]ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes la ma 'gags shing ring du ma byas pa med/_kun dga' bo dge slong de gal te 'di ltar rang gi sems la so sor rtog par byed pa na/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la bdag tu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_bdag tu 'dun pa'i phra
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes la ma 'gags shing ring du ma byas pa yod do zhes rnam par shes nas/_'phags pa nyan thos ngas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la skye ba dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_'di lta ste 'di ni gzugs/_
[\[236a.2\]]'di ni gzugs kun 'byung ba/_'di ni gzugs 'gag pa/_'di ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed/_'di ni rnam par shes pa/_'di ni rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba/_'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gag pa zhes de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la skye ba dang 'jig par yang yang
[\[236a.3\]]dag par rjes su lta zhing gnas pas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la bdag tu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bdag tu 'dun pa'i phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes la ma 'gags shing ring du ma byas pa de 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gal te dge slong 'di ltar rang gi sems la
[\[236a.4\]]so sor rtog pa shes na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la bdag tu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_bdag tu 'dun pa'i phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes la ma 'gags shing ring du ma byas pa med cing /_kun dga' bo de de la dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan te chos 'di ni gcig tu dkar ba/_
[\[236a.5\]]gcig tu dge ba/_gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa/[ (]me [,]mi [)]'da' zhing bdud sdig pa can gyis yang dag par mi 'phrogs pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos yang srid par nad dang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi bas mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o/_/bstan
[\[236a.6\]]bcos las zhes bya ba la rab tu byed pa'i rkang pa'i bsdu ba bstan pa'i rab tu byed pa drug pa'i sgo las/_nyes sbyar yongs su shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba las so/_/nyes par spyad pa ni rnam pa gsum ste zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/nyes par spyad pa ni rnam pa gsum
[\[236a.7\]]ste/_lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o/_/legs par spyad pa ni rnam pa gsum [(]se[,]ste[)]/_lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyad pa'o/_/lus kyis nyes par spyod pa byas shi
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa byas na sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyis legs par spyod pa byas shing ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyod pa byas na lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bsags
[\[236b.2\]]pa'i las mdo las zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pa dag gi rnam par smin pa ni so sor myong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/_/de yang mthong ba'i chos nyid la dang /_
[\[236b.3\]]skyes nas dang /_lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/dge slong dag las ma byas la ma bsags shing nye bar ma bsags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni so sor myong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/_/dge slong dag de la lus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gsum dang /_ngag gi bzhi dang /_
[\[236b.4\]]yid kyi gsum byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pas rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal zhing mi dge ba 'byin par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag ji ltar na lus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gsum byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pas rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal zhing mi dge
[\[236b.5\]]ba 'byin par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_kha cig srog gcod cing lag pa khrag dang bcas pa/_bcom zhing rab tu spong la ngo tsha ba med cing snying rje med pa grog sbur yan chad kyi srog chags 'byung po thams cad kyi srog nye bar bzung ste/_srog gcod pa las ma log par gyur pa dag go/_/kha cig
[\[236b.6\]]ma byin par len te grong ngam dgon par song nas gzhan gyis ma byin pa rku ba'i grangs su gtogs pa ste/_ma byin par len pa las ma log par gyur pa dag go/_/kha cig 'dod pas log par g.yem pa mas bsrungs pa'am/_phas bsrungs pa'am/_ming pos bsrungs pa'am/_
[\[236b.7\]]sring mos bsrungs pa'am/_gyos pos bsrungs pa'am/_sgyug mos bsrungs pa'am/_gnyen gyis bsrungs pa'am/_rigs kyis bsrungs pa'am/_rus kyis bsrungs pa'am/_chad pa dang bcas pa dang sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan gyi bud med gzhan gyis yongs su bzung
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ba la phreng ba 'phangs te/_de dang lhan cig stobs kyis mnan te 'dod pa spyod par byed cing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las ma log par gyur pa dag go/_/dge slong dag lus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba rnam pa gsum po 'di dag byas shing bsags pas rnam par smin pa sdug
[\[237a.2\]]bsngal zhing mi dge ba 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na ngag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa bzhi byas shing bsags pa nye bar bsags pas rnam par smin pa mi dge zhing sdug bsngal ba 'byin par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/_kha cig brdzun du smra ste de rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro'am/_
[\[237a.3\]]blon po'i khang par 'gro'am/_tshogs kyi nang du 'gro'am/_'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba na dbang po 'dri ste/_kye skyes bu shes pa de smros shig_/mi shes pa de ma smra shig_/de mthong ba de smos shig_/ma mthong ba de ma smra shig_/des dbang po dris pa na de mi shes bzhin du bdag gis shes so
[\[237a.4\]]zhes smra/_ma mthong bzhin du bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bdag gi phyir dang gzhan gyi phyir dang zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ste/_brdzun du smra ba las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig phra ma can du gyur te/_rab tu 'byed pa/_de las thos nas 'di dag la smra/_'di dag
[\[237a.5\]]las thos nas dbye bar gyur cig ces 'di la smras te tshogs 'byed par gyur te/_dad pa dang mi mthun zhing ma dul la rjes su mi mthun pa bas tshig smra zhing phra ma las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig tshig rtsub mo smra ba can du gyur te/_tshig gang snyan pa dang /_bde ba dang snying du 'ong ba dga'
[\[237a.6\]]ba pha rol mgu ba/_gsal ba/_rnam par shes par bya ba/_mnyan par bya ba rjes su mthun pa/_skye bo mang po dga' ba/_skye bo mang po la sdug pa/_skye bo mang po rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_skye bo mang po yid du 'ong ba/_mnyam par bzhag pa/_ting nge 'dzin sgrub par byed pa de lta bu'i
[\[237a.7\]]tshig spangs te/_tshig gang brlang zhing rtsub pa/_pha rol gyi [(]gnang [,]gnad [)]gcod pa/_pha rol gyi rjes su mi mthun pa/_skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/_skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/_skye bo mang po mi dga' zhing /_/skye bo mang po yid du mi 'ong ba/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa/_ting nge 'dzin ma yin
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa sgrub par byed pa de lta bu'i tshig smra zhing tshig rtsub mo las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig tshig 'khyal pa can du gyur te/_de yang tshig ma yin par smra ba/_mi bden par smra ba/_de kho na nyid ma yin par smra ba/_don ma yin par smra ba/_ma zhi bar smra ba ste 'khrugs shing dus ma
[\[237b.2\]]yin par smra ba/_nye bar brtags pa ma yin pa/_/chos ma yin pa dang /_don ma yin pa sdud par byed pa/_ngag 'khyal pa las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/dge slong dag de ltar na ngag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa bzhi byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pas rnam par
[\[237b.3\]]smin pa mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal ba 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ji ltar na yid kyi las rnam pa gsum byas shing bsags te nye bar bsags pa rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal zhing mi dge ba de gang zhe na/_kha cig brnab sems can du gyur te/_'dod pa rnams la yang dag
[\[237b.4\]]par chags pa drag po ste/_gzhan gyi rdzas dang /_gzhan gyi nor dang /_gzhan gyi nye bar mkho ba rnams la brnab sems skye ba de gzhan gyi de bdag gir gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes brnab sems las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig gnod sems can du gyur te gdug pa'i yid kyis rnam par
[\[237b.5\]]rtog pa 'di snyam du sems can khyed rnams nyams shing pham la don ma yin pa phongs pa thob par gyur cig ces gnod sems las ma log par gyur pa'o/_/kha cig log par lta ba can du gyur te/_de lta ba phyin ci log pas 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ste/_sbyin pa med do/_/mchod sbyin
[\[237b.6\]]med do/_/legs par spyad pa med do/_/nyes par spyad pa med do/_/legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do/_/'jig rten 'di med do/_/'jig rten pha rol med do/_/pha med do/_/ma med do/_/sems can rdzus te byung ba rnams med do/_/'jig
[\[237b.7\]]rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song zhing yang dag par rtogs pa 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang nyid kyis mngon par shes la phun sum tshogs pa mngon sum du byas te/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]shes so zhes bya ba med do zhes log par lta ba las ma log par gyur pa dag go/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gsum byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pas rnam par smin pa mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal ba dag 'byin par
[\[238a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de la 'phags pa nyan thos lus kyi mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing lus kyi dge ba'i chos rnams sgom par byed do/_/ngag dang yid kyi mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing ngag dang yid kyi dge ba'i chos rnams sgom par byed do/_/byams pa dang lhan cig pa'i
[\[238a.3\]]sems kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa thams cad du song ba tshad med pa legs par bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu khyab par byas nas yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa
[\[238a.4\]]dang /_steng dang 'og dang logs kyi 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du byams pa dang lhan cig pa'i sems kho na med cing 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa thams cad du song ba tshad med pa legs par bsgoms pas khyab par byas nas yongs su rdzogs par byas nas
[\[238a.5\]]gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sngon bdag gi sems ma bsgoms shing chung ngur gyur pa de ltar bdag gi tshad med cing legs par bsgom par bya'o snyam pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems bag med pa mi srid cing mi ltung la mi gnas shing bgrang bar
[\[238a.6\]]yang mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khye'u dang bu mo byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed pa yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di lta ste lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las byed cing nye bar sogs par 'gyur ram/_gzhan dag las yun ring po don ma yin pa mi phan pa dang sdug bsngal
[\[238a.7\]]de lta de ltar ston par 'gyur ram/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag legs so/_/legs so/_/dge slong dag skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung bas kyang byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/_/dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]skyes pa dang bud med dang khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag kyang lus 'di btang nas pha rol du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag sems kyi rjes su 'gro bar sems la brten pa sems kyis bcings pa [(]sams [,]sems [)]la brten te 'jug pa'o/_/dge slong dag 'ga' zhig 'di skad du nga'i lus
[\[238b.2\]]'di nyid kyis sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags la nye bar bsags pa de thams cad 'di la myong bar gyur cig skyes nas dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar ma gyur cig ces dge slong dag de ltar byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan na phyir mi ldog par
[\[238b.3\]]gnas shing bla na med pa'i chos so sor rig par gyur te/_de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa lus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba rnams spong zhing lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams sgom par byed do/_/ngag dang yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams spong zhing ngag dang yid kyi dge
[\[238b.4\]]ba'i las rnams sgom par byed do/_/de snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang lhan cig pa'i sems zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du dge slong dag de ltar btang snyoms kyi sems ting nge 'dzin dang ldan na phyir mi ldog par gnas shing bla na med pa'i chos so sor rig par 'gyur ro zhes bya
[\[238b.5\]]ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_brnab sems las skyes pa dang /_gnod sems las skyes pa dang /_gti mug las skyes pa'o/_/dge
[\[238b.6\]]slong dag ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub mo dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang log par lta ba ni rnam pa gsum ste/_brnab sems las skyes pa dang /_gnod sems las
[\[238b.7\]]skyes pa dang /_log par lta ba las skyes pa'o/_/dge slong dag srog gcod pa spang ba ni rnam pa gsum ste/_ma chags pa las skyes pa dang /_/zhe sdang med pa las skyes pa dang /_gti mug med pa las skyes pa'o/_/dge slong dag ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub mo dang /_tshig 'khyal ba dang /_brnab sems med pa dang /_gnod sems med pa dang /_log par lta ba med pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_ma chags pa las skyes pa dang /_/zhe sdang med pa las skyes pa dang /_gti
[\[239a.2\]]mug med pa las skyes pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_tshe dang drod dang rnam shes kyis/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das 'khrug pa can na chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
[\[239a.3\]]bos te/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_chu bo gang gA'i rgyun gyis dbu ba'i phung po chen po khyer nas 'gro ba de mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus mthong ste/_bsams shing tshul bzhin du brtags te/_des mthong zhing bsams te/_tshul bzhin du brtags pa na mi bden par snang zhing /_brdzun
[\[239a.4\]]pa slu ba gsog tu snang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dbu ba rdos pa la snying po ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du gzugs ci yang rung ba 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_dman pa'am/_
[\[239a.5\]]gya nom pa'am/_thag ring ba'am/_thag nye ba de dag dge slong gis mthong ste/_bsams bzhin du tshul bzhin brtags te/_des de mthong zhing bsams te/_tshul bzhin brtags pa na mi bden par snang zhing /_brdzun pa slu ba gsog tu snang ngo /_/snying po med pa dang /_nad dang /_
