[\[280a.3\]]ba la yang brjod par bya'o/_/ma rig pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/_dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang mi snang ba dang ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta
[\[280a.4\]]ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes te/_de rig pa'i skye mched drug po rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pas de reg pa'i skye mched drug po rnams la mi
[\[280a.5\]]shes shing ma rig pa rgyas par 'gyur te/_'di ni ma rig pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyor ba ma yin pa yang bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'dod par mi sbyor ba dang /_srid par mi sbyor ba dang /_lta bar mi sbyor ba dang /_ma rig par mi sbyor ba'o/_/'dod
[\[280a.6\]]par mi sbyor ba gang zhe na/_'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'dod pa rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de 'dod pa rnams kyi kun 'byung ba
[\[280a.7\]]dang mi snang ba dang ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_'dod pa la dga' ba dang /_'dod pa la nges pa dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_'dod pas
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]brgyal ba dang /_'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /_'dod pa la lhag par 'chums pa dang /_'dod par bying ba dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen par mi 'gyur ba ste/_de'i sems de la yongs su gtugs te mi gnas pa 'di ni 'dod par mi sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/srid par
[\[280b.2\]]mi sbyor ba dang /_lta bar mi sbyor ba yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/ma rig pa'i mi sbyor ba gang zhe na/_'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par
[\[280b.3\]]'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_de reg pa'i skye mched drug po 'di dag ni kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas de reg pa'i skye mched drug po rnams la
[\[280b.4\]]mi shes shing ma rig pas rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni ma rig pa'i sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'dod pas sbyor bas yang dag ldan/_/gnyis pa srid pas sbyor ba ste/_/lta ba'i sbyor bas yang dag par/_/ma rig
[\[280b.5\]]sbyor ba sngon 'gro bas/_/bral zhing 'da' bar dka' ba yin/_/sems can 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i sbyor ba rab spangs shing /_/de bzhin srid pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/lta ba'i sbyor ba rab spangs shing /_/ma rig sbyor la chags bral zhing /_/kun sbyor thams cad
[\[280b.6\]]mi ldan na/_/yang srid dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'dun pa'i 'dod chags ni nye bar len pa zhes gsungs zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag nye bar blangs pa dang nye bar len pa'i chos dag bstan par bya ste/_de legs par nyon
[\[280b.7\]]la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/nye bar blang ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_mig dang gzugs dang /_rna ba dang sgra dang /_sna dang dri dang /_lce dang ro dang /_lus dang reg bya dang /_yid dang chos te/_'di ni nye bar blang ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/nye bar len pa'i chos
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]rnams gang zhe na/_gang las 'dun pa'i 'dod chags te/_'di ni nye bar len pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag nye bar blang ba dang /_nye bar len pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya'o zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes
[\[281a.2\]]gsungs te/_de bzhin du mdo gzhan mang po las bstan to/_/'di lta ste/_gru rgyun las bzlog phyogs su mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bkri bar bya zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi smyug ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe tshe dang
[\[281a.3\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la bos te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong dgon pa'am shing drung ngam/_khang pa stong par song nas 'di ltar so so yang dag par bslab ste/_ci
[\[281a.4\]]nang gi bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags yod pa zhig so sor myong ngam/_'on te med pa zhig ces dge slong des mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byed de/_dge slong des mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byas pa
[\[281a.5\]]na sems bsten pa la gzhol bar 'gyur zhing /_bsten pa la 'bab pa dang /_bsten pa la bab pa dang /_rjes su mthun par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_gru mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos rgyun las bzlog phyogs su bkri bar bya ba de nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med cing 'bad rtsol
[\[281a.6\]]chung ngus rgyun phyogs su 'khyer ba de bzhin du dge slong des bzang zhing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byed de dge slong des bzang zhing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byas pa na/_sems bsten pa la gzhol bar 'gyur zhing /_bsten pa la 'bab pa dang /_bsten pa
[\[281a.7\]]la bab pa dang /_rjes su mthun par gyur na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong des 'di ltar nga'i sems rang gi 'du byed kyis nye bar bcom zhing chu bzhin du bsten pa dang /_chos rnams kyis nye bar bcom la/_ma zhi zhing ma dul ba nye bar zhi ba'i lam ma rnyed la rtse gcig tu ma gyur pa'o/_/'di ltar ngas mdzes
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad yid la byas pa na sems bsten pa la gzhol bar gyur cing /_bsten pa la 'bab pa dang /_bsten pa la bab pa dang /_rjes su mthun par gyur to zhes rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong des 'di ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la bdag gi
[\[281b.2\]]sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol lo zhes lung bstan par mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di na dge slong dgon pa'am shing drung ngam khang pa stong par song na 'di ltar so sor yang dag par rjes su slob ste/_ci bdag nang gi bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa'i 'dod
[\[281b.3\]]chags yod pa zhig so sor myong ba'am/_'on te med pa zhig ces dge slong des mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byed de/_dge slong des mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byas nas sems dben pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/_dben pa la 'bab
[\[281b.4\]]pa dang /_dben pa la bab pa dang /_bsten pa'i rjes su mi mthun par gyur te/_'di lta ste khyim bya'am/_rgyus dag me'i nang du bcug na tshig cing 'khums te zhu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong des mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad cig yid la byas pa na sems dben pa la
[\[281b.5\]]gzhol bar gyur/_dben pa la 'bab pa dang /_dben pa la bab pa dang /_bsten pa'i rjes su mi mthun par gyur na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong des 'di ltar nga'i sems rang gi 'du byed kyis nye bar ma bcom zhing /_chu bzhin du bstan pa ma yin zhing /_/chos kyis nye bar ma
[\[281b.6\]]bcom la/_/zhi zhing dul te nye bar zhi ba'i lam rnyed cing rtse gcig tu gyur pa ste/_'di ltar ngas mdzes shing sdug pa'i mtshan ma cung zad yid la byas pa na sems dben pa la gzhol bar gyur/_dben pa la 'bab pa dang /_dben pa la bab pa dang /_bsten pa'i rjes su mi mthun par
[\[281b.7\]]gyur to zhes rig par bya zhing /_dge slong des 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la nga'i sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol lo zhes lung bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/ci'i phyir lta ba gsum por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_gang yang 'di nyid du gnas mang po bshad de/_ji ltar
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]re zhig phung po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa/_skye la mngon dga' mi bya dang /_/rnam par 'jig pa gsum dag dang /_/yongs su 'dod dang yang dag mthong /_/sdom du gyur pa phyi ma yin/_/zhes sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i mdo las bstan pa mdzod kyi
[\[282a.2\]]gnas dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las sems pa'i tshogs drug ces gsungs pa ni/_gtso bo bstan pa yin zhes bya bar bris zin to/_/lam gyi tshogs dang mdo mang po dag las te/_de la re zhig dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo bzhi pa las
[\[282a.3\]]bstan pa/_mdzod kyi gnas drug par gang yang bde ba'i dbang po dang /_yid bde ba'i dbang po dag ni bde ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya bar 'chad par 'gyur bar blta bar bya'o/_/de dag kyang gzhi phran tshegs las 'byung ba gang yin pa zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/
[\[282a.4\]]dge slong dag chos gcig dang yang dag par ldan na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsten pa'i skal ba med de/_'di lta ste 'dod chags so/_/'dod chags dang yang dag par ldan na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsten pa'i skal ba med do/_/chos gcig dang yang dag par ldan na dran pa nye bar
[\[282a.5\]]gzhag pa bzhi bsten pa'i skal ba dang ldan te/_'di lta ste 'dod chags med pa ste/_'dod chags med pa dang ldan na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsten pa'i skal ba yod do/_/ji ltar bsten pa bzhin du bsgom pa yang /_lan mang du byed pa dang /_rjes su bsrung ba dang /_reg pa dang /_
[\[282a.6\]]mngon sum du bya ba yang de bzhin no/_/yang dag par ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /_mi shes pa dang /_mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dang /_mngon par shes pa dang mngon par ma shes pa dang /_yongs su shes pa dang /_yongs su ma shes pa dang /_spangs pa dang /_ma spangs pa dang /_
[\[282a.7\]]bsgribs pa dang /_ma bsgribs pa dang /_btang ba dang /_ma btang ba dang /_yongs su btang ba dang yongs su ma btang ba dang /_g.yogs pa dang ma g.yogs pa dang /_nub pa dang ma nub pa dang /_yongs su gtugs pa dang yongs su ma gtugs pa yang de bzhin no/_/'dod chags ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_sgyu dang g.yo dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_
[\[282b.2\]]nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal dang /_cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_bag med pa dang /_nges pa dang /_yang dag par rtsom pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_rnyed pa rnyed pas sgrub pa dang /_sdig pa 'dod
[\[282b.3\]]pa dang /_chen po 'dod pa dang /_'dod pas gces spras byed pa dang /_tshig ngan dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_mi bzod pa dang /_'dod pa dang /_yongs su 'dod pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_chos ma yin pa la chags pa dang /_mi 'phrod pa'i ser sna dang /_'jig tshogs la
[\[282b.4\]]lta ba dang /_dngos por lta ba dang /_dngos po med par lta ba dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom dang /_rmya ba dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_glal byed pa dang /_zas kyi tshod mi 'dzin pa dang /_sems zhum pa dang /_
[\[282b.5\]]'du shes sna tshogs yid la byed pa dang /_lus kyi gnas ngan len dang /_yang yang 'dod pa dang /_mang du smra ba dang /_mi drang ba dang /_khro ba dang /_rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe
[\[282b.6\]]ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnyen 'dun gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_ljongs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_ngan sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rigs snyems pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don
[\[282b.7\]]pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/mdo'i tshig ji skad du zhes bya ba la/_lung bar ma'i 'dun pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mtha'i mdo las tshig 'di skad du rgyu dang rkyen lnga po 'di dag ni the tshom gyi sgrib pa dang /_de las skyes pa
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba'i sems las byung ba'i chos skyed par byed pa ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa de las byung ba sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dag so sor
[\[283a.2\]]yang dag par myong bar byed do/_/gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa dang /_de'i rkyen gyis skyes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dag so sor yang dag par myong bar byed
[\[283a.3\]]do/_rgyu lnga dang rkyen lnga po 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i sems las byung ba skyed par byed pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/gya gyu ci yin sdig can lta/_/zhes bya ba la/_dge slong gzhan zhig dge ba can gyi ljongs nas 'ongs te/_nags kyi mtha' gzhan zhig la brten
[\[283a.4\]]cing nye bar gnas so/_/de nas dge tshul ma zhig gis dge slong dang de'i lde mig mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rtag pa ci zhig slong mo'i zas/_/mi rtag ci zhig dge 'dun zas/_/drang po ci zhig dbang po'i gzugs/_/gya gyu ci zhig lde mig go/_/de nas dge slong
[\[283a.5\]]de 'di snyam du 'di dge tshul ma yin bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa brjod par spobs na/_bdag ci'i phyir spobs par mi bya snyam du bsams nas/_tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rtag pa ci zhig mya ngan 'das/_/mi rtag ci zhig 'du byed chos/_/drang po ci zhig 'phags pa'i
[\[283a.6\]]lam/_/gya gyu ci zhig sdig can lta/_/zhes gsungs so/_/sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag mi dge ba'i phung po zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa rnam pa lnga'o zhes smra ba ni de'i
[\[283a.7\]]yang dag par smra ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyi
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]sgrib pa'o/_/dge slong dag dge ba'i phung po zhes bya ba ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o zhes smra ba ni/_de'i yang dag par smra ba ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni dge ba'i phung po ma 'dres pa yongs
[\[283b.2\]]su rdzogs pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes gsungs so/_/rmugs pa dang gnyid dag ni zas gcig tu gsungs te zhes bya ba la/_
[\[283b.3\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag sgrib pa lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi zas dang zas ma yin pa dag bshad par bya ste/_de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong dag sgrib
[\[283b.4\]]pa rnam pa lnga'i zas gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur
[\[283b.5\]]zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_dge slong dag the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa'i chos rnams la/_tshul
[\[283b.6\]]bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_the tshom gyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas pa dang /_zas la lus brten gyi
[\[283b.7\]]zas med par ma yin pa de bzhin du/_sgrib pa lnga po dag kyang zas kyis gnas la zas la brten nas gnas kyi/_zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i zas gang zhe na/_sdug pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/_
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni 'dod pa la
[\[284a.2\]]'dun pa'i zas so/_/dge slong dag gnod sems kyi sgrib pa'i zas gang zhe na/_kun nas mnar sems dang /_kun nas mnar sems kyi rgyu mtshan te/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na gnod sems kyi sgrib pa ma skyes
[\[284a.3\]]pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gnod sems kyi sgrib pa'i zas so/_/dge slong dag rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi zas gang zhe na/_chos lnga po mi dga' ba dang /_rmya ba dang /_glal byed
[\[284a.4\]]pa dang /_zas kyi tshod mi zin pa dang /_sems zhum pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par
[\[284a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi zas so/_/dge slong dag rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas gang zhe na/_chos bzhi po gnyen 'dun gyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_ljongs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_sngon
[\[284a.6\]]dgod pa dang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang yongs su spyad pa rjes su dran pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur
[\[284a.7\]]te/_'di ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas so/_/dge slong dag the tshom gyi sgrib pa'i zas gang zhe na/_rgyud ni rnam pa gsum yod de/_'das pa'i dus dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos so/_/de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na the tshom gyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni the tshom gyi sgrib pa'i zas so/_/'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la lus brten te/_
[\[284b.2\]]lus gnas pa zas med par ma yin pa de bzhin du sgrib pa lnga po dag kyang zas kyis gnas shing zas la brten te gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
[\[284b.3\]]lag gi gnas kyi chos rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed pa/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_
[\[284b.4\]]shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas kyi chos rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par
[\[284b.5\]]'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten te lus gnas kyi/_zas med par ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag kyang zas la brten te gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag dran pa yang dag byang
[\[284b.6\]]chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa dag nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong
[\[284b.7\]]dag 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams [(]rang [,]rab [)]
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]tu rnam par 'byed pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni chos rab tu rnam par
[\[285a.2\]]'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong dag brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi po rnams to/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na brtson 'grus
[\[285a.3\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dga' ba dang
[\[285a.4\]]dga' ba'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi
[\[285a.5\]]zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sems shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag
[\[285a.6\]]byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin
[\[285a.7\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan te/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa zhes
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_khams rnam pa gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang /_'gog pa'i khams rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa lan
[\[285b.2\]]mang du yid la byed na/_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas ma yin pa zhes bya ste/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten
[\[285b.3\]]te lus gnas kyi/_zas med par ni ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po rnams kyang zas kyis gnas shing zas la brten te gnas kyi/_zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag sgrib pa lnga'i zas ma yin pa gang yin pa de gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris
[\[285b.4\]]pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang gnyid dang rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin
[\[285b.5\]]yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na the tshom gyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten te lus gnas kyi zas med par ma yin pa de bzhin du sgrib pa lnga po rnams kyang zas kyis gnas shing zas la brten
[\[285b.6\]]te gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_mi sdug pa ste de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni
[\[285b.7\]]'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag gnod sems kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_byams pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na/_gnod sems kyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'di dag ni gnod sems kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_snang ba'i 'du shes te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi
[\[286a.2\]]skye zhing skyes pa nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_zhi gnas te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib
[\[286a.3\]]pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag the tshom gyi sgrib pa'i zas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_rkyen ni 'di lta bu zhes rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so sor rtog pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin
[\[286a.4\]]du lan mang du yid la byed na the tshom gyi sgrib pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten te lus gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin pa de bzhin du sgrib pa lnga po rnams kyang zas kyis gnas shing zas la brten te gnas kyi/_zas med par
[\[286a.5\]]ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi zas gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas kyi chos rnams la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa dag skye zhing skyes pa dag phyir zhing 'phel ba
[\[286a.6\]]dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_shin tu sbyongs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas kyi chos rnams la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na btang snyoms yang dag byang chub
[\[286a.7\]]kyi yan lag ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa dag phyir zhing 'phel ba dang yangs par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten te lus gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po rnams kyang zas la brten te gnas kyi
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa dag skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes
[\[286b.2\]]pa dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu rnam
[\[286b.3\]]par 'byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa dag skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa dag phyir zhing 'phel zhing
[\[286b.4\]]rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi
[\[286b.5\]]rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa skye zhing skyes pa phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi
[\[286b.6\]]yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_dga' ba dang dga' ba'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi
[\[286b.7\]]yan lag ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]gang zhe na/_lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sems shin tu sbyangs pa ste/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa
[\[287a.2\]]dang yangs par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu mtshan te/_de la tshul bzhin du
[\[287a.3\]]yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa dag skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa dag phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya'o/_/dge slong
[\[287a.4\]]dag btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas gang zhe na/_khams gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang /_'gog pa'i khams rnams te/_de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na btang snyoms yang dag
[\[287a.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa dag skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa dag phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi zas zhes bya ste/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis lus gnas shing zas la brten te
[\[287a.6\]]lus gnas kyi zas med par ni ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag kyang zas kyis gnas shing zas la brten nas gnas kyi/_zas med par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag sgrib pa rnam pa lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi zas dang zas ma yin pa bstan
[\[287a.7\]]par bya yis zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes gsungs so/_/chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba las gnas lnga pa phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//
